- 1 tablespoon mixed herbs (thyme, rosemary, parsley)
- 2 refrigerated piecrusts
- 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of chicken soup
- 2 cups cooked chicken, diced
- 1 cup frozen peas and carrots
- 1 cup low sodium chicken broth
- 1/4 cup buttermilk

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large saucepan, combine the chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, and dry white wine. Bring to a simmer over medium heat.
3. In a small bowl, mix the corn starch with a little water to create a slurry. Slowly add this to the saucepan, stirring constantly until the mixture thickens.
4. Add the cooked chicken, frozen peas and carrots, and herbs to the saucepan. Stir well to combine and cook for another 5 minutes.
5. Unroll one of the refrigerated piecrusts and place it in a 9-inch pie dish. Pour the chicken mixture into the piecrust.
6. Unroll the second piecrust and place it over the filling. Crimp the edges to seal and cut slits in the top to allow steam to escape.
7. Brush the top of the pie with buttermilk for a golden finish.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the filling is bubbling.
9. Let the pie cool for 10 minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: pasta sauce, fresh parmesan cheese, olive oil flavored cooking spray, frozen chopped spinach, large egg whites, part-skim ricotta cheese, pepper, large eggs, italian seasoning, manicotti shells, part-skim mozzarella cheese, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spinach and Cheese Stuffed Manicotti

Ingredients:
- 1 jar (24 ounces) pasta sauce
- 1 cup fresh parmesan cheese, grated
- Olive oil flavored cooking spray
- 1 package (10 ounces) frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
- 2 large egg whites
- 1 container (15 ounces) part-skim ricotta cheese
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 2 large eggs
- 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning
- 14 manicotti shells
- 2 cups part-skim mozzarella cheese, shredded
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Spray a 13x9-inch baking dish with olive oil flavored cooking spray.
2. Cook the manicotti shells according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
3. In a large bowl, combine the ricotta cheese, spinach, 1/2 cup of parmesan cheese, egg whites, eggs, salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning. Mix until well combined.
4. Stuff each manicotti shell with the cheese and spinach mixture. Arrange the stuffed shells in the prepared baking dish.
5. Pour the pasta sauce over the stuffed shells. Sprinkle with the remaining parmesan cheese and the mozzarella cheese.
6. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 40 minutes.
7. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden.
8. Let the manicotti stand for 5 minutes before serving. Enjoy your Spinach and Cheese Stuffed Manicotti!"

input: Ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, dry white wine, sliced mushrooms, fettucine, olive oil, fresh oregano, onions, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, corn starch, large shrimp, tomatoes, chicken bouillon, garlic, flat leaf parsley. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Shrimp and Mushroom Fettuccine with Tomato Basil Sauce

Ingredients:
- Vegetable oil cooking spray
- 1 cup dry white wine
- 2 cups sliced mushrooms
- 1 pound fettuccine
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon fresh oregano, chopped
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped
- 1/2 cup parmesan cheese, grated
- 1 tablespoon corn starch
- 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 2 large tomatoes, chopped
- 1 chicken bouillon cube
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/4 cup flat leaf parsley, chopped

Instructions:
1. Spray a large skillet with vegetable oil cooking spray and heat over medium heat.
2. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until browned. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the olive oil and heat over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened.
4. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the dry white wine and chicken bouillon cube. Stir until the bouillon cube is dissolved.
6. In a small bowl, mix the corn starch with a little water to make a slurry. Add this to the skillet and stir until the sauce thickens.
7. Add the chopped tomatoes, fresh oregano, and fresh basil to the skillet. Cook until the tomatoes are softened.
8. Return the cooked mushrooms and shrimp to the skillet and stir to combine.
9. Cook the fettuccine according to the package instructions. Drain and add to the skillet. Toss to combine with the sauce.
10. Sprinkle the parmesan cheese and chopped flat leaf parsley over the top of the fettuccine before serving."

input: Ingredients: soy sauce, egg whites, red wine vinegar, peanut oil, chicken stock, peanuts, chicken breasts, chili paste with garlic, fresh ginger, green onions, red pepper flakes, corn starch, sugar, fresh veget, sesame oil, rice vinegar. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Kung Pao Chicken

Ingredients:
- 2 chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
- 2 egg whites
- 2 tablespoons corn starch
- 1/4 cup soy sauce
- 1/4 cup red wine vinegar
- 1/4 cup rice vinegar
- 1/4 cup chicken stock
- 2 tablespoons sugar
- 2 tablespoons chili paste with garlic
- 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced
- 1/2 cup green onions, chopped
- 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes
- 1/2 cup peanuts
- 2 tablespoons peanut oil
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 2 cups fresh vegetables (like bell peppers, broccoli, or snap peas)

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, whisk together egg whites and corn starch until smooth. Add the chicken pieces and toss to coat. Set aside.
2. In another bowl, combine soy sauce, red wine vinegar, rice vinegar, chicken stock, sugar, chili paste, and ginger. Stir until sugar is dissolved.
3. Heat peanut oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken pieces and cook until golden brown and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes. Remove chicken from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add sesame oil and heat. Add the fresh vegetables and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
5. Return the chicken to the skillet. Add the sauce, green onions, red pepper flakes, and peanuts. Stir to combine and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until everything is heated through and the sauce has thickened.
6. Serve the Kung Pao Chicken hot, garnished with extra green onions if desired."

input: Ingredients: taco sauce, milk, guacamole, garlic, water, salsa verde, shredded cabbage, dried oregano, kosher salt, sweet onion, condiments, cayenne pepper, avocado, pork shoulder roast, tortillas, chili powder, cumin. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Pork Tacos with Salsa Verde and Guacamole

Ingredients:
- 2 lbs pork shoulder roast
- 1 tablespoon chili powder
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
- 1 teaspoon kosher salt
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 sweet onion, chopped
- 1 cup water
- 1 cup salsa verde
- 2 avocados
- 1 cup shredded cabbage
- 1/2 cup taco sauce
- 1/4 cup milk
- 8 tortillas
- Guacamole, for serving
- Condiments of choice, for serving

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix together chili powder, cumin, dried oregano, cayenne pepper, and kosher salt.
2. Rub the spice mixture all over the pork shoulder roast.
3. Place the pork in a slow cooker, add the chopped sweet onion, minced garlic, and water.
4. Cook on low for 8 hours or on high for 4 hours.
5. Once the pork is cooked and tender, shred it using two forks.
6. Warm the tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat.
7. Mash the avocados and mix with milk to make a creamy avocado sauce.
8. To assemble the tacos, spread a spoonful of the avocado sauce on each tortilla.
9. Top with shredded pork, salsa verde, shredded cabbage, and a drizzle of taco sauce.
10. Serve with guacamole and your choice of condiments on the side. Enjoy your Spicy Pork Tacos with Salsa Verde and Guacamole!"

input: Ingredients: rose petals, almonds, rice, sugar, whole milk, pistachios, saffron. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Saffron Rose Rice Pudding

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon of rose petals
- 1/4 cup of almonds
- 1 cup of rice
- 1/2 cup of sugar
- 4 cups of whole milk
- 1/4 cup of pistachios
- 1/2 teaspoon of saffron

Instructions:
1. Rinse the rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
2. In a large saucepan, combine the rinsed rice and whole milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat.
3. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and let it simmer. Stir occasionally to prevent the rice from sticking to the bottom of the pan.
4. While the rice is cooking, soak the saffron in 2 tablespoons of warm milk.
5. After the rice has been cooking for about 20 minutes, add the sugar and saffron milk to the saucepan. Stir well to combine.
6. Continue to cook the rice on low heat until it is soft and the milk has reduced to a creamy consistency. This should take about 10-15 more minutes.
7. While the rice is finishing cooking, chop the almonds and pistachios.
8. Once the rice is done, remove from heat and stir in the chopped almonds and pistachios.
9. Serve the rice pudding in bowls, garnished with rose petals on top. Enjoy warm or chilled."

input: Ingredients: soy sauce, ginger, canola oil, flour, rice vinegar, honey, garlic, chicken wings, sesame oil, corn starch. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Honey Garlic Sesame Chicken Wings

Ingredients:
- 2 lbs chicken wings
- 1/2 cup soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons ginger, grated
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 1/4 cup flour
- 1/4 cup rice vinegar
- 1/3 cup honey
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 2 tablespoons corn starch

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C). 
2. Rinse the chicken wings and pat them dry. Toss the wings in the flour until they're fully coated. 
3. Heat the canola oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken wings and cook until they're golden brown on all sides. This should take about 10 minutes. 
4. While the wings are cooking, combine the soy sauce, ginger, rice vinegar, honey, garlic, and sesame oil in a small saucepan. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat. 
5. In a small bowl, mix the corn starch with 2 tablespoons of cold water to create a slurry. Stir this into the saucepan and continue to simmer the sauce until it thickens. This should take about 5 minutes. 
6. Once the wings are cooked, transfer them to a baking dish. Pour the sauce over the wings, making sure they're fully coated. 
7. Bake the wings in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until they're cooked through and the sauce is sticky. 
8. Remove the wings from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: chicken stock, drumstick, ground black pepper, chopped cilantro, green chile, peeled tomatoes, salt, chicken, chiles, olive oil, adobo sauce, yellow corn meal, chipotle chile, ancho powder, chipotle chile powder. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chipotle Chicken Stew

Ingredients:
- 4 cups chicken stock
- 6 chicken drumsticks
- 1 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1/2 cup chopped cilantro
- 2 green chiles, chopped
- 1 can (14.5 oz) peeled tomatoes
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 chicken breasts, cubed
- 2 chipotle chiles, chopped
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 tablespoons adobo sauce
- 1/2 cup yellow corn meal
- 1 teaspoon ancho powder
- 1 teaspoon chipotle chile powder

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the chicken drumsticks and cubed chicken breasts to the pot. Cook until browned on all sides.
2. Add the chopped green chiles and chipotle chiles to the pot. Stir and cook for another 2 minutes.
3. Add the peeled tomatoes, chicken stock, adobo sauce, ancho powder, chipotle chile powder, salt, and ground black pepper to the pot. Stir well to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 30 minutes.
5. Slowly whisk in the yellow corn meal, making sure there are no lumps. Continue to simmer the stew for another 15 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the stew has thickened.
6. Stir in the chopped cilantro just before serving. Adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve hot."

input: Ingredients: cheddar cheese, taco seasoning mix, salt, Old El Paso Flour Tortillas, cranberry sauce, fresh cilantro, Sriracha, beer, avocado, soy sauce, olive oil, chili sauce, brown sugar, lime, jalapeno chilies, beef rib short. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Cranberry Beef Tacos

Ingredients:
- 2 cups cheddar cheese, shredded
- 2 tablespoons taco seasoning mix
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 8 Old El Paso Flour Tortillas
- 1 cup cranberry sauce
- 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
- 2 tablespoons Sriracha
- 1 cup beer
- 1 ripe avocado, sliced
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon chili sauce
- 2 tablespoons brown sugar
- 1 lime, juiced
- 2 jalapeno chilies, sliced
- 2 pounds beef rib short

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the taco seasoning mix, salt, Sriracha, beer, soy sauce, chili sauce, brown sugar, and lime juice. Mix until well combined.
2. Add the beef ribs to the marinade, ensuring they are fully coated. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
3. Preheat your grill or stovetop pan over medium heat. Add olive oil.
4. Remove the beef ribs from the marinade, shaking off any excess. Grill the ribs for about 3-4 minutes on each side, or until they reach your desired level of doneness.
5. While the beef is cooking, warm the tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat until they are soft and pliable.
6. Once the beef is done, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing into thin strips.
7. To assemble the tacos, spread a spoonful of cranberry sauce on each tortilla. Top with slices of beef, cheddar cheese, avocado slices, and jalapeno slices.
8. Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve immediately. Enjoy your Spicy Cranberry Beef Tacos!"

input: Ingredients: miso paste, water, seaweed, tofu, green onions, dashi. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Traditional Miso Soup

Ingredients:
- 3 tablespoons miso paste
- 4 cups water
- 1 cup seaweed (wakame), rehydrated and chopped
- 1 cup tofu, cubed
- 2 green onions, thinly sliced
- 1 teaspoon dashi granules

Instructions:
1. In a medium-sized pot, bring the 4 cups of water to a boil.
2. Add the 1 teaspoon of dashi granules to the boiling water, stirring until they are fully dissolved.
3. Lower the heat to medium and add the rehydrated and chopped seaweed to the pot. Let it simmer for about 5 minutes.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the 3 tablespoons of miso paste with a little bit of warm water to make it more manageable. Stir until it becomes a smooth mixture.
5. Add the miso mixture to the pot, stirring well to ensure it is fully incorporated.
6. Add the cubed tofu to the pot and let the soup simmer for another 2-3 minutes.
7. Just before serving, add the thinly sliced green onions to the soup.
8. Serve the miso soup hot. Enjoy this traditional Japanese dish!"

input: Ingredients: fresh dill, yoghurt, salt, myzithra, large eggs, cheese, feta cheese, phyllo, kefalotyri, ground black pepper, extra-virgin olive oil, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Greek Cheese and Herb Pie

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup fresh dill, chopped
- 1 cup yoghurt
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup myzithra cheese, crumbled
- 3 large eggs
- 1 cup feta cheese, crumbled
- 8 sheets phyllo dough
- 1 cup kefalotyri cheese, grated
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil
- 2 medium onions, finely chopped

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the myzithra cheese, feta cheese, and kefalotyri cheese.
3. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs and then add in the yoghurt, salt, and pepper. Mix until well combined.
4. Heat the olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the onions and sauté until they become translucent.
5. Add the sautéed onions and chopped dill to the cheese mixture. Stir to combine.
6. Gradually add the egg and yoghurt mixture to the cheese and onion mixture, stirring continuously to prevent the eggs from scrambling.
7. Lay a sheet of phyllo dough in a greased baking dish, allowing the edges to hang over the sides. Brush with olive oil. Repeat this process with the remaining sheets of phyllo, brushing each one with olive oil.
8. Pour the cheese and egg mixture over the phyllo dough in the baking dish. Fold the overhanging edges of the phyllo dough over the top of the filling.
9. Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until the pie is golden brown and the filling is set.
10. Allow the pie to cool for a few minutes before cutting into slices and serving. Enjoy your Greek Cheese and Herb Pie!"

input: Ingredients: sea salt, chopped cilantro, black-eyed peas, purple onion, shredded Monterey Jack cheese, lime, garlic, canola oil, Sriracha, tortilla chips. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Black-Eyed Pea Nachos

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon sea salt
- 1/2 cup chopped cilantro
- 2 cups black-eyed peas
- 1 large purple onion, diced
- 2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese
- 1 lime, juiced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 2 tablespoons Sriracha
- 1 bag of tortilla chips

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F.
2. In a large skillet, heat the canola oil over medium heat. Add the diced purple onion and minced garlic, sauté until the onion is translucent.
3. Add the black-eyed peas to the skillet and stir well. Cook for about 5 minutes until the peas are heated through.
4. Add the Sriracha and lime juice to the skillet, stirring well to combine. Season with sea salt.
5. Arrange the tortilla chips in a single layer on a large baking sheet.
6. Evenly distribute the black-eyed pea mixture over the tortilla chips.
7. Sprinkle the shredded Monterey Jack cheese over the top of the black-eyed pea mixture.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove from the oven and sprinkle the chopped cilantro over the top of the nachos.
10. Serve hot and enjoy your Spicy Black-Eyed Pea Nachos."

input: Ingredients: buttermilk, okra, large eggs, all-purpose flour, salt, cracker crumbs, peanut oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Crispy Buttermilk Fried Okra

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of buttermilk
- 1 pound of okra, sliced into 1/2 inch pieces
- 2 large eggs
- 1 cup of all-purpose flour
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 2 cups of cracker crumbs
- 2 cups of peanut oil

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, soak the sliced okra in the buttermilk for about 30 minutes.
2. In a separate bowl, beat the two large eggs.
3. In another bowl, mix together the all-purpose flour, salt, and cracker crumbs.
4. After the okra has soaked, drain it and dip each piece first into the beaten eggs, then into the flour and cracker crumb mixture, making sure each piece is fully coated.
5. In a large skillet, heat the peanut oil over medium-high heat.
6. Once the oil is hot, add the coated okra pieces in batches, making sure not to overcrowd the skillet.
7. Fry the okra until it is golden brown on all sides, about 2-3 minutes per side.
8. Use a slotted spoon to remove the fried okra from the skillet and drain on paper towels.
9. Repeat the process with the remaining okra.
10. Serve the crispy buttermilk fried okra warm."

input: Ingredients: Philadelphia Cream Cheese, powdered sugar, oil, crab meat, salt, wonton wrappers. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Crab and Cream Cheese Wontons

Ingredients:
- 8 ounces Philadelphia Cream Cheese
- 1/2 cup powdered sugar
- 2 cups oil
- 1 cup crab meat
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 24 wonton wrappers

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, combine the Philadelphia Cream Cheese and powdered sugar. Mix until smooth.
2. Add the crab meat and salt to the cream cheese mixture. Stir until well combined.
3. Lay out the wonton wrappers on a clean surface. Place a spoonful of the crab and cream cheese mixture in the center of each wrapper.
4. Wet the edges of the wonton wrappers with a little water. Fold the wrappers over the filling to form a triangle. Press the edges to seal.
5. Heat the oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat.
6. Carefully place the filled wontons in the hot oil. Fry until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes on each side.
7. Use a slotted spoon to remove the wontons from the oil. Drain on paper towels.
8. Serve the Crab and Cream Cheese Wontons while hot."

input: Ingredients: savoy cabbage, salt, unsalted butter, baking potatoes, black pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Savoy Cabbage and Potato Bake

Ingredients:
- 1 medium savoy cabbage
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 4 tablespoons unsalted butter
- 4 large baking potatoes
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

2. Rinse the savoy cabbage under cold water, remove the outer leaves, and cut it into quarters. Remove the core from each quarter and chop the cabbage into bite-sized pieces.

3. Peel the baking potatoes and cut them into thin slices.

4. In a large frying pan, melt 2 tablespoons of the unsalted butter over medium heat. Add the chopped cabbage and cook for about 5 minutes, until it starts to soften. Season with 1/2 teaspoon of salt and 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper.

5. In a separate frying pan, melt the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter. Add the sliced potatoes and cook for about 10 minutes, until they start to soften. Season with the remaining 1/2 teaspoon of salt and 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper.

6. In a large baking dish, layer half of the cooked cabbage, followed by half of the cooked potatoes. Repeat with the remaining cabbage and potatoes.

7. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes, until the cabbage and potatoes are fully cooked and tender.

8. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy your Savoy Cabbage and Potato Bake!"

input: Ingredients: sake, sesame oil, boneless chicken thighs, peanut oil, soy sauce, vegetable oil, potato starch, fresh ginger. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sesame Ginger Chicken Stir Fry

Ingredients:
- 4 boneless chicken thighs
- 2 tablespoons of sake
- 2 tablespoons of sesame oil
- 2 tablespoons of peanut oil
- 3 tablespoons of soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil
- 2 tablespoons of potato starch
- 1 tablespoon of fresh ginger, grated

Instructions:
1. Cut the chicken thighs into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a bowl, combine the chicken, sake, 1 tablespoon of sesame oil, and 1 tablespoon of soy sauce. Mix well and let it marinate for 15 minutes.
3. After marinating, drain the chicken and coat it with potato starch.
4. Heat the vegetable oil and 1 tablespoon of peanut oil in a pan over medium heat.
5. Add the chicken to the pan and cook until it's browned and cooked through, about 7-10 minutes.
6. Remove the chicken from the pan and set it aside.
7. In the same pan, add the remaining peanut oil and grated ginger. Cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
8. Return the chicken to the pan, add the remaining soy sauce and sesame oil. Stir well to combine.
9. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, until the chicken is well coated with the sauce.
10. Serve the Sesame Ginger Chicken Stir Fry hot. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: cream of tartar, pistachio nuts, salt, orange liqueur, eggs, vanilla extract, heavy whipping cream, semi-sweet chocolate morsels, water, cake flour, confectioners sugar, ground cinnamon, ricotta cheese, cream cheese, white sugar. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chocolate Pistachio Ricotta Cheesecake

Ingredients:
- 1/4 teaspoon cream of tartar
- 1 cup pistachio nuts, chopped
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 2 tablespoons orange liqueur
- 4 large eggs
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
- 1 cup heavy whipping cream
- 1 cup semi-sweet chocolate morsels
- 1/4 cup water
- 2 cups cake flour
- 1 cup confectioners sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 2 cups ricotta cheese
- 2 cups cream cheese
- 1 1/2 cups white sugar

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease a 9-inch springform pan.
2. In a bowl, combine cake flour, 1/2 cup white sugar, ground cinnamon, and salt. Add water and mix until a dough forms. Press this into the bottom of the prepared pan.
3. In a separate bowl, beat together the cream cheese, ricotta cheese, and 1 cup white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract and orange liqueur.
4. Melt the semi-sweet chocolate morsels in a microwave-safe bowl in 30-second intervals, stirring after each melting, for 1 to 3 minutes (depending on your microwave). Do not overheat or chocolate will scorch.
5. Gradually blend the melted chocolate into the cheese mixture. Pour this over the crust in the pan.
6. Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven, or until the center is set when you jiggle the pan. Cool completely in the refrigerator for at least 3 hours, or overnight.
7. In a chilled bowl, whip the heavy cream until soft peaks form. Add the confectioners sugar and cream of tartar, continuing to whip until stiff. Spread this over the cooled cheesecake.
8. Sprinkle the chopped pistachio nuts over the whipped cream. Serve chilled."

input: Ingredients: tomatoes, coarse salt, water, white onion, serrano, fresh cilantro. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Fresh Serrano Salsa

Ingredients:
- 4 medium tomatoes
- 1 teaspoon coarse salt
- 1/4 cup water
- 1 large white onion
- 2 serrano peppers
- 1/2 cup fresh cilantro

Instructions:
1. Wash the tomatoes, serrano peppers, and fresh cilantro thoroughly.
2. Roughly chop the tomatoes, white onion, and serrano peppers.
3. Remove the stems from the cilantro and roughly chop the leaves.
4. In a blender, combine the chopped tomatoes, onion, serrano peppers, and cilantro.
5. Add the coarse salt and water to the blender.
6. Blend the ingredients until they reach your desired consistency.
7. Taste the salsa and add more salt if needed.
8. Pour the salsa into a bowl and serve immediately, or refrigerate for later use."

input: Ingredients: steel-cut oats, salt, ground cinnamon, water, hazelnuts, hazelnut oil, brown sugar, sweet cherries. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cherry Hazelnut Steel-Cut Oatmeal

Ingredients:
- 1 cup steel-cut oats
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 4 cups water
- 1/2 cup hazelnuts
- 1 tablespoon hazelnut oil
- 2 tablespoons brown sugar
- 1 cup sweet cherries, pitted and halved

Instructions:
1. In a large saucepan, bring the water to a boil. 
2. Add the steel-cut oats and salt to the boiling water. Reduce the heat to low and let it simmer, stirring occasionally for 25-30 minutes, until the oats are your desired texture.
3. While the oats are cooking, toast the hazelnuts in a dry skillet over medium heat until they're golden and fragrant. This should take about 5 minutes. Once toasted, remove the hazelnuts from the skillet and roughly chop them.
4. Stir the ground cinnamon and brown sugar into the cooked oats.
5. Drizzle the hazelnut oil over the oatmeal and stir until well combined.
6. Divide the oatmeal into bowls. Top each bowl with a portion of the toasted hazelnuts and sweet cherries before serving."

input: Ingredients: olive oil, salt, hamburger buns, paprika, chopped fresh mint, ground cinnamon, balsamic vinegar, feta cheese crumbles, baby spinach leaves, purple onion, ground lamb. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Greek Lamb Burgers with Feta and Spinach

Ingredients:
- 1 lb ground lamb
- 1/2 cup feta cheese crumbles
- 1/2 cup chopped fresh mint
- 1/2 purple onion, finely chopped
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 4 hamburger buns
- 1 cup baby spinach leaves
- 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the ground lamb, half of the chopped mint, cinnamon, paprika, and salt. Mix until all ingredients are well incorporated.
2. Form the mixture into 4 equal-sized patties.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the patties and cook for about 5 minutes on each side, or until they reach your desired level of doneness.
4. While the patties are cooking, toss the baby spinach leaves with the balsamic vinegar in a separate bowl.
5. Toast the hamburger buns and set aside.
6. Once the patties are done, assemble the burgers by placing a patty on the bottom half of each bun. Top each patty with a quarter of the feta cheese crumbles, a quarter of the balsamic-dressed spinach, and a sprinkle of the remaining chopped mint.
7. Finish by adding the chopped purple onion and placing the top half of the bun on each. Serve immediately."

input: Ingredients: chopped celery, fire roasted diced tomatoes, andouille sausage, sweet pepper, red kidnei beans, rins and drain. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Andouille Sausage and Bean Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of chopped celery
- 2 cans (14.5 oz each) of fire roasted diced tomatoes
- 1 lb of andouille sausage, sliced
- 1 large sweet pepper, diced
- 2 cans (15 oz each) of red kidney beans, rinsed and drained

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, cook the andouille sausage over medium heat until browned. Remove the sausage from the pot and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the chopped celery and diced sweet pepper. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
3. Add the fire roasted diced tomatoes to the pot, including the juice from the cans. Stir well to combine.
4. Return the andouille sausage to the pot and add the rinsed and drained red kidney beans. Stir well to combine all ingredients.
5. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let the stew simmer for about 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Serve the stew hot. Enjoy your Andouille Sausage and Bean Stew!"

input: Ingredients: gari, rice vinegar, wasabi paste, black sesame seeds, scallions, Japanese soy sauce, fresh salmon, sugar, ginger, garlic cloves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Salmon Sushi Bowl with Wasabi-Ginger Dressing

Ingredients:
- 2 cups gari
- 1/4 cup rice vinegar
- 2 tablespoons wasabi paste
- 1 tablespoon black sesame seeds
- 2 scallions, thinly sliced
- 1/4 cup Japanese soy sauce
- 1 pound fresh salmon, skin removed
- 2 tablespoons sugar
- 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated
- 2 garlic cloves, minced

Instructions:

1. Cut the fresh salmon into bite-sized cubes and place them in a bowl.

2. In a separate bowl, combine the rice vinegar, Japanese soy sauce, sugar, wasabi paste, grated ginger, and minced garlic cloves. Stir until the sugar is completely dissolved.

3. Pour the marinade over the salmon cubes. Make sure all pieces are coated evenly. Cover the bowl and let it marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.

4. While the salmon is marinating, prepare the gari according to the package instructions.

5. Once the salmon has marinated, heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add the salmon along with the marinade and cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side or until the salmon is cooked to your liking.

6. Divide the cooked gari among four bowls. Top each bowl with the cooked salmon.

7. Sprinkle the black sesame seeds and sliced scallions over the top of the salmon.

8. Serve the Salmon Sushi Bowl with extra wasabi paste on the side, if desired. Enjoy your meal!"

input: Ingredients: dried porcini mushrooms, chopped fresh thyme, beef rib short, tomato paste, kosher salt, dry red wine, hot water, black pepper, fat free less sodium beef broth, garlic cloves, cremini mushrooms, olive oil, all-purpose flour, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Red Wine Braised Short Ribs with Porcini and Cremini Mushrooms

Ingredients:
- 1 ounce dried porcini mushrooms
- 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme
- 4 pounds beef rib short
- 2 tablespoons tomato paste
- 1 tablespoon kosher salt
- 2 cups dry red wine
- 2 cups hot water
- 1 teaspoon black pepper
- 4 cups fat free less sodium beef broth
- 4 garlic cloves, minced
- 8 ounces cremini mushrooms, sliced
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
- 2 large onions, chopped

Instructions:
1. Soak the dried porcini mushrooms in 2 cups of hot water for 20 minutes. After they've soaked, drain them but keep the liquid for later use.
2. Season the beef ribs with salt and pepper. Heat the olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add the ribs to the pot and brown on all sides. This should take about 10 minutes. Remove the ribs and set them aside.
3. In the same pot, add the onions and garlic. Cook until they are soft and fragrant, about 5 minutes.
4. Stir in the tomato paste and flour, cook for another 2 minutes.
5. Pour in the red wine, scraping the bottom of the pot to loosen any browned bits. Bring the mixture to a boil and cook until the wine is reduced by half.
6. Return the ribs to the pot. Add the beef broth, thyme, porcini mushrooms, and the reserved mushroom soaking liquid. Bring the mixture to a simmer, cover the pot, and let it cook for about 2 hours, or until the ribs are tender.
7. In the last 30 minutes of cooking, add the sliced cremini mushrooms to the pot.
8. Once the ribs are done, remove them from the pot and let them rest for a few minutes before serving. Skim any excess fat from the surface of the sauce and season with additional salt and pepper if needed.
9. Serve the ribs with the mushroom sauce. Enjoy your Red Wine Braised Short Ribs with Porcini and Cremini Mushrooms!"

input: Ingredients: creole mustard, minced garlic, green tomatoes, creole seasoning, canola oil, mayonaise, prepared horseradish, paprika, shrimp, celery salt, water, buttermilk, lemon juice, shrimp and crab boil seasoning, shallots, salt, medium shrimp. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creole Shrimp with Green Tomato Slaw

Ingredients:
- 1 lb medium shrimp
- 1 tablespoon shrimp and crab boil seasoning
- 2 tablespoons lemon juice
- 2 green tomatoes
- 1 shallot
- 1 tablespoon minced garlic
- 1 tablespoon creole mustard
- 1 tablespoon prepared horseradish
- 1/2 cup mayonnaise
- 1/2 teaspoon celery salt
- 1/2 teaspoon paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon creole seasoning
- 1/2 cup buttermilk
- 1/4 cup canola oil
- Salt to taste
- Water as needed

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, bring water to a boil and add the shrimp and crab boil seasoning. Add the shrimp and cook until they turn pink, about 2-3 minutes. Drain and rinse under cold water. Set aside.
2. In a large bowl, combine the creole mustard, minced garlic, prepared horseradish, mayonnaise, celery salt, paprika, creole seasoning, and buttermilk. Stir until well combined.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the green tomatoes and shallots. Pour the dressing over the tomatoes and shallots and toss to coat. Set aside.
4. In a large skillet, heat the canola oil over medium heat. Add the shrimp and cook until they are heated through, about 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and squeeze lemon juice over the shrimp. Season with salt to taste.
5. To serve, place a portion of the green tomato slaw on a plate and top with the shrimp. Enjoy your Creole Shrimp with Green Tomato Slaw."

input: Ingredients: turnip greens, vegetable oil, fresh lemon juice, black peppercorns, butternut squash, apples, kosher salt, buttermilk, country ham, shallots, extra-virgin olive oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Butternut Squash and Turnip Greens with Country Ham

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of turnip greens
- 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil
- 1 tablespoon of fresh lemon juice
- 1 teaspoon of black peppercorns
- 1 medium butternut squash
- 2 medium apples
- 1 teaspoon of kosher salt
- 1/2 cup of buttermilk
- 1/2 pound of country ham
- 2 shallots
- 2 tablespoons of extra-virgin olive oil

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 

2. Peel and dice the butternut squash and apples into 1-inch cubes. 

3. Toss the butternut squash and apples with the vegetable oil, kosher salt, and black peppercorns. 

4. Spread the squash and apples on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until tender and lightly browned.

5. While the squash and apples are roasting, heat the extra-virgin olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 

6. Add the diced country ham and cook until it is browned and crispy. 

7. Remove the ham from the skillet and set it aside. 

8. In the same skillet, add the chopped shallots and cook until they are soft and translucent.

9. Add the turnip greens to the skillet and cook until they are wilted. 

10. Add the fresh lemon juice and buttermilk to the skillet and stir to combine. 

11. Once the squash and apples are done roasting, add them to the skillet and stir to combine. 

12. Add the cooked country ham back into the skillet and stir to combine. 

13. Serve the dish warm. Enjoy your Butternut Squash and Turnip Greens with Country Ham!"

input: Ingredients: vegetable oil, frozen edamame beans, onions, whole kernel corn, drain, seasoning salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Edamame and Corn Sauté

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 2 cups frozen edamame beans
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1 can (15 ounces) whole kernel corn, drained
- 1 teaspoon seasoning salt

Instructions:
1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion to the skillet and sauté until it becomes translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the frozen edamame beans to the skillet. Cook, stirring occasionally, until they are heated through, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the drained corn to the skillet and stir to combine.
5. Sprinkle the mixture with the seasoning salt and stir well to distribute the seasoning.
6. Continue to cook the mixture, stirring occasionally, for another 5 minutes or until all the ingredients are heated through.
7. Serve the Edamame and Corn Sauté warm. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: pitted kalamata olives, grated parmesan cheese, penne pasta, cauliflower, olive oil, crushed red pepper, pepper, garlic, fresh parsley, capers, whole peeled tomatoes, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Penne Pasta with Cauliflower and Kalamata Olives in Tomato Sauce

Ingredients:
- 1 cup pitted kalamata olives
- 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 2 cups penne pasta
- 1 medium cauliflower, cut into florets
- 3 tablespoons olive oil
- 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped
- 2 tablespoons capers
- 1 can (28 ounces) whole peeled tomatoes
- 1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. Cook the penne pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. While the pasta is cooking, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and crushed red pepper and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the cauliflower florets to the skillet and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower is golden and crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
4. Add the whole peeled tomatoes with their juice to the skillet, breaking them up with a spoon. Stir in the capers and kalamata olives. Reduce the heat to low and simmer until the cauliflower is very tender and the sauce has thickened, about 15 minutes.
5. Add the cooked penne pasta to the skillet and toss to combine with the sauce. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the pasta is heated through.
6. Remove from heat and stir in the fresh parsley and grated parmesan cheese. Serve hot."

input: Ingredients: strong white bread flour, salted butter, sunflower oil, warm water, yoghurt, kalonji, sugar, instant yeast, garlic, fresh coriander, sea salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Garlic and Coriander Naan Bread

Ingredients:
- 500g strong white bread flour
- 50g salted butter
- 2 tablespoons sunflower oil
- 200ml warm water
- 150g yoghurt
- 1 teaspoon kalonji
- 1 teaspoon sugar
- 1 teaspoon instant yeast
- 3 cloves garlic
- Small bunch of fresh coriander
- 1 teaspoon sea salt

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the strong white bread flour, sugar, instant yeast, and sea salt.
2. Melt the salted butter and add it to the bowl along with the yoghurt and warm water. Mix until a dough forms.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface for about 10 minutes until it's smooth and elastic.
4. Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover with a damp cloth, and let it rise in a warm place for about 1 hour or until it doubles in size.
5. Preheat your grill to high and place a baking tray on the top shelf to heat up.
6. Divide the dough into 8 equal pieces and roll each one out into a teardrop shape.
7. Crush the garlic and chop the fresh coriander, then mix them with the sunflower oil.
8. Brush one side of each naan with the garlic and coriander oil, then sprinkle with kalonji.
9. Place the naans (oil side up) onto the preheated baking tray and grill for 1-2 minutes or until they puff up and brown spots appear.
10. Serve the naan breads warm, ideally with a curry or dip."

input: Ingredients: water, chicken breasts, oyster sauce, soy sauce, egg whites, garlic, cooked white rice, kosher salt, mixed mushrooms, sauce, wood ear mushrooms, chinese rice wine, vegetables, sesame oil, corn starch. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chicken and Mushroom Stir-Fry with Oyster Sauce

Ingredients:
- 2 chicken breasts
- 1/4 cup oyster sauce
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 2 egg whites
- 3 cloves garlic
- 2 cups cooked white rice
- 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt
- 1 cup mixed mushrooms
- 1/2 cup wood ear mushrooms
- 2 tablespoons Chinese rice wine
- 2 cups mixed vegetables (like bell peppers, carrots, and snow peas)
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 2 tablespoons corn starch
- 1/2 cup water

Instructions:
1. Cut the chicken breasts into thin slices.
2. In a bowl, mix the egg whites, corn starch, and salt. Add the chicken slices and mix until they are well coated.
3. Heat the sesame oil in a wok or large frying pan over medium-high heat.
4. Add the garlic and stir-fry for about 30 seconds until fragrant.
5. Add the chicken slices and stir-fry for about 5 minutes until they are cooked through.
6. Remove the chicken from the pan and set it aside.
7. In the same pan, add the mixed mushrooms and wood ear mushrooms. Stir-fry for about 3 minutes until they are tender.
8. Add the mixed vegetables and stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
9. In a small bowl, mix the oyster sauce, soy sauce, Chinese rice wine, and water. Pour this sauce into the pan.
10. Return the chicken to the pan and stir everything together. Cook for another 2 minutes until everything is heated through.
11. Serve the stir-fry over the cooked white rice."

input: Ingredients: hoisin sauce, corn starch, green onions, extra firm tofu, oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hoisin Glazed Tofu Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 1/4 cup hoisin sauce
- 2 tablespoons corn starch
- 4 green onions
- 1 block (14 ounces) extra firm tofu
- 2 tablespoons oil

Instructions:
1. Drain the tofu and press it to remove as much liquid as possible. Cut the tofu into 1-inch cubes.
2. In a large bowl, toss the tofu cubes with the corn starch until they are evenly coated.
3. Heat the oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat.
4. Add the tofu to the skillet and cook until it is golden brown on all sides, about 10 minutes. Remove the tofu from the skillet and set it aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the chopped green onions and sauté for 2 minutes until they are softened.
6. Reduce the heat to low and add the hoisin sauce to the skillet. Stir well to combine with the green onions.
7. Return the tofu to the skillet and toss it in the hoisin sauce until it is well coated.
8. Serve the hoisin glazed tofu hot, garnished with additional green onions if desired."

input: Ingredients: quinoa, salt, oil, black beans, jalapeno chilies, taco seasoning, chicken broth, bell pepper, salsa, onions, minced garlic, boneless skinless chicken breasts, shredded cheese. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chicken and Quinoa Taco Bowl

Ingredients:
- 1 cup quinoa
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 2 tablespoons oil
- 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
- 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and finely chopped
- 1 packet (1 oz) taco seasoning
- 2 cups chicken broth
- 1 bell pepper, diced
- 1 cup salsa
- 1 onion, diced
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts
- 1 cup shredded cheese (cheddar or Mexican blend)

Instructions:
1. Rinse the quinoa under cold water until the water runs clear. 
2. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the quinoa and toast for about 2 minutes. 
3. Add the chicken broth to the skillet and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and let simmer for 15 minutes or until the quinoa is cooked and the liquid is absorbed. 
4. While the quinoa is cooking, heat the remaining oil in another skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet and let rest. 
5. In the same skillet, add the onion, bell pepper, jalapenos, and minced garlic. Cook until the vegetables are softened, about 5 minutes. 
6. Cut the cooked chicken into bite-sized pieces and return to the skillet with the vegetables. Add the taco seasoning and stir to coat the chicken and vegetables. 
7. Add the black beans, salsa, and cooked quinoa to the skillet. Stir to combine and heat through. 
8. Sprinkle the shredded cheese over the top of the skillet. Cover and let the cheese melt, about 2 minutes. 
9. Serve the spicy chicken and quinoa taco bowl hot."

input: Ingredients: jalapeno chilies, fresh lime juice, tomatillos, coarse salt, fresh cilantro, purple onion. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Tomatillo Salsa

Ingredients:
- 2 jalapeno chilies
- 3 tablespoons fresh lime juice
- 5 tomatillos
- 1 teaspoon coarse salt
- 1/2 cup fresh cilantro
- 1/2 purple onion

Instructions:
1. Remove the stems from the jalapeno chilies. If you prefer a milder salsa, also remove the seeds.
2. Peel and wash the tomatillos. Cut them into quarters.
3. Peel and finely chop the purple onion.
4. Wash and chop the fresh cilantro.
5. In a blender or food processor, combine the jalapeno chilies, tomatillos, chopped onion, and cilantro.
6. Squeeze the lime to get fresh lime juice and add it to the blender.
7. Add the coarse salt.
8. Blend until all the ingredients are well combined and the salsa is smooth.
9. Taste and adjust the salt or lime juice if necessary.
10. Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to use."

input: Ingredients: eau de vie, leaves, cane sugar, pinenuts, golden raisins, baking apples, large eggs, ground cinnamon, parmesan cheese, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Baked Apple and Pinenut Pudding

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons eau de vie
- 10 fresh mint leaves
- 1 cup cane sugar
- 1/2 cup pinenuts
- 1/2 cup golden raisins
- 4 large baking apples
- 2 large eggs
- 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. Core the apples and cut them into thin slices. Place the slices in a large bowl.

3. Add the golden raisins, pinenuts, cane sugar, ground cinnamon, and salt to the bowl. Mix well.

4. Beat the eggs in a separate bowl. Pour the beaten eggs over the apple mixture and mix well.

5. Pour the eau de vie over the apple mixture and mix again.

6. Transfer the apple mixture to a baking dish. Sprinkle the grated parmesan cheese on top.

7. Bake in the preheated oven for about 45 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the apples are tender.

8. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes. Garnish with fresh mint leaves before serving."

input: Ingredients: salt and ground black pepper, purple onion, jalapeno chilies, plum tomatoes, garlic powder, chopped cilantro fresh, lime, garlic, ground cumin. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Tomato and Jalapeno Salsa

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 large purple onion, finely chopped
- 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and finely chopped
- 4 plum tomatoes, diced
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro
- Juice of 1 lime
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the finely chopped purple onion, diced plum tomatoes, and finely chopped jalapeno chilies.
2. Add the minced garlic to the mixture.
3. Sprinkle the garlic powder, ground cumin, salt, and ground black pepper over the mixture. Stir well to combine.
4. Add the chopped fresh cilantro to the bowl and mix well.
5. Squeeze the juice of one lime over the salsa. Stir well to combine all the ingredients.
6. Taste and adjust the seasoning if necessary.
7. Let the salsa sit for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld together."

input: Ingredients: lime juice, sliced black olives, chili powder, sour cream, cheddar cheese, chopped green chilies, green onions, butter, water, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breasts, enchilada sauce, condensed cream of chicken soup, taco seasoning mix, flour tortillas, onion powder, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cheesy Chicken Enchiladas

Ingredients:
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts
- 1 tablespoon of butter
- 1/2 cup of onions, chopped
- 1 teaspoon of garlic powder
- 1 teaspoon of onion powder
- 1 tablespoon of chili powder
- 1 packet of taco seasoning mix
- 1 can of condensed cream of chicken soup
- 1/2 cup of water
- 1 can of chopped green chilies
- 1 cup of enchilada sauce
- 8 flour tortillas
- 2 cups of cheddar cheese, shredded
- 1/2 cup of sour cream
- 1/4 cup of sliced black olives
- 1/4 cup of green onions, chopped
- 1 tablespoon of lime juice

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2. In a skillet over medium heat, melt the butter. Add the chopped onions and cook until they are translucent.
3. Add the chicken breasts to the skillet. Sprinkle with garlic powder, onion powder, and chili powder. Cook until the chicken is no longer pink in the center.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and shred it. Return the shredded chicken to the skillet.
5. Stir in the taco seasoning mix, condensed cream of chicken soup, water, and chopped green chilies. Let it simmer for about 5 minutes.
6. Pour half of the enchilada sauce into the bottom of a baking dish.
7. Spoon the chicken mixture onto each tortilla. Roll up the tortillas and place them seam side down in the baking dish.
8. Pour the remaining enchilada sauce over the rolled tortillas. Sprinkle with shredded cheddar cheese.
9. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and lightly browned.
10. Top the enchiladas with sour cream, sliced black olives, chopped green onions, and a squeeze of lime juice before serving."

input: Ingredients: pepper, potatoes, butter, salt, onions, tomato paste, olive oil, beef stock, diced tomatoes, carrots, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, rosemary leaves, lean steak, water, flour, buttermilk, Guinness Lager, dried rosemary. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Guinness Steak Stew with Rosemary Biscuits

Ingredients:
- 1.5 lbs lean steak, cut into chunks
- 1 tsp salt
- 1 tsp pepper
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 2 onions, chopped
- 2 carrots, chopped
- 2 potatoes, chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tbsp tomato paste
- 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes
- 1 can (14.9 oz) Guinness Lager
- 2 cups beef stock
- 1 tsp dried rosemary
- 2 cups flour
- 1 tbsp sugar
- 1.5 tsp baking powder
- 0.5 tsp baking soda
- 1 tsp rosemary leaves, chopped
- 1 cup buttermilk
- 6 tbsp butter, melted

Instructions:
1. Season steak with salt and pepper. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add steak and cook until browned. Remove steak and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add onions, carrots, potatoes, and garlic. Cook until vegetables are softened.
3. Stir in tomato paste, diced tomatoes, Guinness Lager, beef stock, and dried rosemary. Return steak to the pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for about 1.5 hours, until steak is tender.
4. While the stew is simmering, preheat your oven to 450 degrees F. In a bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and chopped rosemary leaves. Stir in buttermilk and melted butter until a dough forms.
5. Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet. Bake for about 10-12 minutes, until biscuits are golden brown.
6. Serve the stew with rosemary biscuits on top."

input: Ingredients: water, wonton wrappers, garlic cloves, water chestnuts, drained and chopped, peeled fresh ginger, chinese cabbage, low sodium soy sauce, cooking spray, dipping sauces, lean ground pork, green onions, dark sesame oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chinese Pork and Water Chestnut Wontons

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of water
- 24 wonton wrappers
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- 1/2 cup of water chestnuts, drained and chopped
- 1 tablespoon of peeled fresh ginger, minced
- 1 cup of Chinese cabbage, chopped
- 2 tablespoons of low sodium soy sauce
- Cooking spray
- Dipping sauces of your choice
- 1/2 pound of lean ground pork
- 1/4 cup of green onions, chopped
- 1 tablespoon of dark sesame oil

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the ground pork, water chestnuts, garlic, ginger, Chinese cabbage, green onions, soy sauce, and sesame oil. Mix until well combined.
2. Lay out the wonton wrappers on a clean surface. Spoon about 1 tablespoon of the pork mixture into the center of each wrapper.
3. Moisten the edges of the wonton wrapper with water, then fold the wrapper over the filling to form a triangle. Press the edges to seal.
4. Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling.
5. Spray a large skillet with cooking spray and heat over medium heat.
6. Add the wontons in batches and cook until golden brown on the bottom, about 1-2 minutes.
7. Add 1/4 cup of water to the skillet, cover, and let the wontons steam until the water has evaporated and the bottoms of the wontons are crisp again, about 2-3 minutes.
8. Repeat with the remaining wontons.
9. Serve the wontons hot with your choice of dipping sauces."

input: Ingredients: pico de gallo, cheese slices, refried beans, chorizo, french bread. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chorizo and Bean French Bread Pizza

Ingredients:
- 1 cup pico de gallo
- 8 slices of cheese
- 1 cup refried beans
- 1/2 pound chorizo
- 1 loaf of French bread

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Cut the French bread in half lengthwise and place it on a baking sheet.
3. Spread the refried beans evenly over the cut sides of the French bread.
4. Cook the chorizo in a skillet over medium heat until it's fully cooked, then drain the excess fat.
5. Spread the cooked chorizo evenly over the refried beans on the French bread.
6. Place the cheese slices evenly over the chorizo.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove from the oven and top with the pico de gallo.
9. Cut into slices and serve."

input: Ingredients: pepper, dried mint flakes, salt, dried oregano, tomatoes, ground black pepper, garlic, dried dillweed, olive oil, red wine, lamb, plain yogurt, pita bread rounds, purple onion, cucumber. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Greek Lamb Pita Sandwiches with Yogurt Sauce

Ingredients:
- 1 lb lamb, cut into thin strips
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1/2 teaspoon dried mint flakes
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1/4 cup red wine
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tomatoes, sliced
- 1 purple onion, thinly sliced
- 1 cucumber, sliced
- 4 pita bread rounds
- 1 cup plain yogurt
- 1/2 teaspoon dried dillweed

Instructions:
1. Season the lamb with salt, ground black pepper, dried oregano, and dried mint flakes.
2. Heat the olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the seasoned lamb and garlic. Cook until the lamb is browned.
3. Pour the red wine into the pan and let it simmer until the wine has mostly evaporated.
4. In the meantime, prepare the yogurt sauce by mixing the plain yogurt with dried dillweed.
5. Warm the pita bread rounds in the oven or on a dry pan.
6. To assemble the sandwiches, spread some yogurt sauce on each pita bread round. Add the cooked lamb, sliced tomatoes, sliced purple onion, and sliced cucumber.
7. Fold the pita bread rounds in half and serve the Greek Lamb Pita Sandwiches with extra yogurt sauce on the side."

input: Ingredients: sesame oil, water, soy sauce, kale. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sesame Soy Sautéed Kale

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons of sesame oil
- 1/4 cup of water
- 2 tablespoons of soy sauce
- 1 bunch of kale

Instructions:
1. Rinse the kale thoroughly and remove the stems. Tear the leaves into bite-sized pieces.
2. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
3. Add the kale to the skillet and sauté for about 5 minutes, until it starts to wilt.
4. Add the water to the skillet, cover, and let the kale steam for about 5 more minutes.
5. Remove the cover and stir in the soy sauce. Continue to sauté for another 2-3 minutes, until the kale is tender and the water has evaporated.
6. Serve the sesame soy sautéed kale warm."

input: Ingredients: water, Mexican beer, corn tortillas, chipotle chile, lime wedges, salsa, canola oil, boneless beef short ribs, garlic, chopped cilantro, white onion, guajillo, yellow onion, ground cumin. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Beef Short Rib Tacos

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of water
- 1 bottle of Mexican beer
- 12 corn tortillas
- 1 chipotle chile, finely chopped
- 2 lime wedges
- 1 cup of salsa
- 2 tablespoons of canola oil
- 2 pounds of boneless beef short ribs
- 3 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1/2 cup of chopped cilantro
- 1 white onion, chopped
- 2 guajillo chiles, seeds removed
- 1 yellow onion, chopped
- 1 teaspoon of ground cumin

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, heat the canola oil over medium heat. Add the beef short ribs and brown on all sides. Remove from the pot and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the white and yellow onions, garlic, chipotle chile, and guajillo chiles. Cook until the onions are translucent.
3. Return the beef to the pot and add the ground cumin. Stir to coat the beef in the spices.
4. Pour in the Mexican beer and water. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 2 hours, or until the beef is tender.
5. Once the beef is cooked, remove it from the pot and shred it using two forks.
6. Warm the corn tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat.
7. To serve, place some of the shredded beef on a tortilla, top with salsa, chopped cilantro, and a squeeze of lime from the lime wedges. Repeat with the remaining tortillas."

input: Ingredients: saffron threads, ground black pepper, dry bread crumbs, fresh lemon juice, water, crushed red pepper, chopped onion, ground cumin, fresh spinach, dry sherry, chickpeas, fresh parsley, olive oil, salt, garlic cloves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Saffron Chickpea and Spinach Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 pinch of saffron threads
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 1/2 cup of dry bread crumbs
- 2 tablespoons of fresh lemon juice
- 2 cups of water
- 1/2 teaspoon of crushed red pepper
- 1 cup of chopped onion
- 1 teaspoon of ground cumin
- 4 cups of fresh spinach
- 1/4 cup of dry sherry
- 2 cans (15 ounces each) of chickpeas, drained and rinsed
- 1/4 cup of fresh parsley, chopped
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 3 garlic cloves, minced

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, cook until they become soft and fragrant.
2. Add the ground cumin, crushed red pepper, ground black pepper, and saffron threads to the pot. Stir well to combine with the onions and garlic.
3. Pour in the dry sherry, stir well, and let it simmer for a couple of minutes until the alcohol evaporates.
4. Add the chickpeas to the pot, followed by the water. Stir well, then cover the pot and let it simmer for about 15 minutes.
5. After 15 minutes, add the fresh spinach to the pot. Stir well until the spinach wilts into the stew.
6. Add the dry bread crumbs to the pot, stirring well to combine. The bread crumbs will help to thicken the stew.
7. Stir in the fresh lemon juice, chopped fresh parsley, and salt. Let the stew simmer for another 5 minutes.
8. Taste the stew and adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve hot."

input: Ingredients: swiss chard, diced tomatoes, chopped onion, pepper, banana squash, garlic, italian seasoning, grated parmesan cheese, vegetable broth, bay leaf, olive oil, cannellini beans, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Swiss Chard and Banana Squash Soup

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of swiss chard, chopped
- 1 can (14.5 oz) of diced tomatoes
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon of pepper
- 1 medium banana squash, peeled and cubed
- 3 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 teaspoon of Italian seasoning
- 1/2 cup of grated parmesan cheese
- 4 cups of vegetable broth
- 1 bay leaf
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1 can (15 oz) of cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the pot and sauté until the onion is translucent.
3. Add the cubed banana squash to the pot and cook for about 5 minutes, until it starts to soften.
4. Add the diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, bay leaf, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper to the pot. Bring the mixture to a boil.
5. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and let the soup simmer for about 20 minutes, until the squash is tender.
6. Add the chopped swiss chard and cannellini beans to the pot. Let the soup simmer for another 5 minutes, until the chard is wilted and the beans are heated through.
7. Remove the bay leaf from the soup.
8. Serve the soup hot, topped with the grated parmesan cheese."

input: Ingredients: shortening, butter, honey, salt, milk, buttermilk, eggs, baking powder, all-purpose flour. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Honey Buttermilk Biscuits

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup of shortening
- 1/4 cup of butter
- 1/4 cup of honey
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 cup of milk
- 1/2 cup of buttermilk
- 2 eggs
- 1 tablespoon of baking powder
- 2 1/2 cups of all-purpose flour

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. In a large bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. Cut in the shortening and butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, buttermilk, honey, and eggs.
5. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until a dough forms.
6. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead gently until smooth.
7. Roll the dough out to a 1-inch thickness and cut with a biscuit cutter.
8. Place the biscuits onto a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown.
9. Serve warm with additional honey, if desired."

input: Ingredients: ground black pepper, fresh parsley, fat free less sodium chicken broth, salt, capers, balsamic vinegar, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, fresh lemon juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Lemon Balsamic Chicken with Capers and Parsley

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped
- 1 cup fat free less sodium chicken broth
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 2 tablespoons capers, drained
- 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar
- 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice

Instructions:
1. Season the chicken breast halves with salt and ground black pepper.
2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Add the chicken to the skillet and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-7 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the chicken broth, balsamic vinegar, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil.
6. Reduce the heat to low and add the capers. Simmer for about 5 minutes.
7. Return the chicken to the skillet and simmer in the sauce for another 5-7 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
8. Sprinkle the fresh parsley over the chicken just before serving."

input: Ingredients: pepper, salt, jalapeno chilies, canola oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Jalapeno Pepper Saute

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon of pepper
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 4 jalapeno chilies
- 2 tablespoons of canola oil

Instructions:
1. Wash the jalapeno chilies thoroughly under running water.
2. Slice the jalapeno chilies into thin rounds. Be careful while handling the chilies to avoid any skin irritation.
3. Heat the canola oil in a pan over medium heat.
4. Once the oil is hot, add the sliced jalapeno chilies to the pan.
5. Saute the chilies for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally to ensure they cook evenly.
6. Sprinkle the salt and pepper over the sauteed chilies.
7. Continue to saute for another 2 minutes, until the chilies are well coated with the salt and pepper.
8. Remove the pan from the heat. The Spicy Jalapeno Pepper Saute is ready to serve."

input: Ingredients: 2% reduced-fat milk, corn starch, eggs, maple syrup, sugar, margarine, vanilla extract. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Maple Custard Pudding

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of 2% reduced-fat milk
- 3 tablespoons of corn starch
- 2 large eggs
- 1/2 cup of maple syrup
- 1/4 cup of sugar
- 2 tablespoons of margarine
- 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract

Instructions:
1. In a medium saucepan, combine the sugar and corn starch. Gradually whisk in the milk until smooth.
2. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture comes to a boil. Boil for 1 minute, then remove from heat.
3. In a separate bowl, lightly beat the eggs. Gradually whisk in about 1 cup of the hot milk mixture to temper the eggs.
4. Pour the egg mixture back into the saucepan with the remaining milk mixture, whisking constantly.
5. Return the saucepan to the heat and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture comes to a boil. Boil for 1 minute, then remove from heat.
6. Stir in the margarine, maple syrup, and vanilla extract until the margarine is melted and the mixture is smooth.
7. Pour the pudding into a serving dish or individual serving dishes. Cover with plastic wrap, pressing the wrap directly onto the surface of the pudding to prevent a skin from forming.
8. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or until set, before serving."

input: Ingredients: Franks Hot Sauce, salt, shredded cheddar cheese, chicken, pepper, sour cream, black beans, green onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chicken and Black Bean Bake

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of shredded chicken
- 1 cup of Franks Hot Sauce
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 teaspoon of pepper
- 2 cups of shredded cheddar cheese
- 1 cup of sour cream
- 1 can (15 oz) of black beans, drained and rinsed
- 1/2 cup of chopped green onions

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. In a large bowl, combine the shredded chicken, Franks Hot Sauce, salt, and pepper. Mix until the chicken is well coated.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the black beans and half of the green onions.
4. Spread half of the chicken mixture in a baking dish. Layer it with half of the black bean mixture and then half of the shredded cheese.
5. Repeat the layers with the remaining chicken, black beans, and cheese.
6. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake for 20 minutes.
7. Remove the foil and bake for another 10 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and slightly browned.
8. Let the dish cool for a few minutes, then top with sour cream and the remaining green onions before serving."

input: Ingredients: heavy cream, pears, unsalted butter, sour cream, sugar, confectioners sugar, light pancake syrup, puff pastry. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Pear Puff Pastry

Ingredients:
- 1 cup heavy cream
- 4 ripe pears
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter
- 1/2 cup sour cream
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 1/4 cup confectioners sugar
- 1/4 cup light pancake syrup
- 1 sheet puff pastry

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 

2. Roll out the puff pastry on a lightly floured surface to fit a 9-inch pie dish. Press the pastry into the dish and trim any overhanging edges.

3. Peel the pears, remove the cores, and slice them thinly. Arrange the pear slices on top of the puff pastry.

4. In a small saucepan, melt the unsalted butter over medium heat. Add the sugar and stir until it dissolves. Pour this mixture over the pears in the pie dish.

5. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the pastry is golden and the pears are tender.

6. While the pastry is baking, whip the heavy cream until soft peaks form. Add the sour cream and continue to whip until well combined.

7. Once the pastry is done, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes. Drizzle the light pancake syrup over the top.

8. Just before serving, dust the top of the pastry with the confectioners sugar and serve with the whipped cream mixture on the side."

input: Ingredients: fish sauce, apple cider vinegar, fat, mushroom powder, salt, water, garlic, bone in chicken thighs, black peppercorns, fresh bay leaves, coconut aminos. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Savory Mushroom Chicken Thighs in Coconut Amino Sauce

Ingredients:
- 4 bone-in chicken thighs
- 2 tablespoons of fish sauce
- 1/4 cup of apple cider vinegar
- 2 tablespoons of fat (like olive oil or coconut oil)
- 1 tablespoon of mushroom powder
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 cup of water
- 3 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 teaspoon of black peppercorns
- 2 fresh bay leaves
- 1/4 cup of coconut aminos

Instructions:
1. Heat the fat in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Season the chicken thighs with salt and mushroom powder.
3. Add the chicken thighs to the skillet and cook until browned on both sides, about 5 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken thighs from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
6. Add the fish sauce, apple cider vinegar, water, black peppercorns, and bay leaves to the skillet. Stir to combine.
7. Return the chicken thighs to the skillet, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes.
8. After 20 minutes, turn the chicken thighs over, cover again, and simmer for another 20 minutes.
9. After the chicken has cooked, remove the cover and stir in the coconut aminos. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
10. Serve the chicken thighs hot, with the sauce spooned over the top."

input: Ingredients: black beans, flour tortillas, diced tomatoes, fresh cilantro, chili powder, red bell pepper, cooked rice, olive oil, sea salt, onions, lime juice, jalapeno chilies, garlic cloves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Black Bean and Rice Burritos

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of black beans
- 8 flour tortillas
- 1 cup of diced tomatoes
- 1/2 cup of fresh cilantro, chopped
- 1 tablespoon of chili powder
- 1 red bell pepper, diced
- 2 cups of cooked rice
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1 teaspoon of sea salt
- 2 onions, chopped
- 2 tablespoons of lime juice
- 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and minced
- 3 garlic cloves, minced

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onions, red bell pepper, jalapeno chilies, and garlic. Cook until the vegetables are soft, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the black beans, diced tomatoes, chili powder, and sea salt to the skillet. Stir well to combine.
3. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and let the mixture simmer for 15 minutes.
4. Stir in the cooked rice, lime juice, and fresh cilantro. Cook for another 5 minutes, until the rice is heated through.
5. Warm the flour tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat, turning them once.
6. Spoon about 1/2 cup of the bean and rice mixture onto the center of each tortilla. Fold the sides of the tortilla in, then roll it up from the bottom to enclose the filling.
7. Serve the burritos warm. Enjoy your Spicy Black Bean and Rice Burritos!"

input: Ingredients: cilantro, enchilada sauce, taco seasoning mix, skinless chicken breasts, tomatoes, garlic, flour tortillas, shredded cheese. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cheesy Chicken Enchiladas

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup of cilantro
- 2 cups of enchilada sauce
- 1 packet of taco seasoning mix
- 4 skinless chicken breasts
- 2 tomatoes
- 2 cloves of garlic
- 8 flour tortillas
- 2 cups of shredded cheese

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. Place the chicken breasts in a saucepan, cover with water, and bring to a boil. Cook for 20 minutes or until no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove from the saucepan, drain, and shred.
3. In a large skillet, sauté the garlic until it's golden brown. Add the shredded chicken, taco seasoning mix, and diced tomatoes. Stir well to combine and cook for 5 minutes.
4. Pour 1 cup of enchilada sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. On each flour tortilla, place an equal portion of the chicken mixture and 1/4 cup of shredded cheese. Roll the tortillas and place them seam side down in the baking dish.
6. Pour the remaining enchilada sauce over the top of the enchiladas and sprinkle with the remaining shredded cheese.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and lightly browned.
8. Garnish with cilantro before serving."

input: Ingredients: light sour cream, ground black pepper, pecorino romano cheese, large egg whites, large eggs, salt, olive oil, mushrooms, fava beans, finely chopped fresh parsley, fresh tarragon. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Fava Bean and Mushroom Frittata with Pecorino Romano

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup light sour cream
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 cup grated pecorino romano cheese
- 4 large egg whites
- 4 large eggs
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 cups sliced mushrooms
- 2 cups shelled fava beans
- 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh parsley
- 2 tablespoons chopped fresh tarragon

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. Heat the olive oil in a large, oven-safe skillet over medium heat. Add the mushrooms and cook until they are browned and have released their liquid, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the fava beans to the skillet and cook for another 2 minutes.
4. In a large bowl, whisk together the large eggs, large egg whites, light sour cream, salt, and ground black pepper.
5. Pour the egg mixture over the mushrooms and fava beans in the skillet. Sprinkle the pecorino romano cheese evenly over the top.
6. Place the skillet in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the eggs are set and the cheese is lightly browned.
7. Remove the skillet from the oven and let the frittata cool for a few minutes. Sprinkle the chopped fresh parsley and tarragon over the top before serving."

input: Ingredients: pepper, green onions, cilantro leaves, canola oil, kidney beans, purple onion, whole kernel corn, drain, lime, yellow bell pepper, chickpeas, black beans, orzo pasta, salt, red bell pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Colorful Orzo and Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon of pepper
- 1 cup of chopped green onions
- 1/2 cup of chopped cilantro leaves
- 2 tablespoons of canola oil
- 1 can (15 ounces) of kidney beans, drained and rinsed
- 1 medium purple onion, finely chopped
- 1 can (15 ounces) of whole kernel corn, drained
- Juice of 1 lime
- 1 large yellow bell pepper, diced
- 1 can (15 ounces) of chickpeas, drained and rinsed
- 1 can (15 ounces) of black beans, drained and rinsed
- 2 cups of orzo pasta
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 large red bell pepper, diced

Instructions:
1. Cook the orzo pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large bowl, combine the kidney beans, chickpeas, black beans, and corn.
3. Add the diced red and yellow bell peppers, and the chopped purple onion to the bowl.
4. Add the cooked and drained orzo pasta to the bowl and mix well.
5. In a small bowl, whisk together the canola oil, lime juice, salt, and pepper to create a dressing.
6. Pour the dressing over the pasta and bean mixture. Toss well to ensure everything is evenly coated.
7. Add the chopped green onions and cilantro leaves to the salad and mix well.
8. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate for an hour before serving to allow the flavors to meld together."

input: Ingredients: pork, dri leav thyme, garlic, water, onions, white vinegar, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Garlic Thyme Pork with Onion Vinegar Sauce

Ingredients:
- 1 kg pork
- 2 teaspoons dried thyme leaves
- 4 cloves garlic
- 1 cup water
- 2 medium onions
- 1/2 cup white vinegar
- 1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. Clean the pork and pat it dry. 
2. Rub the pork with salt and dried thyme leaves. 
3. Mince the garlic and rub it onto the pork as well. Let it marinate for at least 30 minutes.
4. Place the marinated pork in a pot, add the water, and bring it to a boil. 
5. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 1 hour until the pork is tender.
6. While the pork is cooking, slice the onions and place them in a bowl. 
7. Pour the white vinegar over the onions and let them sit for about 30 minutes.
8. Once the pork is cooked, remove it from the pot and let it rest for a few minutes.
9. Serve the pork with the onion vinegar sauce on top. Enjoy your Garlic Thyme Pork with Onion Vinegar Sauce."

input: Ingredients: salt, granulated sugar, eggs, grated lemon zest, cake flour. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Lemon Zest Sponge Cake

Ingredients:
- 1/4 teaspoon of salt
- 1 cup of granulated sugar
- 4 large eggs
- 2 tablespoons of grated lemon zest
- 2 cups of cake flour

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 
2. In a large bowl, combine the eggs and granulated sugar. Beat them together until they are light and fluffy.
3. Add the grated lemon zest to the egg and sugar mixture. Stir until it is evenly distributed throughout the mixture.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the cake flour and salt. Stir them together until they are thoroughly mixed.
5. Gradually add the flour mixture to the egg mixture. Stir them together until they are just combined. Be careful not to overmix.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured cake pan.
7. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and allow it to cool completely on a wire rack."

input: Ingredients: wasabi, soy sauce, seaweed, jumbo shrimp, salt, red bell pepper, avocado, sticky rice, cucumber, sugar, rice vinegar, white sesame seeds. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Shrimp Sushi Rolls with Wasabi Soy Sauce

Ingredients:
- 2 teaspoons wasabi
- 1/4 cup soy sauce
- 10 sheets seaweed (nori)
- 20 jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced
- 1 ripe avocado, thinly sliced
- 2 cups sticky rice, uncooked
- 1 cucumber, thinly sliced
- 2 tablespoons sugar
- 1/4 cup rice vinegar
- 2 tablespoons white sesame seeds

Instructions:
1. Cook the sticky rice according to the package instructions.
2. While the rice is cooking, boil the jumbo shrimp in salted water until they turn pink. Drain and set aside.
3. In a small bowl, mix the rice vinegar and sugar until the sugar is dissolved. Once the rice is cooked, gently fold in the vinegar mixture. Allow the rice to cool.
4. Lay out a sheet of seaweed on a bamboo sushi mat. Wet your hands and spread a thin layer of rice on the seaweed, leaving about 1 inch free at the top.
5. Lay a few slices of cucumber, red bell pepper, avocado, and 2 shrimp along the bottom third of the rice.
