11. Arrange the slices cut-side down on the baking sheet and bake for another 10-15 minutes, or until crisp and golden.

12. Let the biscotti cool completely before serving. Enjoy with a cup of coffee or tea."

input: Ingredients: water, green onions, galangal, fish sauce, peanuts, thai chile, chopped cilantro fresh, kaffir lime leaves, lemongrass, lime wedges, medium shrimp, straw mushrooms, chili paste, fresh lime juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Thai Shrimp and Mushroom Soup

Ingredients:
- 4 cups of water
- 2 green onions, chopped
- 1 piece of galangal (2-inch), thinly sliced
- 2 tablespoons of fish sauce
- 1/4 cup of peanuts, crushed
- 2 Thai chiles, chopped
- 1/4 cup of fresh cilantro, chopped
- 4 kaffir lime leaves, torn into pieces
- 2 stalks of lemongrass, cut into 2-inch pieces and crushed
- 2 lime wedges
- 1 pound of medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1 cup of straw mushrooms, halved
- 1 tablespoon of chili paste
- 2 tablespoons of fresh lime juice

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, bring the water to a boil.
2. Add the galangal, kaffir lime leaves, and lemongrass to the boiling water. Simmer for 15 minutes.
3. Add the shrimp and straw mushrooms to the pot. Cook until the shrimp turns pink, about 3-5 minutes.
4. Stir in the fish sauce, chili paste, and fresh lime juice.
5. Add the Thai chiles and simmer for another 2 minutes.
6. Serve the soup hot, garnished with green onions, crushed peanuts, and fresh cilantro. Offer lime wedges on the side for squeezing."

input: Ingredients: green bell pepper, kidney beans, extra-virgin olive oil, vidalia, ground black pepper, salt, sugar, sherry vinegar, garlic, haricots verts, sweet onion, wax beans. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Three-Bean Salad with Vidalia and Sweet Onion Vinaigrette

Ingredients:
- 1 green bell pepper
- 1 can (15 ounces) kidney beans
- 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 vidalia
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 teaspoon sugar
- 2 tablespoons sherry vinegar
- 2 cloves garlic
- 1 cup haricots verts
- 1 sweet onion
- 1 cup wax beans

Instructions:
1. Rinse and drain the kidney beans. Set aside.
2. Cut the green bell pepper, vidalia, and sweet onion into thin slices.
3. Mince the garlic cloves.
4. In a large bowl, combine the sliced green bell pepper, vidalia, sweet onion, and minced garlic.
5. Add the kidney beans, haricots verts, and wax beans to the bowl.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together the extra-virgin olive oil, sherry vinegar, salt, sugar, and ground black pepper to make the vinaigrette.
7. Pour the vinaigrette over the vegetables and beans in the large bowl.
8. Toss everything together until well combined.
9. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld together."

input: Ingredients: pepper, garlic, eggs, grated parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, prosciutto, salt, romano cheese, ricotta cheese. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Prosciutto and Three Cheese Egg Bake

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon of pepper
- 2 cloves of garlic
- 6 eggs
- 1/2 cup of grated parmesan cheese
- 1/4 cup of fresh parsley
- 8 slices of prosciutto
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 cup of romano cheese
- 1 cup of ricotta cheese

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.

2. Finely chop the garlic and fresh parsley, set aside.

3. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, salt, and pepper.

4. Add the ricotta cheese to the egg mixture and whisk until well combined.

5. Stir in the grated parmesan cheese and romano cheese.

6. Fold in the chopped garlic and fresh parsley.

7. Grease a baking dish and line the bottom with the slices of prosciutto.

8. Pour the egg and cheese mixture over the prosciutto.

9. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the eggs are set and the top is golden brown.

10. Let the egg bake cool for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: chicken broth, dried basil, salt, cooked shrimp, ground cumin, sugar, diced tomatoes, crabmeat, dried oregano, green chile, flour tortillas, all-purpose flour, onions, pepper, garlic, sour cream, shredded Monterey Jack cheese. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Seafood Enchiladas with Spicy Tomato Sauce

Ingredients:
- 2 cups chicken broth
- 1 teaspoon dried basil
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 pound cooked shrimp
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon sugar
- 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes
- 1 pound crabmeat
- 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1 green chile, diced
- 8 flour tortillas
- 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup sour cream
- 2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2. In a large skillet over medium heat, sauté onions, garlic, and green chile until softened.
3. Stir in flour, salt, pepper, dried basil, dried oregano, and ground cumin. Cook for 2 minutes.
4. Add diced tomatoes, chicken broth, and sugar. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 5 minutes.
5. Stir in cooked shrimp and crabmeat. Cook until heated through, about 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat.
6. Spoon about 1/3 cup of the seafood mixture down the center of each tortilla. Sprinkle with a little cheese, then roll up and place seam side down in a greased 13x9-in. baking dish.
7. Pour the remaining seafood mixture over the top of the tortillas in the dish. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese.
8. Bake, uncovered, for 20-25 minutes or until bubbly and golden brown.
9. Serve hot with a dollop of sour cream on top. Enjoy your Seafood Enchiladas with Spicy Tomato Sauce!"

input: Ingredients: sugar, fresh cilantro, hoisin sauce, butter, crushed red pepper flakes, strawberries, ground coriander, red bell pepper, adobo sauce, green peppercorns, kosher salt, salted butter, chives, sea salt, extra-virgin olive oil, taco seasoning, pork loin chops, chipotle peppers, chorizo sausage, blueberri preserv, orange, ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar, basil, garlic, filet, thyme leaves, chipotles in adobo, unsweetened cocoa powder, black pepper, honey, boneless skinless chicken breasts, heavy cream, cracked black pepper, coffee beans, garlic cloves, steak, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chipotle Pork Chops with Strawberry Salsa

Ingredients:
- 4 pork loin chops
- 2 tablespoons of taco seasoning
- 1 tablespoon of adobo sauce
- 2 chipotle peppers, finely chopped
- 1 tablespoon of extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 red bell pepper, finely chopped
- 1 cup of strawberries, finely chopped
- 1 tablespoon of fresh cilantro, finely chopped
- 1 tablespoon of honey
- 1 tablespoon of balsamic vinegar
- 1/2 teaspoon of crushed red pepper flakes
- 1/2 teaspoon of kosher salt
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper

Instructions:
1. Preheat your grill or stovetop grill pan over medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, combine the taco seasoning, adobo sauce, and chopped chipotle peppers. Rub this mixture all over the pork chops.
3. Drizzle the olive oil over the pork chops and place them on the grill. Cook for about 5-7 minutes on each side, or until the internal temperature reaches 145 degrees F.
4. While the pork chops are cooking, prepare the strawberry salsa. In a medium bowl, combine the chopped red bell pepper, strawberries, cilantro, honey, balsamic vinegar, crushed red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and ground black pepper. Stir until well combined.
5. Once the pork chops are done, remove them from the grill and let them rest for a few minutes.
6. Serve the pork chops with the strawberry salsa on top. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: tumeric, vegan margarine, cardamom pods, onions, coriander seeds, raisins, carrots, cashew nuts, fresh cilantro, chili powder, garlic cloves, frozen peas, clove, quinoa, vegetable broth, cinnamon sticks, ground cumin. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spiced Quinoa with Vegetables and Nuts

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon tumeric
- 2 tablespoons vegan margarine
- 3 cardamom pods
- 2 medium onions, chopped
- 1 teaspoon coriander seeds
- 1/2 cup raisins
- 2 medium carrots, chopped
- 1/2 cup cashew nuts
- 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon chili powder
- 3 garlic cloves, minced
- 1 cup frozen peas
- 1 clove
- 1 cup quinoa
- 2 cups vegetable broth
- 2 cinnamon sticks
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin

Instructions:
1. Heat the vegan margarine in a large pan over medium heat.
2. Add the onions, garlic, cardamom pods, clove, and coriander seeds. Sauté until the onions are translucent.
3. Stir in the tumeric, chili powder, and ground cumin.
4. Add the carrots and sauté for another 5 minutes.
5. Rinse the quinoa under cold water and drain. Add it to the pan and stir well to coat with the spices.
6. Pour in the vegetable broth, add the cinnamon sticks, and bring to a boil.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and let it simmer for 15 minutes.
8. Stir in the frozen peas and raisins, then cover and cook for another 5 minutes, or until the quinoa is cooked and all the liquid is absorbed.
9. In the meantime, toast the cashew nuts in a dry pan until golden brown.
10. Remove the cinnamon sticks, cardamom pods, and clove from the pan.
11. Fluff the quinoa with a fork, then stir in the toasted cashew nuts and fresh cilantro.
12. Serve the spiced quinoa hot."

input: Ingredients: soy sauce, bay leaves, pork shoulder, water, salt, chicken, pepper, garlic, onions, vinegar, oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Soy-Braised Pork Shoulder and Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1.5 lbs pork shoulder
- 1.5 lbs chicken
- 1 cup soy sauce
- 2 bay leaves
- 2 cups water
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 teaspoon pepper
- 4 cloves garlic
- 2 onions
- 1/2 cup vinegar
- 2 tablespoons oil

Instructions:
1. Cut the pork shoulder and chicken into chunks.
2. Peel and chop the onions and garlic.
3. Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat.
4. Add the pork shoulder and chicken to the pot and brown on all sides.
5. Remove the meat from the pot and set aside.
6. In the same pot, add the onions and garlic and sauté until they become translucent.
7. Add the soy sauce, vinegar, water, bay leaves, salt, and pepper to the pot and stir.
8. Return the pork shoulder and chicken to the pot.
9. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 1.5 hours, or until the meat is tender.
10. Check the pot occasionally and add more water if needed.
11. Once the meat is tender, remove the bay leaves.
12. Serve the Soy-Braised Pork Shoulder and Chicken hot."

input: Ingredients: kosher salt, butter, garlic, dry white wine, extra-virgin olive oil, parsley leaves, lemon, shrimp, black pepper, shallots, linguine. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Shrimp Linguine in Garlic White Wine Sauce

Ingredients:
- 1 lb linguine
- 2 tablespoons kosher salt
- 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 lb shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 shallots, finely chopped
- 1 cup dry white wine
- 4 tablespoons unsalted butter
- 1 lemon, juiced
- 1/2 cup parsley leaves, chopped

Instructions:
1. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add the kosher salt and linguine. Cook according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. While the pasta is cooking, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the shrimp and season with black pepper. Cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes on each side. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and chopped shallots. Sauté until they become translucent, about 2-3 minutes.
4. Pour the dry white wine into the skillet. Let it simmer and reduce to half, about 5 minutes.
5. Add the butter to the skillet and stir until it melts into the wine sauce.
6. Return the cooked shrimp to the skillet. Add the lemon juice and half of the chopped parsley leaves. Stir to combine.
7. Add the cooked linguine to the skillet. Toss until the pasta is fully coated in the sauce.
8. Serve the shrimp linguine in garlic white wine sauce garnished with the remaining parsley leaves. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: water, fresh lemon juice, fresh raspberries, sugar. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Raspberry Lemonade

Ingredients:
- 4 cups of water
- 1 cup of fresh lemon juice
- 2 cups of fresh raspberries
- 1 cup of sugar

Instructions:
1. In a small saucepan, combine sugar and 1 cup of water. Bring to boil and stir to dissolve sugar. Allow to cool to room temperature, then cover and refrigerate until chilled.
2. In a blender, blend raspberries until smooth. Strain them to remove seeds.
3. In a large pitcher, stir together chilled syrup, lemon juice, and remaining 3 cups of water.
4. Add the strained raspberry puree into the pitcher and stir well.
5. Serve the raspberry lemonade chilled."

input: Ingredients: frozen whole kernel corn, wish bone guacamol ranch dress, black beans, purple onion, grape tomatoes, jalapeno chilies, chopped cilantro fresh, lime juice, torn romain lettuc leav. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Southwest Corn and Black Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cups frozen whole kernel corn
- 1/2 cup Wish-Bone Guacamole Ranch Dressing
- 1 can (15 oz) black beans
- 1/2 cup chopped purple onion
- 1 cup halved grape tomatoes
- 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and finely chopped
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
- 2 tablespoons lime juice
- 4 cups torn romaine lettuce leaves

Instructions:
1. Thaw the frozen corn at room temperature.
2. Rinse and drain the black beans.
3. In a large bowl, combine the thawed corn, black beans, chopped purple onion, halved grape tomatoes, and chopped jalapeno chilies.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together the Wish-Bone Guacamole Ranch Dressing and lime juice.
5. Pour the dressing mixture over the corn and bean mixture. Toss to coat all the ingredients well.
6. Add the chopped fresh cilantro to the salad and mix well.
7. Just before serving, add the torn romaine lettuce leaves to the salad and toss gently to combine.
8. Serve the salad immediately or refrigerate it for up to 2 hours before serving."

input: Ingredients: eggs, russet potatoes, mexican chorizo, black beans, salsa, canola oil, colby cheese, black olives, sour cream, avocado, half & half, goat cheese. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chorizo and Potato Breakfast Skillet

Ingredients:
- 4 large eggs
- 2 russet potatoes
- 1 lb Mexican chorizo
- 1 cup black beans
- 1 cup salsa
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 1 cup shredded colby cheese
- 1/2 cup sliced black olives
- 1/2 cup sour cream
- 1 ripe avocado
- 1/4 cup half & half
- 1/2 cup crumbled goat cheese

Instructions:
1. Peel and dice the russet potatoes into 1/2 inch cubes.
2. Heat the canola oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the diced potatoes and cook until golden brown and crispy, about 10-15 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, cook the Mexican chorizo over medium heat until fully cooked, about 10 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside with the potatoes.
4. In the same skillet, add the black beans and cook until heated through, about 5 minutes.
5. Return the cooked potatoes and chorizo to the skillet with the black beans. Stir to combine.
6. Make four wells in the mixture and crack an egg into each well. Cover the skillet and cook until the eggs are done to your liking, about 5-7 minutes for runny yolks.
7. While the eggs are cooking, slice the avocado and set aside.
8. Once the eggs are cooked, top the skillet with the shredded colby cheese and crumbled goat cheese. Cover the skillet again until the cheese is melted, about 2-3 minutes.
9. Top the skillet with the sliced avocado, black olives, and salsa. Dollop the sour cream on top.
10. Serve the skillet hot, straight from the pan. Enjoy your Chorizo and Potato Breakfast Skillet!"

input: Ingredients: dry vermouth, flour, salt, canned low sodium chicken broth, ground black pepper, garlic, pinenuts, butter, chicken livers, olive oil, raisins, flat leaf parsley. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chicken Liver with Pinenuts and Raisins

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup dry vermouth
- 1/4 cup flour
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup canned low sodium chicken broth
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/4 cup pinenuts
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1 pound chicken livers
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1/4 cup raisins
- 1/4 cup chopped flat leaf parsley

Instructions:
1. Rinse the chicken livers and pat them dry. Season with salt and pepper.
2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken livers and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the butter and minced garlic. Cook until the garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute.
4. Add the flour to the skillet and stir until it's fully incorporated with the butter and garlic.
5. Slowly pour in the chicken broth and dry vermouth, stirring constantly to prevent lumps from forming.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer and let it cook for about 5 minutes, or until it has thickened slightly.
7. Return the chicken livers to the skillet and add the raisins. Let everything cook together for another 5 minutes.
8. In the meantime, toast the pinenuts in a separate, dry skillet over medium heat until they're golden brown, about 3 minutes.
9. Sprinkle the toasted pinenuts and chopped parsley over the chicken livers just before serving."

input: Ingredients: chicken stock, cilantro leaves, onions, quinoa, roasted salted cashews, chopped tomatoes, skinless chicken breasts, sunflower oil, curry paste. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Curried Chicken Quinoa with Cashews

Ingredients:
- 4 cups chicken stock
- 1 cup cilantro leaves
- 2 medium onions
- 1 cup quinoa
- 1 cup roasted salted cashews
- 2 cups chopped tomatoes
- 4 skinless chicken breasts
- 2 tablespoons sunflower oil
- 3 tablespoons curry paste

Instructions:
1. Rinse the quinoa under cold water until the water runs clear. 
2. In a large saucepan, bring the chicken stock to a boil. Add the rinsed quinoa to the boiling stock, reduce the heat to low, cover and let it simmer for 15 minutes or until the quinoa is cooked and all the liquid is absorbed. 
3. While the quinoa is cooking, heat the sunflower oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onions and sauté until they become translucent.
4. Add the curry paste to the onions and stir well, cooking for another 2 minutes.
5. Add the skinless chicken breasts to the skillet and cook for about 7-10 minutes on each side, or until the chicken is cooked through and no longer pink in the middle.
6. Add the chopped tomatoes to the skillet and cook for another 5 minutes, until the tomatoes are soft.
7. Once the quinoa is cooked, fluff it with a fork and add it to the skillet, mixing well with the other ingredients.
8. Stir in the roasted salted cashews and cook for another 2 minutes.
9. Serve the curried chicken quinoa with cashews hot, garnished with cilantro leaves."

input: Ingredients: cream, baby spinach, ghee, tumeric, fresh lemon, fine sea salt, toasted sesame seeds, fresh ginger, buttermilk, onions, plain yogurt, spices, garlic cloves, paneer cheese. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Spinach and Paneer Curry

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of cream
- 200 grams of baby spinach
- 2 tablespoons of ghee
- 1 teaspoon of turmeric
- Juice of 1 fresh lemon
- 1 teaspoon of fine sea salt
- 1 tablespoon of toasted sesame seeds
- 1 tablespoon of grated fresh ginger
- 1/2 cup of buttermilk
- 2 medium onions, finely chopped
- 1/2 cup of plain yogurt
- 1 teaspoon of mixed spices (cumin, coriander, and garam masala)
- 3 garlic cloves, minced
- 200 grams of paneer cheese, cubed

Instructions:
1. Heat the ghee in a large pan over medium heat. Add the onions, garlic, and ginger, and sauté until the onions are translucent.
2. Add the turmeric, mixed spices, and sea salt to the pan, stirring well to combine with the onions.
3. Add the baby spinach to the pan and cook until wilted. 
4. Add the cream, buttermilk, and plain yogurt to the pan, stirring well to combine. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
5. Add the paneer cheese to the pan, stirring gently to combine. Cover the pan and let it simmer for about 10 minutes, until the paneer is heated through.
6. Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the fresh lemon juice.
7. Sprinkle the toasted sesame seeds over the curry before serving."

input: Ingredients: garlic paste, flour tortillas, carrots, canola oil, lemon grass, roasted peanuts, toasted sesame oil, boneless chicken skinless thigh, seasoned rice wine vinegar, Thai fish sauce, light brown muscavado sugar, granulated sugar, english cucumber, coriander. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Thai Chicken Tacos with Peanut Sauce

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons garlic paste
- 8 small flour tortillas
- 2 medium carrots, julienned
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 2 stalks lemon grass, finely chopped
- 1/2 cup roasted peanuts, crushed
- 1 tablespoon toasted sesame oil
- 1 pound boneless chicken skinless thigh, cut into strips
- 2 tablespoons seasoned rice wine vinegar
- 2 tablespoons Thai fish sauce
- 2 tablespoons light brown muscavado sugar
- 1 tablespoon granulated sugar
- 1 english cucumber, thinly sliced
- 1/2 cup fresh coriander, chopped

Instructions:
1. Heat the canola oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the chicken strips and cook until browned and cooked through, about 7-10 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
2. In a small saucepan, combine the garlic paste, lemon grass, Thai fish sauce, muscavado sugar, granulated sugar, and rice wine vinegar. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring until the sugars are dissolved. Remove from heat and stir in the toasted sesame oil.
3. Warm the flour tortillas in a dry pan over medium heat, about 30 seconds per side.
4. To assemble the tacos, spread a spoonful of the garlic-lemon grass sauce on each tortilla. Top with the cooked chicken, cucumber slices, and julienned carrots. Sprinkle with crushed peanuts and fresh coriander.
5. Serve the Thai Chicken Tacos warm, with extra sauce on the side for dipping. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: chili paste, fish sauce, garlic cloves, sugar, fresh lime juice, warm water. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Thai Chili Fish Sauce

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons chili paste
- 1/4 cup fish sauce
- 2 garlic cloves
- 2 tablespoons sugar
- 1/4 cup fresh lime juice
- 1/4 cup warm water

Instructions:
1. Start by finely mincing the garlic cloves.
2. In a bowl, combine the minced garlic, chili paste, and sugar.
3. Add the fish sauce to the bowl and mix well until the sugar is dissolved.
4. Pour in the fresh lime juice and warm water, then stir until all ingredients are well combined.
5. Let the sauce sit for a few minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Before serving, give the sauce a good stir to ensure all the ingredients are well distributed. This sauce can be used as a dipping sauce or a marinade for meats and vegetables."

input: Ingredients: collard greens, butter, fillets, parsley, white wine vinegar, cajun seasoning, yellow onion, cheddar cheese, garlic, grits. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cajun Fillets with Cheesy Grits and Collard Greens

Ingredients:
- 4 fillets
- 1 bunch of collard greens
- 2 tablespoons of butter
- 1 tablespoon of parsley, chopped
- 2 tablespoons of white wine vinegar
- 2 teaspoons of cajun seasoning
- 1 large yellow onion, chopped
- 1 cup of cheddar cheese, shredded
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 cup of grits

Instructions:

1. Season the fillets with the cajun seasoning and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, melt 1 tablespoon of butter over medium heat. Add the fillets and cook for about 4-5 minutes on each side or until done. Remove from the skillet and keep warm.
3. In the same skillet, add the remaining butter and the chopped onion. Cook until the onion is translucent.
4. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and cook for another minute.
5. Add the collard greens to the skillet and cook until they start to wilt. Add the white wine vinegar, stir, and continue to cook until the greens are tender.
6. While the greens are cooking, bring 4 cups of water to a boil in a separate pot. Slowly stir in the grits, reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook for about 5 minutes or until the grits are thickened.
7. Stir in the shredded cheddar cheese until it's fully melted into the grits.
8. Serve the cooked fillets over the cheesy grits, topped with the collard greens. Sprinkle with chopped parsley before serving."

input: Ingredients: black pepper, low sodium chicken broth, salt, ground cumin, avocado, hominy, diced tomatoes, oregano, boneless center cut pork chops, radishes, garlic, canola oil, celery ribs, lime, chili powder, chopped onion. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Pork and Hominy Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon black pepper
- 4 cups low sodium chicken broth
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 ripe avocado, sliced
- 2 cans (15 oz each) hominy, drained
- 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes
- 1 teaspoon oregano
- 4 boneless center cut pork chops, cut into 1-inch pieces
- 4 radishes, sliced
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 2 celery ribs, chopped
- 1 lime, cut into wedges
- 1 tablespoon chili powder
- 1 large onion, chopped

Instructions:
1. Season the pork chops with salt, black pepper, and cumin.
2. Heat the canola oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the pork chops and cook until browned on all sides. Remove the pork from the pot and set aside.
3. In the same pot, add the chopped onion, minced garlic, and chopped celery. Cook until the vegetables are softened.
4. Add the chili powder and oregano to the pot and stir well.
5. Add the diced tomatoes, hominy, and chicken broth to the pot. Bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Return the pork to the pot. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 1 hour.
7. Serve the stew in bowls, topped with sliced radishes and avocado. Squeeze a wedge of lime over each serving."

input: Ingredients: pepper, salt, pork tenderloin, salsa. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Salsa Pork Tenderloin

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon of pepper
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 pound of pork tenderloin
- 1 cup of salsa

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Season the pork tenderloin with the salt and pepper, ensuring it's evenly coated.
3. Place the seasoned pork tenderloin in a baking dish.
4. Pour the salsa over the pork tenderloin, making sure it's fully covered.
5. Put the baking dish in the preheated oven and bake for 45-60 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through.
6. Remove the dish from the oven and let the pork rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving."

input: Ingredients: shell-on shrimp, salt, chipotle chile, worcestershire sauce, unsalted butter, dry red wine, large garlic cloves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chipotle Shrimp in Red Wine Sauce

Ingredients:
- 1 lb shell-on shrimp
- 1 tsp salt
- 1 chipotle chile, finely chopped
- 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce
- 4 tbsp unsalted butter
- 1 cup dry red wine
- 4 large garlic cloves, minced

Instructions:

1. Rinse the shrimp under cold water and pat dry with paper towels. Sprinkle with salt and set aside.

2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and chopped chipotle chile, sauté until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes.

3. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they turn pink, about 2-3 minutes per side. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.

4. Pour the red wine and Worcestershire sauce into the skillet. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer until the sauce is reduced by half, about 10-15 minutes.

5. Return the shrimp to the skillet and toss to coat in the sauce. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the shrimp are heated through.

6. Serve the shrimp hot, with the red wine and chipotle sauce spooned over the top."

input: Ingredients: fish sauce, steamed white rice, scallions, minced garlic, vegetable oil, caramel sauce, chili pepper, shallots, corn starch, chicken stock, fresh ginger, boneless skinless chicken. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Caramel Chicken with Steamed Rice

Ingredients:
- 1 lb boneless skinless chicken
- 1 cup steamed white rice
- 2 tablespoons fish sauce
- 2 scallions, chopped
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 1/4 cup caramel sauce
- 1 chili pepper, chopped
- 2 shallots, chopped
- 1 tablespoon corn starch
- 1 cup chicken stock
- 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated

Instructions:
1. Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
2. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat.
3. Add the chicken to the pan and cook until browned on all sides.
4. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
5. In the same pan, add the shallots, garlic, and ginger. Cook until fragrant.
6. Add the chili pepper to the pan and cook for another minute.
7. In a small bowl, mix the corn starch with a little bit of chicken stock to create a slurry.
8. Add the remaining chicken stock, fish sauce, and caramel sauce to the pan. Bring to a simmer.
9. Stir in the corn starch slurry and continue to simmer until the sauce has thickened.
10. Return the chicken to the pan and toss to coat in the sauce.
11. Serve the chicken over the steamed rice and garnish with the chopped scallions."

input: Ingredients: seasoned bread crumbs, grated parmesan cheese, salt, fresh parsley, chicken broth, minced garlic, half & half, shredded mozzarella cheese, frozen chopped spinach, pepper, flour, penne pasta, black pepper, large eggs, butter, ground beef. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spinach and Beef Baked Penne

Ingredients:
- 1 cup seasoned bread crumbs
- 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped
- 1 cup chicken broth
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 1 cup half & half
- 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
- 1 package (10 ounces) frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 2 tablespoons flour
- 1 pound penne pasta
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 2 large eggs
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1 pound ground beef

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2. Cook penne pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain.
3. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the ground beef, salt, and black pepper. Cook until the beef is browned.
4. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and cook for another minute.
5. Sprinkle the flour over the beef and stir until evenly coated. Cook for another minute.
6. Slowly whisk in the chicken broth and half & half. Bring to a simmer and cook until the sauce has thickened, about 2-3 minutes.
7. Remove from heat and stir in the spinach, parsley, and half of the parmesan cheese.
8. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs. Add the cooked pasta to the eggs and toss to coat.
9. Add the beef and spinach mixture to the pasta and stir to combine.
10. Pour half of the pasta mixture into a baking dish. Sprinkle half of the mozzarella cheese and half of the bread crumbs over the pasta.
11. Repeat with the remaining pasta, mozzarella cheese, and bread crumbs.
12. Sprinkle the remaining parmesan cheese over the top.
13. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
14. Let the pasta stand for 5 minutes before serving. Enjoy your Spinach and Beef Baked Penne!"

input: Ingredients: bean threads, sesame seeds, carrots, safflower oil, mushrooms, onions, sugar, cayenne, toasted sesame oil, reduced sodium tamari, black pepper, baby spinach, chopped garlic. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Bean Thread Stir-Fry with Vegetables

Ingredients:
- 200g bean threads
- 2 tablespoons sesame seeds
- 2 medium carrots
- 2 tablespoons safflower oil
- 200g mushrooms
- 2 medium onions
- 1 tablespoon sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon cayenne
- 1 tablespoon toasted sesame oil
- 3 tablespoons reduced sodium tamari
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 200g baby spinach
- 2 cloves chopped garlic

Instructions:
1. Soak the bean threads in warm water for 15 minutes, then drain and set aside.
2. Peel and slice the carrots into thin strips. Slice the mushrooms and onions.
3. Heat the safflower oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the chopped garlic and sauté until fragrant.
4. Add the onions to the pan and sauté until they become translucent.
5. Add the carrots and mushrooms to the pan and stir-fry for about 5 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
6. Add the sugar, cayenne, black pepper, and tamari to the pan. Stir well to combine.
7. Add the soaked and drained bean threads to the pan. Stir well to combine and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
8. Add the baby spinach and cook just until wilted.
9. Drizzle the toasted sesame oil over the stir-fry and sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving."

input: Ingredients: saffron threads, red wine vinegar, large shrimp, mayonaise, garlic cloves, capers, cayenne pepper, roasted red peppers, sourdough baguette. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Shrimp and Roasted Red Pepper Sourdough Sandwich

Ingredients:
- 1 pinch of saffron threads
- 2 tablespoons of red wine vinegar
- 1 pound of large shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1/2 cup of mayonnaise
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- 2 tablespoons of capers, drained
- 1/2 teaspoon of cayenne pepper
- 1 cup of roasted red peppers, sliced
- 1 sourdough baguette

Instructions:
1. In a small bowl, soak the saffron threads in the red wine vinegar for about 10 minutes.
2. In a large pan, cook the shrimp over medium heat until they turn pink. This should take about 2-3 minutes per side. Remove the shrimp from the pan and set them aside.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the mayonnaise, minced garlic, capers, and cayenne pepper. Stir in the saffron and vinegar mixture.
4. Slice the sourdough baguette in half lengthwise. Spread the mayonnaise mixture evenly over both halves of the baguette.
5. Arrange the cooked shrimp and sliced roasted red peppers on one half of the baguette. Top with the other half of the baguette.
6. Cut the sandwich into individual servings and serve immediately. Enjoy your Spicy Shrimp and Roasted Red Pepper Sourdough Sandwich!"

input: Ingredients: fennel seeds, liquorice, ginger, green cardamom, cinnamon sticks, water, szechwan peppercorns, garlic, scallions, beef, chinese black bean, cooking wine, dried chile, rock sugar, bean paste, star anise, brown cardamom, bay leaf. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Szechwan Beef Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 tsp fennel seeds
- 1 piece of liquorice (about 1 inch)
- 1 piece of ginger (about 2 inches)
- 3 green cardamom pods
- 2 cinnamon sticks
- 4 cups of water
- 1 tsp szechwan peppercorns
- 3 cloves of garlic
- 2 scallions
- 1 lb beef, cut into chunks
- 1/4 cup chinese black beans
- 1/4 cup cooking wine
- 2 dried chiles
- 2 pieces of rock sugar (about 1 inch each)
- 2 tbsp bean paste
- 2 star anise
- 2 brown cardamom pods
- 1 bay leaf

Instructions:
1. Rinse the beef chunks and pat dry. Set aside.
2. In a large pot, add the fennel seeds, liquorice, ginger, green cardamom, cinnamon sticks, szechwan peppercorns, garlic, star anise, brown cardamom, and bay leaf. Dry roast these ingredients over medium heat for about 2 minutes until fragrant.
3. Add the beef chunks to the pot and sear on all sides until browned.
4. Add the Chinese black beans, cooking wine, dried chiles, rock sugar, and bean paste to the pot. Stir well to combine.
5. Pour in the water and bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 2 hours until the beef is tender.
7. Chop the scallions and sprinkle them over the stew before serving. Enjoy your Spicy Szechwan Beef Stew."

input: Ingredients: pepper, garlic cloves, onions, salt, leg of lamb, pearl barley, celery, parsley, carrots. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Lamb and Barley Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon of pepper
- 4 garlic cloves
- 2 medium onions
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 leg of lamb (about 2 kg)
- 1 cup of pearl barley
- 3 celery stalks
- 1/4 cup of chopped parsley
- 4 medium carrots

Instructions:
1. Chop the onions, celery, and carrots into small pieces. Mince the garlic cloves.
2. Cut the leg of lamb into 1-inch cubes, removing any excess fat.
3. In a large pot, add the lamb cubes and season with salt and pepper. Cook over medium heat until browned on all sides. Remove the lamb and set aside.
4. In the same pot, add the onions, garlic, celery, and carrots. Cook until the onions are translucent.
5. Rinse the pearl barley under cold water and add it to the pot. Stir well.
6. Return the lamb to the pot and add enough water to cover the ingredients. Bring to a boil.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 1.5 hours, or until the lamb and barley are tender.
8. Stir in the chopped parsley and cook for another 5 minutes.
9. Taste and adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve hot."

input: Ingredients: red kidney beans, bay leaves, salt, ground cumin, garam masala, ginger, onions, coriander powder, garlic, ground turmeric, tomatoes, chili powder, oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Kidney Bean Curry

Ingredients:
- 2 cups red kidney beans
- 2 bay leaves
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon garam masala
- 1 tablespoon grated ginger
- 2 medium onions, finely chopped
- 1 teaspoon coriander powder
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric
- 2 medium tomatoes, chopped
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 2 tablespoons oil

Instructions:
1. Soak the red kidney beans in water overnight. Drain the water the next day.
2. Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the bay leaves and sauté for a few seconds.
3. Add the chopped onions to the pan and sauté until they turn golden brown.
4. Add the minced garlic and grated ginger to the pan and sauté for another minute.
5. Add the ground cumin, coriander powder, ground turmeric, chili powder, and garam masala to the pan. Stir well and cook for a minute.
6. Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan and cook until they become soft.
7. Add the soaked and drained kidney beans to the pan. Add salt and mix well.
8. Add enough water to cover the beans, bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and let it simmer for about 40 minutes or until the beans are cooked and the curry has thickened.
9. Check the seasoning and add more salt if needed. Remove the bay leaves before serving."

input: Ingredients: chicken stock, water, cornflour, fillets, soy sauce, spring onions, white wine vinegar, bamboo shoots, eggs, fresh ginger root, garlic, chillies, fresh coriander, sesame oil, fresh mushrooms. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Ginger Chicken Stir Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 cups chicken stock
- 1 cup water
- 2 tablespoons cornflour
- 4 fillets
- 4 tablespoons soy sauce
- 4 spring onions
- 2 tablespoons white wine vinegar
- 1 cup bamboo shoots
- 2 eggs
- 2 inches fresh ginger root
- 2 cloves garlic
- 2 chillies
- 1 bunch fresh coriander
- 2 tablespoons sesame oil
- 2 cups fresh mushrooms

Instructions:
1. Cut the fillets into thin strips and set aside.
2. Finely chop the spring onions, garlic, chillies, and fresh ginger root.
3. In a bowl, whisk together the chicken stock, water, soy sauce, white wine vinegar, and cornflour until smooth.
4. Heat the sesame oil in a large wok or frying pan over medium-high heat.
5. Add the garlic, chillies, and ginger to the pan and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
6. Add the fillets to the pan and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until cooked through.
7. Add the mushrooms and bamboo shoots to the pan and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes.
8. Pour the chicken stock mixture into the pan and bring to a simmer.
9. Crack the eggs into the pan and stir quickly to scramble them among the other ingredients.
10. Continue to cook for another 2-3 minutes until the sauce has thickened.
11. Stir in the spring onions and fresh coriander, reserving some for garnish.
12. Serve the stir fry hot, garnished with the remaining spring onions and fresh coriander."

input: Ingredients: daikon, red radishes, green onions, ginger, chili flakes, sea salt, carrots, napa cabbage, garlic cloves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Homemade Spicy Kimchi

Ingredients:
- 1 medium-sized daikon
- 10 red radishes
- 4 green onions
- 2 tablespoons of grated ginger
- 1 tablespoon of chili flakes
- 2 tablespoons of sea salt
- 2 medium-sized carrots
- 1 head of napa cabbage
- 6 garlic cloves

Instructions:
1. Cut the napa cabbage into quarters, then chop into 2-inch wide pieces. Place the cabbage in a large bowl and sprinkle with the sea salt. Toss until the cabbage is coated with salt. Let it sit for 2 hours.
2. While the cabbage is salting, prepare the other vegetables. Peel and cut the daikon and carrots into matchstick pieces. Slice the red radishes and green onions thinly. Mince the garlic cloves.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the chili flakes and grated ginger to make a paste.
4. After 2 hours, rinse the cabbage under cold water 3 times to ensure it's well cleaned from the salt. Drain it well.
5. Combine the cabbage, daikon, carrots, radishes, green onions, garlic, and chili-ginger paste in a large mixing bowl. Mix everything together until the vegetables are well coated with the paste.
6. Pack the mixture tightly into a clean glass jar, pressing down until the brine rises to cover the vegetables, leaving at least 1 inch of space at the top.
7. Seal the jar and let it sit at room temperature for 1-5 days. You may see bubbles inside the jar and brine may seep out of the lid; place a bowl or plate under the jar to help catch any overflow.
8. Check the kimchi once a day, pressing down on the vegetables with a clean spoon to keep them submerged under the brine.
9. Taste the kimchi each day starting on day 2. The kimchi is ripe when the cabbage tastes tangy and flavorful. Once it's at a taste you like, store in the refrigerator. It will continue to ferment slowly in the fridge, getting more sour and tangy."

input: Ingredients: eggs, water, flour, corn starch, sugar, sesame seeds, vegetable oil, granulated garlic, milk, chicken breasts, toasted sesame oil, chicken broth, soy sauce, vinegar, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sesame Garlic Chicken

Ingredients:
- 2 large eggs
- 1/4 cup water
- 1 cup flour
- 1/2 cup corn starch
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 1/4 cup sesame seeds
- 1 cup vegetable oil
- 1 tablespoon granulated garlic
- 1/4 cup milk
- 4 chicken breasts
- 2 tablespoons toasted sesame oil
- 1/2 cup chicken broth
- 1/4 cup soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons vinegar
- 1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:

1. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and milk. Set aside.
2. In another bowl, mix together the flour, corn starch, and salt.
3. Dip each chicken breast into the egg mixture, then dredge in the flour mixture. Repeat this process for each chicken breast.
4. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Once the oil is hot, add the chicken breasts and cook until golden brown and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes on each side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the toasted sesame oil, granulated garlic, and sesame seeds. Cook for 1-2 minutes until the garlic is fragrant.
6. Add the chicken broth, soy sauce, sugar, and vinegar to the skillet. Stir well to combine and bring the mixture to a simmer.
7. Return the chicken to the skillet and coat with the sauce. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes, until the sauce has thickened.
8. Serve the chicken hot, garnished with additional sesame seeds if desired."

input: Ingredients: cauliflower, pepper, lemon, green chilies, ground cumin, garlic paste, chili powder, salt, carrots, tomatoes, capsicum, kasuri methi, cumin seed, beans, butter, cilantro leaves, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Vegetable Stir Fry

Ingredients and Required Amounts:
- 1 medium cauliflower
- 1 teaspoon pepper
- Juice of 1 lemon
- 2 green chilies
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 2 teaspoons garlic paste
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- Salt to taste
- 2 medium carrots
- 2 medium tomatoes
- 1 large capsicum
- 1 teaspoon kasuri methi
- 1 teaspoon cumin seeds
- 1 cup beans
- 2 tablespoons butter
- A handful of cilantro leaves
- 2 medium onions

Cooking Instructions:
1. Cut the cauliflower, carrots, capsicum, and beans into small pieces. Chop the onions, tomatoes, and green chilies.
2. Heat the butter in a large pan over medium heat. Add the cumin seeds and let them sizzle.
3. Add the chopped onions and green chilies to the pan. Sauté until the onions become translucent.
4. Add the garlic paste to the pan and stir well. Cook for a minute.
5. Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan. Cook until the tomatoes become soft.
6. Add the ground cumin, chili powder, and salt to the pan. Stir well to combine.
7. Add the chopped cauliflower, carrots, capsicum, and beans to the pan. Stir well to combine with the spices.
8. Cover the pan and let the vegetables cook for 10-15 minutes, or until they become soft.
9. Sprinkle the kasuri methi over the vegetables. Stir well to combine.
10. Squeeze the lemon juice over the vegetables. Stir well to combine.
11. Sprinkle the pepper over the vegetables. Stir well to combine.
12. Garnish the stir fry with the cilantro leaves.
13. Serve the Spicy Vegetable Stir Fry hot."

input: Ingredients: jack cheese, vegetables, dry white wine, lemon juice, arborio rice, olive oil, unsalted butter, ricotta, pepper, asparagus, yellow onion, frozen peas, reduced sodium chicken broth, prosciutto, salt, chopped fresh mint. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spring Vegetable Risotto with Prosciutto and Jack Cheese

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of Arborio rice
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1 yellow onion, finely chopped
- 1/2 cup of dry white wine
- 4 cups of reduced sodium chicken broth
- 1 cup of asparagus, chopped
- 1/2 cup of frozen peas
- 2 tablespoons of unsalted butter
- 1/2 cup of Jack cheese, grated
- 1/2 cup of ricotta
- 2 tablespoons of lemon juice
- 4 slices of prosciutto, chopped
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 2 tablespoons of chopped fresh mint

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until it becomes translucent.
2. Add the Arborio rice to the pan and stir until the grains are coated in oil and slightly toasted.
3. Pour in the dry white wine and stir until it is fully absorbed by the rice.
4. Begin adding the chicken broth, one cup at a time, stirring continuously until each cup is absorbed before adding the next.
5. After the second cup of broth has been absorbed, add the asparagus and frozen peas. Continue with the process of adding broth and stirring.
6. Once all the broth has been absorbed and the rice is tender, remove the pan from the heat.
7. Stir in the unsalted butter, grated Jack cheese, and ricotta until everything is well combined and creamy.
8. Add the lemon juice, chopped prosciutto, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well.
9. Garnish with the chopped fresh mint before serving. Enjoy your Spring Vegetable Risotto with Prosciutto and Jack Cheese!"

input: Ingredients: sugar, linguine, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, balsamic vinegar, oil, fresh basil, large garlic cloves, low salt chicken broth, olive oil, purple onion. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Balsamic Glazed Chicken Linguine

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon sugar
- 8 ounces linguine
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
- 1/4 cup balsamic vinegar
- 2 tablespoons oil
- 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped
- 2 large garlic cloves, minced
- 1 cup low salt chicken broth
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 large purple onion, thinly sliced

Instructions:

1. Cook the linguine according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.

2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.

3. In the same skillet, add the sliced purple onion and minced garlic. Cook until the onion is softened and the garlic is fragrant, about 5 minutes.

4. Add the balsamic vinegar, sugar, and chicken broth to the skillet. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer until the sauce is reduced by half, about 10 minutes.

5. Return the chicken to the skillet and coat it with the balsamic glaze. Continue to cook for a few more minutes, until the chicken is heated through.

6. Toss the cooked linguine with the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil and chopped fresh basil. 

7. Serve the glazed chicken over the linguine. Enjoy your Balsamic Glazed Chicken Linguine!"

input: Ingredients: chili oil, mung bean sprouts, light soy sauce, sesame paste, noodles, red chili peppers, peanut oil, ground beef, szechwan peppercorns, pickled vegetables. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Szechwan Beef Noodle Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons chili oil
- 2 cups mung bean sprouts
- 3 tablespoons light soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons sesame paste
- 200 grams noodles
- 2 red chili peppers, sliced
- 1 tablespoon peanut oil
- 500 grams ground beef
- 1 teaspoon szechwan peppercorns, crushed
- 1 cup pickled vegetables

Instructions:
1. Cook the noodles according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. Heat the peanut oil in a large wok or frying pan over medium heat.
3. Add the ground beef to the pan and cook until browned. Remove from the pan and set aside.
4. In the same pan, add the chili oil and szechwan peppercorns. Cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
5. Add the sliced red chili peppers to the pan and cook for another 2 minutes.
6. Return the ground beef to the pan and add the light soy sauce and sesame paste. Stir well to combine.
7. Add the cooked noodles to the pan and toss to combine with the beef and sauce.
8. Add the mung bean sprouts and pickled vegetables to the pan. Stir well to combine and cook for another 2-3 minutes until the sprouts are slightly wilted.
9. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with extra szechwan peppercorns if desired."

input: Ingredients: salt, jaggery, water, ground cardamom, oil, coconut, rice flour. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Coconut Jaggery Rice Flour Pancakes

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1 cup of jaggery
- 2 cups of water
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground cardamom
- 2 tablespoons of oil
- 1 cup of grated coconut
- 2 cups of rice flour

Instructions:

1. In a saucepan, add jaggery and water. Heat it over medium flame until the jaggery completely dissolves. Once dissolved, strain the mixture to remove any impurities and set it aside to cool.

2. In a large bowl, add rice flour, salt, and ground cardamom. Mix well.

3. Gradually add the jaggery water to the rice flour mixture while stirring continuously to avoid lumps. The batter should be of pouring consistency.

4. Add the grated coconut to the batter and mix well.

5. Heat a non-stick pan and grease it lightly with oil.

6. Pour a ladle full of batter onto the pan and spread it evenly to form a pancake.

7. Cook on medium flame until the bottom side turns golden brown. Drizzle some oil around the edges and flip the pancake.

8. Cook the other side until it turns golden brown.

9. Repeat the process with the remaining batter.

10. Serve the Coconut Jaggery Rice Flour Pancakes warm. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: firmly packed brown sugar, sweet potatoes, margarine, skim milk, salt, vegetable oil cooking spray, vanilla extract, chopped pecans, egg whites, all-purpose flour. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sweet Potato Pecan Pie

Ingredients:
- 1 cup firmly packed brown sugar
- 2 large sweet potatoes
- 1/4 cup margarine
- 1/2 cup skim milk
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- Vegetable oil cooking spray
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
- 1/2 cup chopped pecans
- 2 egg whites
- 1 cup all-purpose flour

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9-inch pie dish with vegetable oil cooking spray.

2. Peel the sweet potatoes, cut them into chunks, and boil them in a pot of water until they are soft and easily pierced with a fork, about 20 minutes. Drain the sweet potatoes and let them cool.

3. In a large bowl, mash the cooled sweet potatoes with the margarine until smooth. Stir in the brown sugar, skim milk, egg whites, and vanilla extract until well combined.

4. In a separate bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, salt, and chopped pecans. Stir this into the sweet potato mixture.

5. Pour the sweet potato mixture into the prepared pie dish. 

6. Bake in the preheated oven for about 40 minutes, or until the pie is set and lightly browned on top.

7. Allow the pie to cool before slicing and serving. Enjoy your Sweet Potato Pecan Pie!"

input: Ingredients: ground pork, spam, rice cakes, firm tofu, onions, water, Gochujang base, kimchi, green onions, sausages, chopped garlic. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Korean Stew with Pork and Tofu

Ingredients:
- 1 cup ground pork
- 1 can spam, diced
- 2 cups rice cakes
- 1 block firm tofu, cubed
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 4 cups water
- 3 tablespoons Gochujang base
- 1 cup kimchi, chopped
- 2 green onions, chopped
- 2 sausages, sliced
- 2 tablespoons chopped garlic

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, cook the ground pork over medium heat until browned. Remove from the pot and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the diced spam and sliced sausages. Cook until browned, then remove from the pot and set aside.
3. Add the chopped onion and garlic to the pot. Cook until the onion is translucent.
4. Add the Gochujang base to the pot and stir until the onion and garlic are coated.
5. Add the water to the pot and bring to a boil.
6. Once boiling, add the rice cakes, kimchi, and cooked pork, spam, and sausages to the pot. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
7. Add the cubed tofu to the pot and simmer for an additional 10 minutes.
8. Serve the stew hot, garnished with the chopped green onions."

input: Ingredients: oil, water, rice flour, tapioca starch. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Gluten-Free Rice and Tapioca Flatbread

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons of oil
- 1 cup of water
- 2 cups of rice flour
- 1 cup of tapioca starch

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine 2 cups of rice flour and 1 cup of tapioca starch. Mix well.
2. Gradually add 1 cup of water to the flour mixture, stirring continuously to avoid lumps.
3. Knead the mixture into a smooth dough. If the dough is too sticky, add a bit more rice flour. If it's too dry, add a bit more water.
4. Divide the dough into small balls, about the size of a golf ball.
5. Flatten each ball with your hands or a rolling pin to create a thin, round flatbread.
6. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
7. Cook each flatbread in the pan for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
8. Remove the flatbread from the pan and place it on a paper towel to remove excess oil.
9. Repeat the process with the remaining dough balls.
10. Serve the gluten-free rice and tapioca flatbread warm. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: chili, mayonaise, chopped onion, cider vinegar, fresh mint, cilantro leaves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Mint and Cilantro Chili Sauce

Ingredients:
- 1 chili
- 1/2 cup mayonnaise
- 1/4 cup chopped onion
- 2 tablespoons cider vinegar
- 1/4 cup fresh mint leaves
- 1/4 cup cilantro leaves

Instructions:
1. Remove the stem from the chili. If you prefer a milder sauce, remove the seeds as well.
2. Place the chili, chopped onion, fresh mint leaves, and cilantro leaves into a blender or food processor.
3. Blend until the ingredients are finely chopped.
4. Add the mayonnaise and cider vinegar to the blender.
5. Blend again until all the ingredients are well combined and the sauce is smooth.
6. Taste the sauce and adjust the flavors if necessary. If you want it to be spicier, add more chili. If it's too spicy, add more mayonnaise.
7. Once the sauce is to your liking, transfer it to a bowl or jar and refrigerate until ready to use. The flavors will continue to meld as the sauce chills."

input: Ingredients: ground pepper, dressing, sea salt, grapeseed oil, salad, tuna fillets. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Seared Tuna Salad with Grapeseed Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground pepper
- 1/4 cup of your favorite dressing
- 1/2 teaspoon of sea salt
- 2 tablespoons of grapeseed oil
- 4 cups of mixed salad greens
- 2 tuna fillets (6 ounces each)

Instructions:
1. Season the tuna fillets with the sea salt and ground pepper on both sides.
2. Heat the grapeseed oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Once the oil is hot, add the tuna fillets. Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side or until desired doneness.
4. While the tuna is cooking, toss the salad greens with the dressing in a large bowl.
5. Once the tuna is cooked, remove from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes.
6. Slice the tuna and place it on top of the dressed salad.
7. Serve immediately. Enjoy your Seared Tuna Salad with Grapeseed Dressing!"

input: Ingredients: eggs, garbanzo beans, rice, water, lemon, onions, ground cinnamon, olive oil, salt, saffron, pepper, flour, fresh parsley. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Saffron Rice with Garbanzo Beans and Fried Egg

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs
- 1 can (15 oz) garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
- 1 cup rice
- 2 cups water
- 1 lemon, juiced
- 1 large onion, finely chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon saffron threads
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 2 tablespoons flour
- 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped

Instructions:
1. Rinse the rice under cold water until the water runs clear. 
2. In a large saucepan, bring the 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the rice, salt, and saffron threads. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and let it simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the water is absorbed.
3. While the rice is cooking, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until it becomes translucent.
4. Add the garbanzo beans, ground cinnamon, and pepper to the pan with the onions. Cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and flour together until smooth. Heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil in a separate frying pan over medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook until the bottom is set, then flip and cook the other side. This should make a thin omelette.
6. Once the rice is done, fluff it with a fork and mix in the lemon juice.
7. To serve, place a portion of the saffron rice on a plate, top it with the garbanzo bean mixture, and then the thin omelette. Sprinkle with fresh parsley. Repeat with the remaining servings."

input: Ingredients: ground cinnamon, lamb neck fillets, tomatoes, chopped parsley, paprika. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spiced Lamb Neck with Tomato and Parsley

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 4 lamb neck fillets
- 4 large tomatoes
- 1/4 cup chopped parsley
- 1 teaspoon paprika

Instructions:
1. Season the lamb neck fillets with the ground cinnamon, paprika, salt, and pepper. Ensure all sides of the fillets are well coated.
2. Heat a large pan over medium heat. Add the lamb neck fillets and cook for about 5-7 minutes on each side, or until they are browned and cooked to your desired level.
3. While the lamb is cooking, chop the tomatoes into small pieces.
4. Once the lamb is cooked, remove it from the pan and set it aside to rest.
5. In the same pan, add the chopped tomatoes. Cook them over medium heat until they become soft and start to break down, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the chopped parsley to the pan with the tomatoes, stirring well to combine.
7. Slice the rested lamb neck fillets and serve them on top of the tomato and parsley mixture. Enjoy your Spiced Lamb Neck with Tomato and Parsley."

input: Ingredients: eggplant, low sodium chicken broth, fresh basil leaves, pepper, grated parmesan cheese, goat cheese, zucchini, salt, polenta, water, bell pepper, olive oil cooking spray. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Grilled Vegetable Polenta Stacks

Ingredients:
- 1 large eggplant, sliced into 1/2 inch rounds
- 1 large zucchini, sliced into 1/2 inch rounds
- 1 large bell pepper, cut into 1 inch pieces
- 1 cup of polenta
- 4 cups of low sodium chicken broth
- 1 cup of water
- 1/2 cup of grated parmesan cheese
- 1/2 cup of goat cheese
- 1/4 cup of fresh basil leaves, chopped
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Olive oil cooking spray

Instructions:
1. Preheat your grill to medium heat and lightly oil the grates with olive oil cooking spray.
2. Season the eggplant, zucchini, and bell pepper with salt and pepper.
3. Place the vegetables on the grill and cook for about 5 minutes on each side, or until they are tender and have grill marks. Remove from the grill and set aside.
4. In a large saucepan, bring the chicken broth and water to a boil. Slowly whisk in the polenta, reduce the heat to low, and cook, stirring frequently, for about 15 minutes, or until the polenta is thick and creamy.
5. Stir in the parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper.
6. Spray a round or square baking dish with olive oil cooking spray. Spread half of the polenta in the bottom of the dish. Layer half of the grilled vegetables on top, then sprinkle with half of the goat cheese and half of the basil. Repeat with the remaining polenta, vegetables, goat cheese, and basil.
7. Place the baking dish on the grill, cover, and cook for about 10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove from the grill and let sit for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy your Grilled Vegetable Polenta Stacks!"

input: Ingredients: sugar, water, cauliflower florets, chili sauce, sweet chili sauce, maida flour, salt, oil, soy sauce, spring onions, garlic, green chilies, white vinegar, black pepper, ginger, tomato ketchup, corn starch. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sweet and Spicy Cauliflower Stir Fry

Ingredients:
- 1 large cauliflower, cut into florets
- 1 cup maida flour
- 1/2 cup corn starch
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1 cup water
- 2 tablespoons oil
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 inch ginger, minced
- 2 green chilies, chopped
- 2 spring onions, chopped
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons sweet chili sauce
- 1 tablespoon chili sauce
- 1 tablespoon tomato ketchup
- 1 tablespoon white vinegar
- 1 tablespoon sugar

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, mix maida flour, corn starch, salt, and black pepper. Gradually add water and stir until a smooth batter is formed.
2. Dip the cauliflower florets into the batter, ensuring they are fully coated.
3. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the battered cauliflower florets and fry until golden brown. Remove from the pan and set aside.
4. In the same pan, add more oil if needed. Add the minced garlic, ginger, and chopped green chilies. Sauté until fragrant.
5. Add the chopped spring onions to the pan and sauté for another minute.
6. In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, sweet chili sauce, chili sauce, tomato ketchup, white vinegar, and sugar. Stir until well combined.
7. Pour the sauce mixture into the pan and stir well. Allow it to simmer for a few minutes until the sauce thickens slightly.
8. Add the fried cauliflower florets back into the pan. Toss until all the florets are coated with the sauce.
9. Serve the Sweet and Spicy Cauliflower Stir Fry hot, garnished with additional spring onions if desired."

input: Ingredients: Old El Pasoâ„¢ mild red enchilada sauce, Pillsburyâ„¢ Refrigerated Crescent Dinner Rolls, Mexican cheese blend, cooked chicken, refrigerated crescent rolls, red enchilada sauce, cooked chicken, Mexican cheese blend. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cheesy Chicken Enchilada Crescent Rolls

Ingredients:
- 1 can (10 oz) Old El Paso™ mild red enchilada sauce
- 2 cans (8 oz each) Pillsbury™ Refrigerated Crescent Dinner Rolls
- 2 cups Mexican cheese blend
- 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded
- 1 can (10 oz) red enchilada sauce
- 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded
- 2 cups Mexican cheese blend

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C). 
2. Open the cans of Pillsbury™ Refrigerated Crescent Dinner Rolls. Unroll the dough and separate into triangles.
3. In a bowl, mix together the shredded chicken, 1 cup of the Mexican cheese blend, and half of the Old El Paso™ mild red enchilada sauce.
4. Spoon a portion of the chicken mixture onto the wide end of each triangle. Roll the dough up towards the point, enclosing the chicken mixture inside.
5. Place the filled crescent rolls on a baking sheet, point side down.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown.
7. While the rolls are baking, heat the remaining enchilada sauce in a saucepan over medium heat.
8. Remove the rolls from the oven and drizzle with the heated enchilada sauce. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top.
9. Return the rolls to the oven for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the Cheesy Chicken Enchilada Crescent Rolls hot. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: jumbo shrimp, sea scallops, grate lime peel, olive oil, chopped onion, chopped cilantro, bottled clam juice, white hominy, sun-dried tomatoes in oil, salsa verde, garlic cloves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Seafood Hominy Stew with Salsa Verde

Ingredients:
- 1 lb jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1 lb sea scallops
- 1 tablespoon grated lime peel
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 cup chopped onion
- 1/2 cup chopped cilantro
- 2 cups bottled clam juice
- 1 can (15 oz) white hominy, drained
- 1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained and chopped
- 1 cup salsa verde
- 3 garlic cloves, minced

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, cook until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the sun-dried tomatoes and cook for another 2 minutes.
3. Pour in the clam juice, increase the heat to high and bring to a boil.
4. Add the white hominy and salsa verde to the pot, reduce the heat to low, cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Season the shrimp and scallops with salt and pepper. Add them to the pot, cover and cook until the seafood is cooked through, about 5 minutes.
6. Stir in the chopped cilantro and grated lime peel.
7. Serve the stew hot, garnished with extra cilantro if desired."

input: Ingredients: baking powder, salt, vegetable oil, warm water, all-purpose flour. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Basic Homemade Bread

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon of baking powder
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1/4 cup of vegetable oil
- 1 cup of warm water
- 3 cups of all-purpose flour

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, baking powder, and salt.
2. Make a well in the center of the flour mixture. Pour the vegetable oil and warm water into the well.
3. Stir the mixture until a dough starts to form. If the dough is too sticky, add a bit more flour. If it's too dry, add a bit more water.
4. Once the dough is formed, knead it on a lightly floured surface for about 10 minutes, or until it becomes smooth and elastic.
5. Shape the dough into a loaf and place it on a baking sheet.
6. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
7. Bake the loaf for about 30-35 minutes, or until it's golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
8. Let the bread cool before slicing and serving."

input: Ingredients: baking soda, cake flour, baking powder, all-purpose flour, unsalted butter, salt, sugar, buttermilk. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Buttermilk Biscuits

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon of baking soda
- 2 cups of cake flour
- 1 tablespoon of baking powder
- 1 cup of all-purpose flour
- 1/2 cup of unsalted butter
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 2 tablespoons of sugar
- 1 cup of buttermilk

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the cake flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and sugar.
3. Cut the butter into small pieces and add it to the flour mixture. Use your fingers to rub the butter into the flour until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Pour in the buttermilk and stir until just combined. Do not overmix.
5. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead it gently a few times until it comes together.
6. Pat the dough into a rectangle about 1 inch thick. Fold it in half, turn it 90 degrees, and pat it out again. Repeat this process 3 more times.
7. Cut the dough into rounds using a biscuit cutter or the rim of a glass.
8. Place the biscuits on a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes, or until golden brown.
9. Remove the biscuits from the oven and let them cool slightly before serving."

input: Ingredients: water, green onions, corn starch, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, granulated sugar, unsalted dry roast peanuts, toasted sesame oil, fresh ginger, dry sherry, dried red chile peppers, canola oil, cooked brown rice, reduced sodium soy sauce, rice vinegar, bok choy. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry with Bok Choy and Brown Rice

Ingredients:
- 1 cup water
- 4 green onions, chopped
- 2 tablespoons corn starch
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-sized pieces
- 2 tablespoons granulated sugar
- 1/2 cup unsalted dry roast peanuts
- 1 tablespoon toasted sesame oil
- 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced
- 2 tablespoons dry sherry
- 2 dried red chile peppers, crushed
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 2 cups cooked brown rice
- 1/4 cup reduced sodium soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons rice vinegar
- 2 cups bok choy, chopped

Instructions:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, sherry, water, sugar, and corn starch until smooth. Set aside.
2. Heat the canola oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the sesame oil and ginger. Cook for 1 minute until fragrant. Add the crushed red chile peppers and cook for another minute.
4. Add the bok choy to the skillet and cook until it begins to wilt, about 2-3 minutes.
5. Return the chicken to the skillet. Stir in the soy sauce mixture and bring to a simmer. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the sauce has thickened.
6. Stir in the peanuts and green onions, cooking for another minute.
7. Serve the stir-fry over the cooked brown rice, drizzling any extra sauce on top. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: large eggs, sauce, cajun seasoning, shrimp, vegetable oil, fry mix, milk, yellow mustard. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cajun Shrimp Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 large eggs
- 1 cup of sauce (of your choice)
- 2 tablespoons of cajun seasoning
- 1 pound of shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 2 cups of vegetable oil
- 1 cup of fry mix
- 1/2 cup of milk
- 1 tablespoon of yellow mustard

Instructions:
1. In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and yellow mustard until well combined.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the fry mix and cajun seasoning.
3. Dip each shrimp into the egg mixture, then dredge in the fry mix mixture, making sure each shrimp is fully coated.
4. Heat the vegetable oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat.
5. Once the oil is hot, add the shrimp in batches, frying each batch for about 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
6. Use a slotted spoon to remove the shrimp from the oil and drain on paper towels.
7. Serve the fried shrimp with the sauce on the side for dipping."

input: Ingredients: jumbo shrimp, baguette, extra-virgin olive oil, freshly ground pepper, saffron threads, ground cloves, dry white wine, salt, onions, tomatoes, bottled clam juice, paprika, cayenne pepper, orange zest, mayonaise, fennel, garlic, fresh lemon juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Saffron Shrimp and Fennel Stew with Spicy Aioli

Ingredients:
- 1 lb jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1 baguette, sliced
- 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
- 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper
- 1/4 teaspoon saffron threads
- 1/4 teaspoon ground cloves
- 1 cup dry white wine
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 onions, chopped
- 2 tomatoes, chopped
- 1 cup bottled clam juice
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper
- 1 teaspoon orange zest
- 1/2 cup mayonnaise
- 1 fennel bulb, chopped
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice

Instructions:
1. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onions, fennel, and garlic. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Stir in the tomatoes, clam juice, white wine, saffron, cloves, paprika, cayenne pepper, and salt. Bring to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes.
3. Add the shrimp to the pot and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 5 minutes.
4. While the stew is cooking, mix the mayonnaise, lemon juice, orange zest, and remaining olive oil in a small bowl. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Toast the baguette slices and spread a generous amount of the aioli on each slice.
6. Serve the stew hot, garnished with the aioli-topped baguette slices."

input: Ingredients: garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, ground cumin, spinach, greens, extra-virgin olive oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spinach and Greens with Cumin-Garlic Tomatoes

Ingredients:
- 4 garlic cloves
- 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 2 cups spinach
- 2 cups mixed greens
- 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil

Instructions:
1. Heat the extra-virgin olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the garlic cloves to the skillet and sauté until they are golden brown.
3. Stir in the ground cumin and cook for another minute.
4. Add the diced tomatoes to the skillet, stir well, and let it simmer for about 5 minutes.
5. Add the spinach and mixed greens to the skillet. Stir until the greens are wilted and fully coated with the tomato mixture.
6. Remove from heat and serve immediately."

input: Ingredients: chicken broth, white wine, zucchini, salted roast peanuts, peanut oil, soy sauce, salt and ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, rice vinegar, red bell pepper, white vinegar, ketchup, chili paste, sesame oil, onion tops, cooked white rice, brown sugar, water, green onions, garlic, corn starch. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Peanut Chicken Stir Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts
- 1 cup chicken broth
- 1/2 cup white wine
- 1 zucchini
- 1/2 cup salted roast peanuts
- 2 tablespoons peanut oil
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- Salt and ground black pepper to taste
- 1 tablespoon rice vinegar
- 1 red bell pepper
- 1 tablespoon white vinegar
- 2 tablespoons ketchup
- 1 tablespoon chili paste
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 1/4 cup chopped onion tops
- 2 cups cooked white rice
- 2 tablespoons brown sugar
- 1/4 cup water
- 2 green onions
- 2 cloves garlic
- 2 tablespoons corn starch

Instructions:
1. Cut the chicken breasts into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper.
2. Heat the peanut oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add the garlic and green onions. Cook until fragrant.
4. Add the red bell pepper and zucchini to the pan and cook until tender.
5. In a separate bowl, combine the chicken broth, white wine, soy sauce, rice vinegar, white vinegar, ketchup, chili paste, sesame oil, and brown sugar. Stir until well combined.
6. In a small bowl, mix the corn starch with the water until smooth. Add this to the sauce mixture and stir well.
7. Pour the sauce into the pan with the vegetables. Bring to a simmer and cook until the sauce has thickened.
8. Add the cooked chicken back into the pan and stir to coat with the sauce.
9. Serve the stir fry over the cooked white rice. Top with the salted roast peanuts and chopped onion tops."

input: Ingredients: catfish fillets, garlic powder, lemon, creole seasoning, eggs, flour, hot sauce, mustard, cooking oil, paprika, cornmeal, black pepper, onion powder, cayenne pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Creole Catfish Fry

Ingredients:
- 4 catfish fillets
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1 lemon
- 2 tablespoons creole seasoning
- 2 eggs
- 1 cup flour
- 2 tablespoons hot sauce
- 1 tablespoon mustard
- 1 cup cooking oil
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- 1 cup cornmeal
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1 teaspoon onion powder
- 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper

Instructions:
1. Rinse the catfish fillets and pat dry. Set aside.
2. In a shallow dish, combine the flour, cornmeal, creole seasoning, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, black pepper, and cayenne pepper. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs. Add the hot sauce and mustard, and mix until well combined.
4. Dip each catfish fillet into the egg mixture, then dredge in the flour and cornmeal mixture, making sure the fillet is completely coated. Set aside.
5. Heat the cooking oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
6. Once the oil is hot, add the catfish fillets. Cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until the fish is golden brown and flakes easily with a fork.
7. Remove the catfish from the skillet and drain on paper towels.
8. Cut the lemon into wedges and serve with the fried catfish. Enjoy your Spicy Creole Catfish Fry!"

input: Ingredients: sugar, large egg yolks, grated lemon peel, rhubarb, cream, salt, ground cinnamon, golden brown sugar, all-purpose flour, sliced almonds, unsalted butter. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Rhubarb and Almond Tart with Lemon Cream

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of sugar
- 4 large egg yolks
- 1 tablespoon of grated lemon peel
- 4 cups of rhubarb, chopped
- 1 cup of cream
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground cinnamon
- 1/2 cup of golden brown sugar
- 2 cups of all-purpose flour
- 1/2 cup of sliced almonds
- 1 cup of unsalted butter

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 

2. In a large bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup of sugar, and salt. Cut in the unsalted butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. 

3. Press the mixture into the bottom of a 9-inch tart pan. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, or until lightly browned. 

4. While the crust is baking, combine the rhubarb, golden brown sugar, and ground cinnamon in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the rhubarb is soft and the sugar has dissolved. 

5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the large egg yolks, cream, and grated lemon peel. Gradually add this to the rhubarb mixture, stirring constantly. 

6. Pour the rhubarb mixture over the baked crust. Sprinkle the sliced almonds on top. 

7. Return the tart to the oven and bake for another 25-30 minutes, or until the filling is set and the almonds are lightly toasted. 

8. Allow the tart to cool before slicing and serving. Enjoy your Rhubarb and Almond Tart with Lemon Cream!"

input: Ingredients: fish sauce, hot red pepper flakes, cider vinegar, chile paste, granulated sugar, sesame oil, crushed red pepper, oyster sauce, coconut milk, grated orange, fresh red chili, natural peanut butter, soy sauce, water, sesame seeds, lemon zest, worcestershire sauce, pineapple juice, corn starch, fresh lime juice, white vinegar, brown sugar, sugar, minced garlic, chili, hoisin sauce, red pepper flakes, rice vinegar, lemon juice, toasted sesame oil, chicken broth, grated orange peel, ketchup, minced ginger, chili paste, green onions, white wine vinegar, orange juice, chili garlic paste, white sugar. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Asian Citrus Chicken Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons fish sauce
- 1 teaspoon hot red pepper flakes
