input: Ingredients: barbecue sauce, yellow onion, prepared pizza crust, boneless skinless chicken breasts, SargentoÂ® Traditional Cut Shredded Mozzarella Cheese, vegetable oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Barbecue Chicken Pizza

Ingredients:
- 1 cup barbecue sauce
- 1 large yellow onion
- 1 prepared pizza crust
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts
- 2 cups Sargento® Traditional Cut Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
2. Heat the vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until no longer pink in the center, about 6-8 minutes per side. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.
3. Once the chicken is cool enough to handle, shred it into small pieces using two forks.
4. In the same skillet, add the sliced yellow onion and cook until it becomes translucent and slightly caramelized, about 5 minutes.
5. Spread the barbecue sauce evenly over the prepared pizza crust.
6. Distribute the shredded chicken and caramelized onions evenly over the sauce.
7. Sprinkle the Sargento® Traditional Cut Shredded Mozzarella Cheese over the chicken and onions.
8. Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the crust is golden brown, about 15-20 minutes.
9. Remove from the oven and let the pizza cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving."

input: Ingredients: chicken broth, erythritol, green onions, red bell pepper, fish sauce, lemon grass, garlic, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, lime juice, shallots, coconut milk, coconut oil, mushrooms, carrots, chicken. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Coconut Lime Chicken Soup

Ingredients:
- 4 cups chicken broth
- 2 tablespoons erythritol
- 2 green onions, chopped
- 1 red bell pepper, diced
- 2 tablespoons fish sauce
- 2 stalks lemon grass, cut into 2 inch pieces
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon galangal, minced
- 4 kaffir lime leaves
- Juice of 2 limes
- 2 shallots, chopped
- 1 can (13.5 oz) coconut milk
- 2 tablespoons coconut oil
- 1 cup mushrooms, sliced
- 2 carrots, sliced
- 1 lb chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces

Instructions:
1. Heat the coconut oil in a large pot over medium heat.
2. Add the shallots, garlic, galangal, and lemon grass. Sauté until fragrant, about 2-3 minutes.
3. Add the chicken to the pot and cook until it is no longer pink.
4. Add the red bell pepper, carrots, and mushrooms to the pot. Sauté for another 2-3 minutes.
5. Pour in the chicken broth, coconut milk, and fish sauce. Stir well.
6. Add the kaffir lime leaves and erythritol. Bring the soup to a boil.
7. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for 20 minutes.
8. Remove the lemon grass and kaffir lime leaves from the soup.
9. Stir in the lime juice and green onions.
10. Serve the soup hot. Enjoy your Coconut Lime Chicken Soup!"

input: Ingredients: soy sauce, dry sherry, black bean sauce, garlic, green onions, firm tofu, olive oil, ground pork. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Black Bean Tofu and Pork Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon dry sherry
- 3 tablespoons black bean sauce
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 4 green onions, chopped
- 1 block firm tofu, cubed
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1/2 pound ground pork

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, combine soy sauce, dry sherry, and black bean sauce. Stir until well mixed.
2. Add minced garlic to the sauce mixture and stir.
3. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
4. Add the ground pork to the pan and cook until browned. Remove the pork from the pan and set aside.
5. In the same pan, add another tablespoon of olive oil. Add the tofu cubes and cook until they are golden brown on all sides.
6. Return the cooked pork to the pan with the tofu.
7. Pour the sauce mixture over the tofu and pork. Stir well to ensure all pieces are coated with the sauce.
8. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
9. Sprinkle the chopped green onions over the top of the stir-fry just before serving."

input: Ingredients: cider vinegar, salt, cherry tomatoes, avocado, extra-virgin olive oil, pepper, cucumber. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Fresh Avocado and Cherry Tomato Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons of cider vinegar
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 2 cups of cherry tomatoes
- 1 ripe avocado
- 3 tablespoons of extra-virgin olive oil
- 1/4 teaspoon of pepper
- 1 medium cucumber

Instructions:
1. Wash the cherry tomatoes and cucumber under cold water.
2. Cut the cherry tomatoes in half and place them in a large bowl.
3. Peel the cucumber, cut it in half lengthwise, and then slice it into thin half-moons. Add these to the bowl with the tomatoes.
4. Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh. Cut the avocado into small cubes and add them to the bowl.
5. In a small bowl, whisk together the cider vinegar, extra-virgin olive oil, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
6. Pour the dressing over the vegetables in the large bowl.
7. Toss everything together gently until the vegetables are evenly coated with the dressing.
8. Let the salad sit for a few minutes to allow the flavors to meld together before serving."

input: Ingredients: tomatoes, white wine, whole milk, ice water, salt, asparagus tips, nutmeg, fresh chives, zucchini, butter, artichokes, tuna, black peppercorns, pepper, spring onions, portabello mushroom, all-purpose flour, medium eggs, capers, water, watercress, heavy cream, allspice berries. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Tuna and Vegetable Medley

Ingredients and Amounts:
- 2 medium tomatoes
- 1 cup white wine
- 1 cup whole milk
- 1 cup ice water
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup asparagus tips
- 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
- 1/4 cup fresh chives, chopped
- 1 medium zucchini
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1 cup artichokes
- 2 cans tuna, drained
- 1 teaspoon black peppercorns
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 1/2 cup spring onions, chopped
- 1 large portabello mushroom
- 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
- 2 medium eggs
- 2 tablespoons capers
- 1/2 cup water
- 1 cup watercress
- 1/2 cup heavy cream
- 1/4 teaspoon allspice berries

Instructions:
1. Slice the tomatoes, zucchini, and portabello mushroom. Chop the artichokes.
2. In a large pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the spring onions and sauté until soft.
3. Add the tomatoes, zucchini, mushroom, and artichokes to the pan. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the flour to the pan and stir until the vegetables are coated.
5. Slowly add the white wine, whole milk, and water to the pan, stirring constantly.
6. Add the asparagus tips, tuna, capers, salt, pepper, black peppercorns, nutmeg, and allspice berries. Stir well.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and let simmer for 20 minutes.
8. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs with the ice water. Slowly add this mixture to the pan, stirring constantly.
9. Add the heavy cream and watercress to the pan. Stir well and let cook for another 5 minutes.
10. Serve the dish hot, garnished with fresh chives."

input: Ingredients: chives, short-grain rice, nori, dashi, fine sea salt, yellowtail. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Yellowtail Sushi Rice Bowl

Ingredients:
- 1 cup short-grain rice
- 2 cups dashi
- 1/2 teaspoon fine sea salt
- 2 sheets nori
- 1/2 cup chives, finely chopped
- 200 grams yellowtail, thinly sliced

Instructions:
1. Rinse the short-grain rice under cold water until the water runs clear. 
2. In a medium saucepan, combine the rinsed rice, dashi, and fine sea salt. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat.
3. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low, cover the saucepan, and let it simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the rice is tender and has absorbed all the dashi.
4. While the rice is cooking, prepare the nori by toasting it over an open flame or in a dry skillet until it becomes crispy. Once toasted, cut or tear the nori into small pieces.
5. When the rice is done, remove it from the heat and let it sit, covered, for an additional 10 minutes.
6. After the rice has rested, gently fluff it with a fork and mix in the chopped chives and pieces of toasted nori.
7. Divide the rice mixture into bowls and top each with an equal amount of thinly sliced yellowtail. Serve immediately."

input: Ingredients: tomatillo salsa, corn tortillas, cumin, avocado, garlic, onions, cilantro, pork shoulder, black pepper, salt, dried oregano. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Slow-Cooked Pork Tacos with Tomatillo Salsa and Avocado

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of tomatillo salsa
- 12 corn tortillas
- 1 teaspoon of cumin
- 2 avocados
- 4 cloves of garlic
- 2 onions
- 1/2 cup of cilantro
- 2 pounds of pork shoulder
- 1 teaspoon of black pepper
- 2 teaspoons of salt
- 1 teaspoon of dried oregano

Instructions:

1. Season the pork shoulder with salt, black pepper, cumin, and dried oregano. 

2. Mince the garlic and chop the onions. 

3. Place the seasoned pork shoulder, garlic, and onions in a slow cooker. 

4. Pour the tomatillo salsa over the pork. 

5. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours or until the pork is tender and can be easily shredded with a fork. 

6. Once the pork is cooked, shred it using two forks and mix it well with the sauce in the slow cooker. 

7. Warm the corn tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat until they are soft and pliable. 

8. Slice the avocados and chop the cilantro. 

9. To serve, place some shredded pork on a tortilla, top with a few slices of avocado, a sprinkle of cilantro, and an extra spoonful of tomatillo salsa if desired. 

10. Repeat with the remaining tortillas and ingredients. Enjoy your Slow-Cooked Pork Tacos with Tomatillo Salsa and Avocado."

input: Ingredients: black beans, olive oil, chili powder, tortilla chips, cheddar cheese, store bought low sodium chicken stock, chipotle, cilantro leaves, dried oregano, avocado, kosher salt, ground black pepper, garlic, sour cream, ground chicken, cherry tomatoes, jalapeno chilies, cayenne pepper, ground cumin. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chicken and Black Bean Nachos

Ingredients:
- 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon chili powder
- 3 cups tortilla chips
- 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
- 1 cup store bought low sodium chicken stock
- 1 chipotle pepper, chopped
- 1/4 cup fresh cilantro leaves
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1 ripe avocado, diced
- 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/2 cup sour cream
- 1 pound ground chicken
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and chopped
- 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the ground chicken, chili powder, cumin, oregano, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper. Cook until the chicken is browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
2. Add the garlic and jalapeno chilies to the skillet and cook for another minute.
3. Stir in the black beans, chipotle pepper, and chicken stock. Bring the mixture to a simmer and let it cook for about 10 minutes, or until the liquid has reduced by half.
4. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
5. Spread the tortilla chips out on the prepared baking sheet. Spoon the chicken and bean mixture over the chips. Sprinkle the shredded cheddar cheese on top.
6. Bake the nachos in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the nachos from the oven and top with the diced avocado, halved cherry tomatoes, and fresh cilantro leaves.
8. Serve the nachos warm, with sour cream on the side for dipping."

input: Ingredients: unsalted butter, fresh lemon juice, black pepper, shell-on shrimp, white sandwich bread, minced onion, cooked shrimp, cayenne, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Shrimp Toast 

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup of unsalted butter
- 2 tablespoons of fresh lemon juice
- 1/2 teaspoon of black pepper
- 1/2 pound of shell-on shrimp
- 4 slices of white sandwich bread
- 1/4 cup of minced onion
- 1/2 pound of cooked shrimp
- 1/4 teaspoon of cayenne
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:
1. Start by peeling and deveining the shell-on shrimp.
2. In a large pan, melt the unsalted butter over medium heat.
3. Add the minced onion to the pan and sauté until it becomes translucent.
4. Add the shell-on shrimp to the pan and cook until they turn pink.
5. Add the cooked shrimp, cayenne, black pepper, and salt to the pan. Stir well to combine.
6. Cook the shrimp mixture for another 2-3 minutes, then remove from heat.
7. Stir in the fresh lemon juice.
8. Toast the white sandwich bread until it's golden brown.
9. Spoon the shrimp mixture onto the toasted bread.
10. Serve the spicy shrimp toast immediately while it's still warm. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: coriander seeds, salt, milk, vegetable oil, boiling water, cauliflower, tamarind pulp, coconut cream, chickpea flour, chili powder, mustard seeds. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Cauliflower and Chickpea Curry

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon coriander seeds
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 cup milk
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 1 cup boiling water
- 1 large cauliflower, cut into florets
- 2 tablespoons tamarind pulp
- 1 cup coconut cream
- 1/2 cup chickpea flour
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1 teaspoon mustard seeds

Instructions:
1. Heat a pan over medium heat and add the coriander seeds and mustard seeds. Toast them for a few minutes until they start to pop and release their aroma. Remove from heat and set aside.
2. In the same pan, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the cauliflower florets and cook for about 10 minutes, or until they start to brown and soften.
3. While the cauliflower is cooking, mix the chickpea flour, chili powder, and salt in a bowl. Gradually add the boiling water, stirring constantly to avoid lumps. The mixture should be smooth and thick.
4. Add the tamarind pulp and coconut cream to the pan with the cauliflower. Stir well to combine.
5. Pour the chickpea flour mixture over the cauliflower. Stir well to ensure all the cauliflower is coated.
6. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and let it simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the cauliflower is tender and the sauce has thickened.
7. Stir in the toasted coriander and mustard seeds. Cook for another 2 minutes.
8. Remove from heat and let it sit for a few minutes before serving. The curry will thicken a bit more as it cools.
9. Serve hot, and enjoy your Spicy Cauliflower and Chickpea Curry."

input: Ingredients: green bell pepper, ground black pepper, worcestershire sauce, celery, tomatoes, water, cajun seasoning, salt, onions, chicken stock, louisiana hot sauce, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic, ghee, andouille sausage, bay leaves, white rice, medium shrimp. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cajun Jambalaya

Ingredients:
- 1 green bell pepper, diced
- 1 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
- 2 celery stalks, diced
- 2 tomatoes, diced
- 1 cup water
- 2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 onions, diced
- 2 cups chicken stock
- 1 tablespoon Louisiana hot sauce
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons ghee
- 1 pound andouille sausage, sliced
- 2 bay leaves
- 1.5 cups white rice
- 1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

Instructions:
1. Heat the ghee in a large pot over medium heat. Add the chicken and sausage, and brown for about 5-7 minutes.
2. Add the onions, bell pepper, celery, and garlic to the pot. Cook until the vegetables are softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Stir in the tomatoes, bay leaves, Worcestershire sauce, and hot sauce. Season with Cajun seasoning, salt, and pepper.
4. Add the rice, chicken stock, and water to the pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and has absorbed most of the liquid.
5. Stir in the shrimp, and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 5 minutes.
6. Remove the bay leaves before serving. Enjoy your homemade Cajun Jambalaya!"

input: Ingredients: sake, daikon, arame, white miso, konbu, water, scallions, lemon cucumber, Himalayan salt, carrots. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Miso Soup with Daikon and Arame

Ingredients:
- 1/4 cup sake
- 1 medium daikon, peeled and cut into thin slices
- 1/2 cup dried arame
- 3 tablespoons white miso
- 1 piece konbu (about 4 inches)
- 6 cups water
- 4 scallions, thinly sliced
- 1 lemon cucumber, thinly sliced
- 1 teaspoon Himalayan salt
- 2 medium carrots, peeled and cut into thin slices

Instructions:
1. Soak the arame in a bowl of cold water for 15 minutes. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large pot, add the water and konbu. Bring to a boil over medium heat.
3. Once boiling, remove the konbu and add the daikon, carrots, and soaked arame. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes.
4. In a small bowl, mix the white miso with a little bit of the hot broth until it becomes a smooth paste. Then add this paste back into the pot.
5. Add the sake, Himalayan salt, and lemon cucumber slices to the pot. Stir well and simmer for another 5 minutes.
6. Serve the soup hot, garnished with the sliced scallions."

input: Ingredients: ground cloves, eggplant, grated parmesan cheese, plain breadcrumbs, cinnamon sticks, kosher salt, large egg yolks, diced tomatoes, all-purpose flour, bay leaf, tomato paste, olive oil, unsalted butter, garlic, ground allspice, ground lamb, milk, ground black pepper, dry red wine, grated nutmeg, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spiced Lamb and Eggplant Moussaka

Ingredients:
- 2 large eggplants
- 1 lb ground lamb
- 1 large onion, finely chopped
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes
- 2 tablespoons tomato paste
- 1/2 cup dry red wine
- 1 bay leaf
- 1 cinnamon stick
- 1/4 teaspoon ground allspice
- 1/4 teaspoon ground cloves
- 1/4 teaspoon grated nutmeg
- Kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 4 tablespoons unsalted butter
- 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
- 2 cups milk
- 3 large egg yolks, beaten
- 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 1/2 cup plain breadcrumbs

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C). Slice the eggplants into 1/2 inch thick rounds, arrange on a baking sheet, brush with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes until golden and soft.
2. In a large pan, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the ground lamb and cook until browned. Remove from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add the chopped onion and garlic, cook until softened. Add the diced tomatoes, tomato paste, red wine, bay leaf, cinnamon stick, ground allspice, ground cloves, grated nutmeg, and the cooked lamb. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes until the sauce has thickened.
4. In a separate saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Stir in the flour and cook for 2 minutes. Gradually whisk in the milk until smooth. Cook, stirring constantly, until the sauce thickens. Remove from heat and stir in the beaten egg yolks and half of the parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper.
5. In a baking dish, layer half of the roasted eggplant slices, then half of the lamb mixture, and half of the béchamel sauce. Repeat with the remaining eggplant, lamb, and sauce.
6. Combine the remaining parmesan cheese with the breadcrumbs and sprinkle over the top of the moussaka.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes until the top is golden and bubbling. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: back bacon rashers, vegetable oil, green pepper, chillies, eggs, water, garlic, long-grain rice, red chili peppers, lemon, green chilies, onions, dark soy sauce, spring onions, salt, red bell pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Bacon Fried Rice

Ingredients:
- 4 back bacon rashers
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 1 green pepper, diced
- 2 chillies, finely chopped
- 3 eggs, beaten
- 2 cups water
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup long-grain rice
- 2 red chili peppers, finely chopped
- 1 lemon, juiced
- 2 green chilies, finely chopped
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 3 tablespoons dark soy sauce
- 2 spring onions, chopped
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 red bell pepper, diced

Instructions:
1. Rinse the rice under cold water until the water runs clear. Add the rice and 2 cups of water to a saucepan. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover and let it simmer for 15-20 minutes until the rice is cooked. Set aside.
2. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add the bacon and cook until crispy. Remove the bacon from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add the remaining oil, garlic, onion, green pepper, red bell pepper, chillies, red chili peppers, and green chilies. Sauté until the vegetables are tender.
4. Push the vegetables to one side of the pan and pour the beaten eggs into the other side. Scramble the eggs, breaking them into small pieces as they cook.
5. Add the cooked rice to the pan and stir everything together. Add the soy sauce, lemon juice, and salt. Stir well to combine.
6. Crumble the cooked bacon and add it to the pan. Stir well to distribute the bacon throughout the rice.
7. Garnish with the chopped spring onions before serving. Enjoy your Spicy Bacon Fried Rice!"

input: Ingredients: avocado, Sriracha, cooked quinoa, water, creamy peanut butter, rice paper, romaine lettuce, red pepper, noodles, lime, gluten-free tamari. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Quinoa and Avocado Spring Rolls with Peanut Sriracha Sauce

Ingredients:
- 1 ripe avocado
- 1 tablespoon Sriracha
- 1 cup cooked quinoa
- 1/2 cup water
- 1/4 cup creamy peanut butter
- 8 sheets rice paper
- 4 leaves romaine lettuce
- 1 red pepper
- 1 cup cooked noodles
- Juice of 1 lime
- 2 tablespoons gluten-free tamari

Instructions:

1. Begin by preparing the peanut Sriracha sauce. In a small bowl, combine the creamy peanut butter, Sriracha, lime juice, gluten-free tamari, and water. Stir until well combined and set aside.

2. Slice the avocado and red pepper into thin strips. Tear the romaine lettuce into smaller pieces.

3. Fill a large bowl with warm water. Dip one sheet of rice paper into the water for about 10-15 seconds, or until it softens. Lay the softened rice paper flat on a clean surface.

4. On the lower third of the rice paper, place a small amount of cooked quinoa, a few strips of avocado and red pepper, a handful of noodles, and a piece of romaine lettuce.

5. Fold the bottom of the rice paper up over the filling, then fold in the sides and roll it up tightly. Repeat with the remaining rice paper and filling.

6. Serve the spring rolls with the peanut Sriracha sauce for dipping. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: chicken broth, green onions, salt, bok choy, soy sauce, wonton wrappers, fresh mushrooms, eggs, sesame oil, dry bread crumbs, snow peas, ground black pepper, ground pork, uncook medium shrimp, peel and devein. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Shrimp and Pork Wonton Soup

Ingredients:
- 8 cups of chicken broth
- 4 green onions, chopped
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 2 cups of bok choy, chopped
- 2 tablespoons of soy sauce
- 24 wonton wrappers
- 1 cup of fresh mushrooms, sliced
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 1 tablespoon of sesame oil
- 1/2 cup of dry bread crumbs
- 1 cup of snow peas
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 1/2 pound of ground pork
- 1/2 pound of uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine ground pork, shrimp, green onions, mushrooms, bread crumbs, eggs, soy sauce, sesame oil, salt, and black pepper. Mix well.
2. Lay out the wonton wrappers on a clean surface. Place a spoonful of the pork and shrimp mixture in the center of each wrapper.
3. Moisten the edges of the wonton wrapper with water, fold in half to create a triangle, and press edges to seal. Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling.
4. In a large pot, bring the chicken broth to a boil.
5. Add the wontons to the boiling broth. Reduce heat and simmer for about 10 minutes, until wontons are cooked through.
6. Add the bok choy and snow peas to the pot. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, until vegetables are tender.
7. Serve the soup hot, garnished with additional chopped green onions if desired."

input: Ingredients: creole mustard, fresh parsley, mayonaise, garlic, horseradish, sliced green onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creole Mustard and Horseradish Dip

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup of Creole mustard
- 1/4 cup of fresh parsley, finely chopped
- 1 cup of mayonnaise
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons of horseradish
- 1/4 cup of sliced green onions

Instructions:
1. In a medium bowl, combine the Creole mustard, mayonnaise, and horseradish. Stir until well mixed.
2. Add the minced garlic to the mixture and stir until evenly distributed.
3. Fold in the sliced green onions and fresh parsley, mixing until they are well incorporated into the dip.
4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least an hour before serving to allow the flavors to meld together."

input: Ingredients: fresh ginger, paprika, garlic cloves, fresh lemon, ground coriander, ground turmeric, jalapeno chilies, salt, chopped cilantro fresh, vegetable oil, catfish. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Lemon-Ginger Catfish

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons fresh ginger, grated
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- 3 garlic cloves, minced
- 1 fresh lemon, juiced
- 1 teaspoon ground coriander
- 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric
- 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and finely chopped
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 4 catfish fillets

Instructions:
1. In a small bowl, combine the grated ginger, minced garlic, lemon juice, ground coriander, ground turmeric, chopped jalapeno chilies, and salt. Mix well to form a paste.
2. Rub the paste evenly over the catfish fillets, ensuring all sides are covered. Let the fillets marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
3. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
4. Once the oil is hot, add the marinated catfish fillets. Cook for about 5-7 minutes on each side, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. Sprinkle the cooked catfish with the chopped fresh cilantro and a squeeze of fresh lemon juice before serving. Enjoy your Spicy Lemon-Ginger Catfish!"

input: Ingredients: vegetables, basil, basil pesto sauce, aioli, cooked shrimp, prosciutto, mozzarella balls, sun-dried tomatoes, salami. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Italian Pesto Shrimp Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of mixed vegetables
- 1/4 cup of fresh basil
- 1/2 cup of basil pesto sauce
- 1/4 cup of aioli
- 1 cup of cooked shrimp
- 1/2 cup of prosciutto, sliced
- 1/2 cup of mozzarella balls
- 1/4 cup of sun-dried tomatoes
- 1/2 cup of salami, sliced

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the mixed vegetables, fresh basil, basil pesto sauce, and aioli. Toss until all the vegetables are well coated.
2. Add the cooked shrimp to the bowl and mix until the shrimp are evenly distributed.
3. Add the sliced prosciutto, mozzarella balls, sun-dried tomatoes, and salami to the bowl. Toss until all the ingredients are well mixed.
4. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate it for an hour to let the flavors meld together. Enjoy your Italian Pesto Shrimp Salad!"

input: Ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, butter, cocoa powder. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chocolate Fudge

Ingredients:
1. 1 can (14 ounces) of sweetened condensed milk
2. 1/2 cup of butter
3. 3/4 cup of cocoa powder

Instructions:
1. In a medium saucepan, melt the butter over low heat.
2. Once the butter is melted, add the sweetened condensed milk and stir until well combined.
3. Gradually add the cocoa powder, stirring continuously to avoid lumps.
4. Continue to cook the mixture over low heat, stirring constantly, until it thickens and starts to pull away from the sides of the pan.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased dish and let it cool.
6. Once cooled, cut into squares and serve."

input: Ingredients: black beans, enchilada sauce, pasilla pepper, corn, Mexican cheese, pork, rice, roasted tomatoes, corn chips, sour cream. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cheesy Pork Enchilada Casserole

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of black beans
- 2 cups of enchilada sauce
- 1 pasilla pepper
- 1 cup of corn
- 2 cups of shredded Mexican cheese
- 1 lb of pork
- 1 cup of rice
- 1 cup of roasted tomatoes
- 2 cups of corn chips
- 1 cup of sour cream

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

2. Cook 1 cup of rice according to package instructions.

3. While the rice is cooking, cut the pork into small pieces and cook in a large skillet over medium heat until browned and cooked through. Remove from heat and set aside.

4. In the same skillet, add the chopped pasilla pepper and corn. Cook until the pepper is soft and the corn is lightly browned.

5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, pork, pepper, corn, black beans, and roasted tomatoes. Stir in 1 cup of enchilada sauce.

6. In a large baking dish, spread a thin layer of enchilada sauce. Layer half of the rice and pork mixture, then half of the corn chips, and then half of the cheese. Repeat the layers with the remaining ingredients.

7. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

8. Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes. Top with sour cream before serving."

input: Ingredients: oyster sauce, chopped cilantro fresh, chinese noodles, ground white pepper, shrimp, sliced green onions, fat skimmed chicken broth, toasted sesame oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Shrimp and Noodle Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons oyster sauce
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
- 200 grams Chinese noodles
- 1/2 teaspoon ground white pepper
- 200 grams shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1/2 cup sliced green onions
- 2 cups fat skimmed chicken broth
- 1 tablespoon toasted sesame oil

Instructions:

1. Cook the Chinese noodles according to the package instructions. Once cooked, drain and set aside.

2. Heat the toasted sesame oil in a large pan over medium heat.

3. Add the shrimp to the pan and cook until they turn pink, about 2-3 minutes. Remove the shrimp from the pan and set aside.

4. In the same pan, add the sliced green onions and cook until they become soft, about 2 minutes.

5. Add the cooked noodles, oyster sauce, and ground white pepper to the pan. Stir well to combine.

6. Pour in the chicken broth and bring the mixture to a simmer. Cook for about 5 minutes, or until the broth has mostly evaporated.

7. Add the cooked shrimp back into the pan and stir well to combine. Cook for another 2 minutes, or until the shrimp are heated through.

8. Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the chopped fresh cilantro.

9. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with additional cilantro if desired."

input: Ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, milk, condensed cream of mushroom soup, fettuccine pasta, butter, grated parmesan cheese, broccoli. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Chicken and Broccoli Fettuccine

Ingredients:
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts
- 1 cup of milk
- 1 can of condensed cream of mushroom soup
- 8 ounces of fettuccine pasta
- 2 tablespoons of butter
- 1/2 cup of grated parmesan cheese
- 2 cups of broccoli florets

Instructions:
1. Cook the fettuccine pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. While the pasta is cooking, heat the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until they are no longer pink in the center, about 6-7 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set it aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the condensed cream of mushroom soup and milk. Stir until well combined and bring to a simmer.
4. Cut the cooked chicken into bite-sized pieces and add it back to the skillet. Add the broccoli florets. Stir until the chicken and broccoli are coated in the sauce.
5. Cover the skillet and let it simmer for about 10 minutes, or until the broccoli is tender.
6. Add the cooked fettuccine to the skillet and stir until the pasta is coated in the sauce.
7. Sprinkle the grated parmesan cheese over the top of the pasta. Stir until the cheese is melted and the pasta is well coated.
8. Serve the creamy chicken and broccoli fettuccine hot. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: leeks, soft fresh goat cheese, olive oil, chopped fresh sage, kosher salt, butter, hazelnuts, butternut squash, heavy whipping cream. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Butternut Squash and Leek Gratin with Goat Cheese and Hazelnuts

Ingredients:
- 2 large leeks, cleaned and sliced
- 1 cup soft fresh goat cheese
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon chopped fresh sage
- 1 teaspoon kosher salt
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1/2 cup hazelnuts, toasted and chopped
- 1 medium butternut squash, peeled and sliced into 1/4 inch rounds
- 1 cup heavy whipping cream

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the leeks and sauté until they are soft and slightly caramelized, about 10 minutes.

3. Add the chopped sage to the leeks and stir to combine. Remove from heat and set aside.

4. In a large baking dish, arrange the butternut squash slices in an even layer. Sprinkle with kosher salt.

5. Spread the leek and sage mixture over the butternut squash.

6. Dot the mixture with the goat cheese, distributing it evenly.

7. Pour the heavy cream over the entire dish.

8. Cover the dish with foil and bake for 30 minutes.

9. While the gratin is baking, melt the butter in a small skillet. Add the chopped hazelnuts and toast until golden brown.

10. After 30 minutes, remove the foil from the gratin and sprinkle the toasted hazelnuts on top.

11. Return the gratin to the oven, uncovered, and bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until the top is golden and the squash is tender.

12. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: minced garlic, baking powder, chopped onion, monterey jack, lager beer, coarse salt, sour cream, safflower oil, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, poblano chiles, corn kernels, lime wedges, freshly ground pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Poblano and Corn Beer Batter Fritters with Lime Sour Cream

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons minced garlic
- 1 teaspoon baking powder
- 1 large chopped onion
- 1 cup shredded monterey jack
- 1 cup lager beer
- 1 teaspoon coarse salt
- 1 cup sour cream
- 1/2 cup safflower oil
- 2 tablespoons unsalted butter
- 1 cup all-purpose flour
- 2 poblano chiles, roasted, peeled, and chopped
- 1 cup fresh corn kernels
- 2 lime wedges
- 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and pepper.
2. Gradually add the beer to the dry ingredients, stirring until the batter is smooth.
3. Stir in the minced garlic, chopped onion, roasted poblano chiles, and corn kernels.
4. In a large skillet, heat the safflower oil and butter over medium heat.
5. Drop spoonfuls of the batter into the skillet and flatten with the back of the spoon.
6. Cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes on each side.
7. Remove the fritters from the skillet and drain on paper towels.
8. Sprinkle the fritters with the shredded monterey jack while they are still hot.
9. In a small bowl, combine the sour cream and the juice from the lime wedges.
10. Serve the fritters warm with the lime sour cream on the side."

input: Ingredients: tomatoes, extra-virgin olive oil, juice, romaine lettuce, green pepper, cucumber, capers, purple onion, feta cheese crumbles, vinaigrette dressing, kalamata, lemon juice, dried oregano. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Greek Salad with Lemon Vinaigrette

Ingredients:
- 4 ripe tomatoes
- 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 head romaine lettuce
- 1 green pepper
- 1 cucumber
- 2 tablespoons capers
- 1 purple onion
- 1/2 cup feta cheese crumbles
- 1/4 cup vinaigrette dressing
- 1/2 cup pitted kalamata olives
- 2 tablespoons lemon juice
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano

Instructions:
1. Wash and dry all the vegetables. 
2. Cut the tomatoes into wedges, the green pepper and cucumber into slices, and the purple onion into thin rings.
3. Tear the romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place them in a large salad bowl.
4. Add the cut tomatoes, green pepper, cucumber, and purple onion to the bowl.
5. Sprinkle the capers and kalamata olives over the salad.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together the extra-virgin olive oil, vinaigrette dressing, lemon juice, and dried oregano to make the dressing.
7. Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
8. Top the salad with the feta cheese crumbles.
9. Serve the salad immediately or refrigerate for up to 2 hours before serving."

input: Ingredients: water, dill, sugar, buttermilk, onions, red beets, cucumber, boiled eggs, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chilled Beet and Cucumber Soup

Ingredients:
- 4 cups of water
- 2 tablespoons of fresh dill, chopped
- 1 tablespoon of sugar
- 2 cups of buttermilk
- 1 medium onion, finely chopped
- 4 medium red beets, peeled and grated
- 1 large cucumber, peeled and diced
- 2 boiled eggs, chopped
- 1 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, bring the 4 cups of water to a boil.
2. Add the grated red beets to the boiling water. Reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 20 minutes until the beets are tender.
3. Add the finely chopped onion, diced cucumber, chopped dill, sugar, and salt to the pot. Let it simmer for another 10 minutes.
4. Remove the pot from the heat and let it cool down.
5. Once cooled, stir in the buttermilk until well combined.
6. Chill the soup in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.
7. Serve the soup in bowls, garnished with the chopped boiled eggs."

input: Ingredients: baking soda, butter, yellow corn meal, flour, salt, large eggs, buttermilk, sugar, baking powder. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Classic Buttermilk Cornbread

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
- 1/2 cup butter
- 1 1/2 cups yellow corn meal
- 1/2 cup flour
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 large eggs
- 2 cups buttermilk
- 2/3 cup sugar
- 2 teaspoons baking powder

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 

2. Melt the butter in a microwave and set it aside to cool slightly.

3. In a large bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.

4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the buttermilk and eggs. 

5. Gradually add the buttermilk and egg mixture to the dry ingredients, stirring until just blended.

6. Stir in the melted butter.

7. Pour the batter into a greased 9-inch round cake pan or cast iron skillet.

8. Bake in the preheated oven for 30 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cornbread comes out clean.

9. Allow the cornbread to cool for 10 minutes before cutting and serving."

input: Ingredients: salt, caster sugar, plain flour, juice, butter. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sweet Butter Cookies with Juice Glaze

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1 cup of caster sugar
- 2 cups of plain flour
- 1/4 cup of juice (any kind you prefer)
- 1 cup of butter

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

2. In a large bowl, combine 1 cup of butter and 1 cup of caster sugar. Beat them together until the mixture is light and fluffy.

3. Gradually add 2 cups of plain flour and 1/2 teaspoon of salt to the butter and sugar mixture. Continue to mix until the dough comes together.

4. Roll the dough into small balls and place them on the prepared baking sheet. Press down on each ball slightly to flatten it.

5. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, or until they are lightly golden.

6. While the cookies are baking, prepare the juice glaze. In a small bowl, combine 1/4 cup of juice with 1/4 cup of caster sugar. Stir until the sugar is completely dissolved.

7. Once the cookies are done, remove them from the oven and while they are still warm, brush each one with the juice glaze.

8. Allow the cookies to cool completely on the baking sheet before serving. Enjoy your Sweet Butter Cookies with Juice Glaze!"

input: Ingredients: brown sugar, herbs, rice vinegar, beansprouts, garlic paste, boneless chop pork, lettuce leaves, english cucumber, spring roll wrappers, warm water, hoisin sauce, creamy peanut butter, fish sauce, lime, garlic, red bell pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Vietnamese Pork Spring Rolls with Peanut Hoisin Sauce

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup brown sugar
- 1/4 cup mixed herbs (mint, cilantro, basil)
- 1/4 cup rice vinegar
- 1 cup beansprouts
- 1 tablespoon garlic paste
- 1 pound boneless chop pork
- 8 large lettuce leaves
- 1 English cucumber, julienned
- 8 spring roll wrappers
- 1/2 cup warm water
- 1/2 cup hoisin sauce
- 1/4 cup creamy peanut butter
- 2 tablespoons fish sauce
- 1 lime, juiced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 red bell pepper, julienned

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, combine brown sugar, rice vinegar, fish sauce, lime juice, and garlic paste. Stir until the sugar is dissolved.
2. Add the pork to the marinade and let it sit for at least 30 minutes.
3. Heat a pan over medium heat. Add the marinated pork and cook until it's no longer pink in the middle, about 7-10 minutes. Set aside to cool.
4. In a separate bowl, mix hoisin sauce and peanut butter. Gradually add warm water while stirring until the sauce reaches your desired consistency.
5. To assemble the spring rolls, dip each wrapper in warm water for a few seconds to soften. Lay the wrapper flat and in the center, place a lettuce leaf, a spoonful of cooked pork, a few pieces of cucumber, red bell pepper, a handful of beansprouts, and a sprinkle of herbs.
6. Fold the sides of the wrapper in, then roll up tightly. Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling.
7. Serve the spring rolls with the peanut hoisin sauce for dipping."

input: Ingredients: honey, baking powder, sharp cheddar cheese, unsalted butter, bacon slices, baking soda, buttermilk, bread flour, melted butter, chopped fresh chives, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cheddar Bacon Chive Bread

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons honey
- 1 teaspoon baking powder
- 2 cups sharp cheddar cheese, shredded
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened
- 6 bacon slices, cooked and crumbled
- 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
- 1 cup buttermilk
- 3 cups bread flour
- 1/4 cup melted butter
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh chives
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.

2. In a large bowl, combine the bread flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.

3. In a separate bowl, cream together the softened unsalted butter and honey until light and fluffy.

4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, alternating with the buttermilk, beginning and ending with the dry ingredients. Mix until just combined.

5. Fold in the shredded cheddar cheese, crumbled bacon, and chopped chives.

6. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top with a spatula.

7. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.

8. Remove the bread from the oven and immediately brush the top with the melted butter.

9. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

10. Slice and serve the Cheddar Bacon Chive Bread warm or at room temperature. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: turbinado, ground nutmeg, sea salt, red bell pepper, olive oil, potatoes, cayenne pepper, onions, fresh spinach, zucchini, garlic, celery, fresh ginger root, vegetable stock, ground allspice, ground turmeric. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Vegetable Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon turbinado
- 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
- 1 teaspoon sea salt
- 1 red bell pepper
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 potatoes
- 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
- 2 onions
- 2 cups fresh spinach
- 1 zucchini
- 3 cloves garlic
- 2 stalks celery
- 1 inch fresh ginger root
- 4 cups vegetable stock
- 1/2 teaspoon ground allspice
- 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric

Instructions:
1. Chop the onions, red bell pepper, potatoes, zucchini, celery, and garlic. Grate the ginger root.
2. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onions, garlic, and ginger. Cook until the onions are translucent.
3. Add the red bell pepper, potatoes, zucchini, and celery to the pot. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the vegetable stock, turbinado, ground nutmeg, sea salt, cayenne pepper, ground allspice, and ground turmeric to the pot. Stir well.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 20 minutes.
6. Add the fresh spinach to the pot. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the spinach is wilted.
7. Taste the stew and adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve hot."

input: Ingredients: white vinegar, olive oil, butter, chicken fingers, chicken stock, garam masala, yellow onion, black pepper, hot pepper sauce, apricot preserves, lime zest, garlic powder, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Apricot Glazed Chicken Fingers

Ingredients:
- 1 lb chicken fingers
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1/2 cup chicken stock
- 1 teaspoon garam masala
- 1 medium yellow onion, finely chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 2 tablespoons hot pepper sauce
- 1/2 cup apricot preserves
- 1 teaspoon lime zest
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 tablespoon white vinegar

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the chicken fingers to the skillet and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the chopped yellow onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the garam masala, black pepper, garlic powder, and salt to the skillet and stir to combine with the onions.
5. Add the chicken stock, hot pepper sauce, apricot preserves, and white vinegar to the skillet. Stir until all ingredients are well combined and bring to a simmer.
6. Return the chicken fingers to the skillet and coat them with the sauce. Let them simmer in the sauce for about 10 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
7. Remove from heat and sprinkle the lime zest over the chicken fingers before serving."

input: Ingredients: ginger juice, minced garlic, green onions, soy sauce, sesame salt, chili powder, pepper, pork ribs, sesame oil, sugar, chili paste, rice wine. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Korean Pork Ribs

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons ginger juice
- 4 cloves minced garlic
- 4 chopped green onions
- 1/2 cup soy sauce
- 1 teaspoon sesame salt
- 1 tablespoon chili powder
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 2 pounds pork ribs
- 2 tablespoons sesame oil
- 2 tablespoons sugar
- 2 tablespoons chili paste
- 1/4 cup rice wine

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine ginger juice, minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame salt, chili powder, pepper, sugar, chili paste, and rice wine. Stir until well mixed.
2. Add the pork ribs to the bowl and toss until they are fully coated with the marinade. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or overnight for best results.
3. Preheat your grill or broiler. Remove the ribs from the marinade, reserving the marinade for basting.
4. Grill or broil the ribs, turning occasionally and basting with the reserved marinade, for about 20-30 minutes, or until the ribs are cooked through and nicely charred.
5. While the ribs are cooking, heat the sesame oil in a small pan. Add the chopped green onions and sauté until they are soft and fragrant.
6. Serve the cooked ribs topped with the sautéed green onions. Enjoy your Spicy Korean Pork Ribs!"

input: Ingredients: olive oil, grated parmesan cheese, frozen spinach, lasagne, passata, eggplant, mushrooms, pinenuts, roasted red peppers, ricotta. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Vegetable Lasagne with Pinenuts and Ricotta

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 2 cups frozen spinach, thawed
- 12 lasagne sheets
- 2 cups passata
- 1 large eggplant, sliced
- 2 cups mushrooms, sliced
- 1/2 cup pinenuts
- 1 cup roasted red peppers, sliced
- 2 cups ricotta

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F). 
2. Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the sliced eggplant and mushrooms, cook until softened.
3. Add the thawed spinach to the pan and stir until well combined. Remove from heat.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the ricotta and half of the grated parmesan cheese.
5. Begin layering your lasagne in a baking dish. Start with a layer of lasagne sheets, followed by a layer of the vegetable mixture, a layer of ricotta mixture, and a layer of passata. Repeat these layers until all ingredients are used, finishing with a layer of passata on top.
6. Sprinkle the remaining parmesan cheese over the top of the lasagne. Scatter the pinenuts and roasted red peppers over the cheese.
7. Cover the baking dish with foil and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
8. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until the cheese is golden and bubbly.
9. Allow the lasagne to cool for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy your Vegetable Lasagne with Pinenuts and Ricotta!"

input: Ingredients: ground black pepper, parsley, fat free cream cheese, french bread, non-fat sour cream, green onions, reduced fat swiss cheese, grated parmesan cheese, garlic, fat-free mayonnaise. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Light and Creamy Cheese Bread Spread

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley
- 1 cup fat free cream cheese
- 1 loaf of French bread
- 1/2 cup non-fat sour cream
- 1/2 cup chopped green onions
- 1 cup reduced fat Swiss cheese
- 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/2 cup fat-free mayonnaise

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the fat free cream cheese, non-fat sour cream, fat-free mayonnaise, minced garlic, ground black pepper, chopped green onions, reduced fat Swiss cheese, and grated Parmesan cheese. Mix until all ingredients are well combined.
3. Cut the French bread in half lengthwise and spread the cheese mixture evenly over the cut sides of the bread.
4. Place the bread halves on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for about 20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and lightly browned.
5. Sprinkle the chopped fresh parsley over the hot bread before serving. Cut into slices and serve warm."

input: Ingredients: black pepper, cannellini beans, roasted garlic, seasoning, kale, extra-virgin olive oil, fat free less sodium chicken broth, diced tomatoes, Italian bread, sundried tomato paste, dried thyme, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Tuscan Bean and Kale Soup with Sundried Tomato Paste

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 2 cans (15 ounces each) cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
- 4 cloves roasted garlic, minced
- 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning
- 4 cups chopped kale
- 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
- 4 cups fat free less sodium chicken broth
- 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes
- 4 slices Italian bread, toasted
- 2 tablespoons sundried tomato paste
- 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the roasted garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
2. Stir in the sundried tomato paste, dried thyme, Italian seasoning, salt, and black pepper. Cook for another minute.
3. Add the diced tomatoes, cannellini beans, and chicken broth to the pot. Bring the mixture to a boil.
4. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Add the chopped kale to the pot and continue to simmer for another 10 minutes, or until the kale is wilted and tender.
6. Ladle the soup into bowls and serve with a slice of toasted Italian bread."

input: Ingredients: sheepâ€™s milk cheese, champagne vinegar, dijon mustard, mixed greens, honey, extra-virgin olive oil, dried tart cherries, ground white pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Mixed Greens Salad with Sheep's Milk Cheese and Tart Cherries

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of sheep's milk cheese, crumbled
- 2 tablespoons of champagne vinegar
- 1 tablespoon of Dijon mustard
- 6 cups of mixed greens
- 1 tablespoon of honey
- 1/4 cup of extra-virgin olive oil
- 1/2 cup of dried tart cherries
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground white pepper

Instructions:
1. In a large salad bowl, add the mixed greens.
2. Sprinkle the crumbled sheep's milk cheese and dried tart cherries over the greens.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the champagne vinegar, Dijon mustard, honey, and ground white pepper.
4. Gradually whisk in the extra-virgin olive oil until the dressing is well combined.
5. Drizzle the dressing over the salad.
6. Toss the salad gently to combine all the ingredients and ensure the greens are well coated with the dressing.
7. Serve immediately. Enjoy your Mixed Greens Salad with Sheep's Milk Cheese and Tart Cherries."

input: Ingredients: porcini, fresh thyme, garlic cloves, sourdough loaf, crust, flat leaf parsley, duck fat, fine sea salt, squabs, confit, fresh lemon juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Confit Squab with Porcini and Sourdough Crust

Ingredients:
- 4 squabs
- 2 cups of duck fat
- 1 cup of porcini
- 2 tablespoons of fresh thyme
- 4 garlic cloves
- 1 sourdough loaf
- 1/2 cup of flat leaf parsley
- 1 tablespoon of fine sea salt
- 1/2 cup of confit
- 2 tablespoons of fresh lemon juice

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Clean the squabs and pat them dry. Season them with fine sea salt.
3. Heat the duck fat in a large ovenproof skillet over medium heat. Add the squabs and cook until browned on all sides, about 10 minutes.
4. Add the porcini, thyme, and garlic cloves to the skillet. Cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and roast for 15 minutes.
6. While the squabs are roasting, prepare the sourdough crust. Tear the sourdough loaf into small pieces and mix with the flat leaf parsley. Set aside.
7. After 15 minutes, remove the skillet from the oven. Spread the confit over the squabs and top with the sourdough crust mixture.
8. Return the skillet to the oven and roast for another 10 minutes, or until the crust is golden and crispy.
9. Remove from the oven and drizzle with fresh lemon juice before serving."

input: Ingredients: boneless chop pork, palm sugar, shrimp, fish sauce, lime juice, vegetable oil, chopped cilantro fresh, soy sauce, unsalted roasted peanuts, garlic, wide rice noodles, water, radishes, beansprouts. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Thai Pork and Shrimp Noodle Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 boneless chop pork
- 2 tablespoons palm sugar
- 200 grams shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 2 tablespoons fish sauce
- 2 tablespoons lime juice
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 1/4 cup unsalted roasted peanuts, roughly chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 200 grams wide rice noodles
- 1 cup water
- 4 radishes, thinly sliced
- 1 cup beansprouts

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the palm sugar, fish sauce, lime juice, and soy sauce. Stir until the sugar is dissolved.
2. Add the pork chops to the bowl and let them marinate for at least 30 minutes.
3. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the garlic and sauté until fragrant.
4. Add the shrimp to the pan and cook until they turn pink, about 2-3 minutes. Remove the shrimp from the pan and set them aside.
5. Remove the pork from the marinade, reserving the marinade for later. Add the pork to the pan and cook until it's no longer pink in the middle, about 4-5 minutes per side.
6. While the pork is cooking, bring the water to a boil in a separate pot. Add the rice noodles and cook according to the package instructions. Drain the noodles and set them aside.
7. Once the pork is cooked, add the reserved marinade to the pan. Bring it to a simmer and let it cook for 2-3 minutes.
8. Add the cooked noodles, shrimp, radishes, and beansprouts to the pan. Stir everything together to combine.
9. Cook the stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes, until everything is heated through.
10. Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the chopped cilantro and roasted peanuts.
11. Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with extra cilantro and peanuts if desired."

input: Ingredients: canned black beans, bell pepper, diced tomatoes, long-grain rice, diced onions, lime, spices, salt, canned corn, lettuce, water, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cilantro, sour cream, tomato paste, olive oil, butter, scallions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chicken and Rice Fiesta Bowl

Ingredients:
- 2 cans of black beans, drained and rinsed
- 1 bell pepper, diced
- 1 can of diced tomatoes, drained
- 1 cup of long-grain rice
- 1 large onion, diced
- 1 lime, juiced
- 1 tablespoon of spices (cumin, chili powder, garlic powder)
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 can of corn, drained
- 2 cups of shredded lettuce
- 2 cups of water
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts
- 1/4 cup of chopped cilantro
- 1/2 cup of sour cream
- 2 tablespoons of tomato paste
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1 tablespoon of butter
- 2 scallions, chopped

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the chicken breasts to the skillet and cook until golden brown and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the diced onions and bell pepper. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Stir in the tomato paste, spices, and salt. Cook for another 2 minutes.
5. Add the rice to the skillet and stir to coat in the tomato paste mixture. Cook for 2 minutes.
6. Pour in the water, diced tomatoes, black beans, and corn. Bring to a simmer.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and let it cook for 20 minutes, or until the rice is tender.
8. While the rice is cooking, shred the cooked chicken.
9. Once the rice is cooked, stir in the shredded chicken, lime juice, and chopped cilantro.
10. Serve the chicken and rice mixture in bowls, topped with shredded lettuce, sour cream, and chopped scallions."

input: Ingredients: aged gouda, soppressata. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Soppressata and Aged Gouda Cheese Board

Ingredients:
- 200 grams of Aged Gouda
- 150 grams of Soppressata

Instructions:
1. Slice the aged gouda into thin pieces.
2. Slice the soppressata into thin rounds.
3. Arrange the sliced aged gouda and soppressata on a cheese board or platter.
4. Serve as is, allowing guests to help themselves."

input: Ingredients: tomato paste, pepper, dry white wine, garlic cloves, boiling water, black pepper, grated parmesan cheese, salt, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dried porcini mushrooms, sun-dried tomatoes, purple onion, fresh parsley, chicken broth, olive oil, artichokes, fresh lemon juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chicken with Sun-Dried Tomatoes, Artichokes and Porcini Mushrooms

Ingredients:
- 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
- 1/2 cup dried porcini mushrooms
- 1 cup boiling water
- 1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes
- 1/2 cup artichokes
- 1 purple onion, chopped
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- 1/4 cup olive oil
- 1/2 cup dry white wine
- 1 cup chicken broth
- 2 tablespoons tomato paste
- 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped
- 1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese

Instructions:
1. Place the dried porcini mushrooms in a bowl and pour the boiling water over them. Let them soak for 20 minutes, then drain and chop.
2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides, about 5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the chopped onion and minced garlic. Cook until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the chopped mushrooms, sun-dried tomatoes, and artichokes to the skillet. Cook for another 5 minutes.
5. Stir in the tomato paste, then add the white wine and chicken broth. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Return the chicken to the skillet, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
7. Stir in the fresh lemon juice, black pepper, and salt. Cook for another 2 minutes.
8. Sprinkle the dish with the chopped fresh parsley and grated parmesan cheese before serving."

input: Ingredients: lime, green beans, red chili peppers, cilantro leaves, onions, brown sugar, vegetable oil, thai green curry paste, jasmine rice, coconut cream, beef steak. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Thai Green Curry Beef with Jasmine Rice

Ingredients:
- 1 lime
- 200 grams of green beans
- 2 red chili peppers
- A handful of cilantro leaves
- 2 onions
- 2 tablespoons of brown sugar
- 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil
- 3 tablespoons of Thai green curry paste
- 1 cup of jasmine rice
- 400 ml of coconut cream
- 500 grams of beef steak

Instructions:

1. Cut the beef steak into thin slices. Set aside.

2. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the Thai green curry paste and cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly.

3. Add the sliced beef to the pan and cook until browned on all sides. 

4. Chop the onions and red chili peppers, then add them to the pan. Cook for another 5 minutes, until the onions are softened.

5. Add the coconut cream, brown sugar, and green beans to the pan. Stir well to combine all the ingredients. 

6. Lower the heat and let the curry simmer for 15 minutes, or until the green beans are tender.

7. While the curry is simmering, cook the jasmine rice according to the package instructions.

8. Squeeze the juice of the lime into the curry and stir well. 

9. Serve the curry over the jasmine rice. Garnish with cilantro leaves. Enjoy your Thai Green Curry Beef with Jasmine Rice."

input: Ingredients: olive oil, salt, chopped parsley, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme leaves, lemon juice, onions, minced garlic, yellow bell pepper, feta cheese crumbles, ground lamb, mint leaves, fat skimmed chicken broth, couscous. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Mediterranean Lamb and Couscous Stuffed Bell Peppers

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 tablespoons chopped parsley
- 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary
- 1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves
- 2 tablespoons lemon juice
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 4 yellow bell peppers
- 1/2 cup feta cheese crumbles
- 1 pound ground lamb
- 2 tablespoons chopped mint leaves
- 2 cups fat skimmed chicken broth
- 1 cup couscous

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, cook until softened.
3. Add the ground lamb to the skillet. Cook until browned and crumbled. Drain any excess fat.
4. Stir in the rosemary, thyme, mint leaves, and salt. Cook for another 2 minutes.
5. Pour in the chicken broth and bring to a boil. Stir in the couscous, then remove from heat and let stand until the couscous is tender and has absorbed the broth, about 5 minutes.
6. Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove the seeds. Place the peppers in a baking dish.
7. Stir the feta cheese and parsley into the couscous mixture. Spoon the mixture into the bell peppers.
8. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
9. Remove the foil and continue baking until the peppers are tender and the stuffing is heated through, about 15 minutes more.
10. Drizzle with lemon juice before serving. Enjoy your Mediterranean Lamb and Couscous Stuffed Bell Peppers!"

input: Ingredients: biscuits, lump crab meat, bay leaves, diced celery, diced onions, vegetable juice, seafood seasoning, vegetable broth, applewood smoked bacon, red potato, corn kernels, diced tomatoes, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, ground black pepper, paprika, flat leaf parsley. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Crab and Vegetable Chowder with Biscuits

Ingredients:
- 8 biscuits
- 1 pound lump crab meat
- 2 bay leaves
- 1 cup diced celery
- 1 cup diced onions
- 2 cups vegetable juice
- 1 tablespoon seafood seasoning
- 4 cups vegetable broth
- 4 slices applewood smoked bacon
- 2 red potatoes, diced
- 1 cup corn kernels
- 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes
- 1 red bell pepper, diced
- 1 green bell pepper, diced
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon paprika
- 1/4 cup chopped flat leaf parsley

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon and set aside, leaving the grease in the pot.
2. Add the diced onions, celery, red and green bell peppers to the pot. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
3. Stir in the vegetable juice, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, corn kernels, diced red potatoes, bay leaves, seafood seasoning, ground black pepper, and paprika. Bring the mixture to a boil.
4. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender.
5. Stir in the lump crab meat and chopped parsley. Cook for another 5 minutes, until the crab meat is heated through.
6. Crumble the cooked bacon and sprinkle it on top of the chowder.
7. Serve the chowder hot with biscuits on the side."

input: Ingredients: ground cinnamon, semisweet chocolate, large egg whites, all-purpose flour, unsalted butter, pepitas, sugar, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chocolate Pepita Cookies

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips
- 3 large egg whites
- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 cup unsalted butter
- 1 cup pepitas (pumpkin seeds)
- 1 1/2 cups sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Line two baking sheets with parchment paper.

2. In a medium bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, and salt. Set aside.

3. In a large bowl, beat the unsalted butter and sugar together until creamy. This should take about 2-3 minutes.

4. Gradually add the egg whites to the butter mixture, beating well after each addition.

5. Gradually add the flour mixture to the butter and egg mixture, beating just until combined.

6. Stir in the semisweet chocolate chips and pepitas.

7. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets.

8. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are lightly browned.

9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes, then transfer them to wire racks to cool completely."

input: Ingredients: hot red pepper flakes, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, pasta, prosciutto, garlic cloves, capers, finely chopped onion, juice, olive oil, anchovy fillets. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Prosciutto and Anchovy Pasta

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon hot red pepper flakes
- 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar
- 1/2 cup fresh basil leaves
- 8 ounces pasta
- 4 ounces prosciutto, thinly sliced
- 3 garlic cloves, minced
- 2 tablespoons capers, drained
- 1 medium onion, finely chopped
- 2 tablespoons lemon juice
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 4 anchovy fillets, minced

Instructions:
1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. While the pasta is cooking, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the finely chopped onion and sauté until it becomes translucent.
3. Add the minced garlic and hot red pepper flakes to the skillet. Sauté for another minute until the garlic is fragrant.
4. Add the prosciutto and anchovy fillets to the skillet. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the prosciutto is crispy and the anchovies have melted into the sauce.
5. Stir in the capers, balsamic vinegar, and lemon juice. Cook for another minute to let the flavors meld together.
6. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to combine, ensuring the pasta is well coated with the sauce.
7. Tear the fresh basil leaves and sprinkle them over the pasta. Toss again to distribute the basil.
8. Serve the pasta hot, with extra hot red pepper flakes on top if desired."

input: Ingredients: fat free less sodium chicken broth, dry white wine, fresh lemon juice, capers, olive oil, butter, black pepper, broccoli rabe, lemon slices, seasoned bread crumbs, chicken cutlets, fresh parsley. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Lemon Caper Chicken Cutlets with Broccoli Rabe

Ingredients:
- 1 cup fat free less sodium chicken broth
- 1/2 cup dry white wine
- 3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice
- 2 tablespoons capers, drained
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1 bunch broccoli rabe, trimmed
- 2 lemon slices
- 1/2 cup seasoned bread crumbs
- 4 chicken cutlets
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley

Instructions:
1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 
2. Season chicken cutlets with black pepper and dredge in seasoned bread crumbs. 
3. Add chicken to the skillet and cook until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes on each side. Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add butter and let it melt. Add broccoli rabe and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside.
5. Add white wine to the skillet, scraping the pan to loosen any browned bits. Bring to a boil and cook until reduced by half.
6. Add chicken broth, lemon juice, and capers to the skillet. Bring to a simmer.
7. Return chicken to the skillet, add lemon slices, and simmer until chicken is cooked through, about 5 minutes.
8. Serve chicken with sauce and broccoli rabe, garnished with fresh parsley."

input: Ingredients: bell pepper, cream of chicken soup, onions, ground meat, rice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Creamy Chicken Soup

Ingredients:
- 4 large bell peppers
- 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of chicken soup
- 1 medium onion
- 1 lb ground meat (beef or turkey)
- 1 cup cooked rice

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut off the tops of the bell peppers and remove the seeds and membranes. Set aside.
3. Dice the onion and set aside.
4. In a large skillet, cook the ground meat over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain the excess fat.
5. Add the diced onion to the skillet and cook until it becomes translucent.
6. Stir in the cooked rice and half of the cream of chicken soup into the skillet. Mix well until all ingredients are combined.
7. Spoon the meat mixture into each bell pepper, filling it to the top.
8. Place the stuffed bell peppers upright in a baking dish.
9. Pour the remaining cream of chicken soup over the stuffed bell peppers.
10. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 45 minutes.
11. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until the bell peppers are tender.
12. Let the stuffed bell peppers cool for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: sugar, crushed red pepper, garlic cloves, fresh basil, red cabbage, salt, chopped fresh mint, water, purple onion, fresh lime juice, fish sauce, vegetable oil, dark sesame oil, serrano chile. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Thai Red Cabbage Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons sugar
- 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper
- 3 garlic cloves, minced
- 1/2 cup fresh basil, chopped
- 1 medium red cabbage, shredded
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh mint
- 1/4 cup water
- 1 large purple onion, thinly sliced
- 1/4 cup fresh lime juice
- 2 tablespoons fish sauce
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 1 tablespoon dark sesame oil
- 1 serrano chile, thinly sliced

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the shredded red cabbage and thinly sliced purple onion.
2. In a small saucepan, combine the sugar, water, and salt. Heat over medium heat until the sugar and salt have dissolved.
3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and add the crushed red pepper, minced garlic, fresh lime juice, fish sauce, vegetable oil, and dark sesame oil. Stir well to combine.
4. Pour the dressing over the cabbage and onion in the bowl. Toss well to coat all of the vegetables in the dressing.
5. Add the chopped fresh mint, fresh basil, and thinly sliced serrano chile to the bowl. Toss again to distribute the herbs and chile throughout the salad.
6. Let the salad sit for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld together."

input: Ingredients: vegetable oil, corn flour, salt, warm water, wheat flour. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Homemade Corn-Wheat Tortillas

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil
- 1 cup of corn flour
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 3/4 cup of warm water
- 1 cup of wheat flour

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the corn flour, wheat flour, and salt.
2. Add the vegetable oil to the flour mixture.
3. Gradually add the warm water, stirring until a dough forms.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface for about 2 minutes until it becomes smooth and elastic.
5. Divide the dough into 12 equal parts and roll each part into a ball.
6. Flatten each ball with a rolling pin into a thin round tortilla.
7. Heat a large non-stick skillet over medium heat.
8. Cook each tortilla for about 1 minute on each side or until lightly browned.
9. Keep the cooked tortillas warm by covering them with a clean kitchen towel.
10. Repeat the process with the remaining dough balls.
11. Serve the tortillas warm."

input: Ingredients: wheat bran, salt, low-fat buttermilk, flax seed meal, whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, molasses, baking powder. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Whole Wheat Bran and Flax Seed Bread

Ingredients:
- 2 cups wheat bran
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup low-fat buttermilk
- 1/2 cup flax seed meal
- 1 cup whole wheat flour
- 1 cup all-purpose flour
- 1/4 cup molasses
- 2 teaspoons baking powder

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius). Grease a loaf pan and set aside.

2. In a large bowl, combine the wheat bran, flax seed meal, whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, and salt. Mix until well combined.

3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the low-fat buttermilk and molasses until well combined.

4. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined. Be careful not to overmix.

5. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan, spreading it out evenly with a spatula.

6. Bake in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.

7. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

8. Slice and serve. Enjoy your homemade Whole Wheat Bran and Flax Seed Bread!"

input: Ingredients: jicama, seasoned rice wine vinegar, soba, mustard greens, scallions, salt, red bell pepper, sesame oil, english cucumber. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Jicama and Soba Noodle Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 medium jicama
- 1/4 cup seasoned rice wine vinegar
- 8 ounces soba
- 2 cups mustard greens
- 4 scallions
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 red bell pepper
- 2 tablespoons sesame oil
- 1 English cucumber

Instructions:
1. Peel and julienne the jicama and English cucumber. Set aside.
2. Thinly slice the red bell pepper and scallions. Set aside.
3. Roughly chop the mustard greens. Set aside.
4. Cook the soba noodles according to the package instructions. Once cooked, rinse under cold water and drain.
5. In a large bowl, combine the julienned jicama, sliced red bell pepper, chopped mustard greens, sliced scallions, and cooked soba noodles.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together the seasoned rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, and salt.
7. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss until well combined.
8. Serve the Jicama and Soba Noodle Salad immediately or refrigerate for later use."

input: Ingredients: manicotti shells, green onions, shredded Monterey Jack cheese, water, ground beef, picante sauce, sour cream, ground cumin, refried beans, dried oregano. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Mexican Stuffed Manicotti

Ingredients:
- 14 manicotti shells
- 1 bunch green onions, chopped
- 2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese
- 1/2 cup water
- 1 lb ground beef
- 1 cup picante sauce
- 1 cup sour cream
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 can (16 ounces) refried beans
- 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain the fat.
3. Stir in the refried beans, picante sauce, cumin, and oregano. Cook until heated through.
4. Meanwhile, cook the manicotti shells according to the package instructions. Drain and rinse under cold water.
5. Stuff each manicotti shell with the beef and bean mixture.
6. Spread half of the remaining beef and bean mixture on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Arrange the stuffed manicotti shells on top and cover with the remaining beef and bean mixture.
8. Pour the water around the edges of the dish.
9. Cover and bake for 40 minutes.
10. Uncover, sprinkle with cheese and green onions, then bake for 10 more minutes or until the cheese is melted.
11. Let stand for 5 minutes before serving. Top each serving with a dollop of sour cream."

input: Ingredients: saffron threads, olive oil, dry white wine, grape tomatoes, parmigiano reggiano cheese, salt, fresh rosemary, unsalted butter, orzo, black pepper, veal chops, garlic cloves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Saffron Orzo with Veal Chops and Grape Tomatoes

Ingredients:
- 1 pinch of saffron threads
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1/2 cup of dry white wine
- 1 cup of grape tomatoes
- 1/2 cup of grated parmigiano reggiano cheese
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 2 sprigs of fresh rosemary
- 2 tablespoons of unsalted butter
- 1 cup of orzo
- 1/2 teaspoon of black pepper
- 4 veal chops
- 2 garlic cloves, minced

Instructions:
1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the veal chops, season with salt and pepper, and cook until browned on both sides, about 4-5 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
2. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add the grape tomatoes and cook until they start to burst, about 2-3 minutes.
3. Deglaze the skillet with the dry white wine, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the skillet. Add the rosemary sprigs and let the wine reduce by half.
4. In a separate pot, bring water to a boil. Add the orzo and cook according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
5. In the same pot, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the saffron threads and let them infuse the butter for a minute. Add the cooked orzo back into the pot and stir until well coated in the saffron butter.
6. Add the grated parmigiano reggiano cheese to the orzo and stir until the cheese is melted and the orzo is creamy.
7. Serve the veal chops with the saffron orzo and grape tomatoes. Garnish with additional cheese if desired."

input: Ingredients: white onion, russet potatoes, chopped cilantro fresh, large eggs, coarse kosher salt, vegetable oil, ancho chile pepper, ground black pepper, watercress, masa. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Ancho Chile Potato Tacos with Watercress and Egg

Ingredients:
