input: Ingredients: water, all-purpose flour, unsalted butter, chopped pecans, sugar, salt, nectarines, large egg whites, apricot preserves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Nectarine Pecan Tart with Apricot Glaze

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of water
- 2 cups of all-purpose flour
- 1 cup of unsalted butter
- 1 cup of chopped pecans
- 1 cup of sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 4 nectarines, sliced
- 2 large egg whites
- 1/2 cup of apricot preserves

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, sugar, and salt.
3. Cut the unsalted butter into small pieces and add it to the flour mixture. Use your fingers to mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Stir in the chopped pecans.
5. Press the mixture into the bottom of a tart pan.
6. In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites until they form soft peaks.
7. Spread the beaten egg whites over the crust in the tart pan.
8. Arrange the sliced nectarines on top of the egg whites.
9. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the nectarines are tender.
10. While the tart is baking, heat the apricot preserves and water in a small saucepan over medium heat until the preserves are melted.
11. Remove the tart from the oven and immediately brush the apricot glaze over the hot nectarines.
12. Allow the tart to cool before serving. Enjoy your Nectarine Pecan Tart with Apricot Glaze!"

input: Ingredients: sugar, jalapeno chilies, all-purpose flour, unsalted butter, buttermilk, extra sharp cheddar cheese, baking soda, baking powder, roast red peppers, drain, yellow corn meal, large eggs, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Jalapeno Cheddar Cornbread

Ingredients:
- 1 cup yellow corn meal
- 1 cup all-purpose flour
- 1 tablespoon sugar
- 2 teaspoons baking powder
- 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 2 large eggs
- 1 cup buttermilk
- 1/4 cup unsalted butter, melted
- 1 cup extra sharp cheddar cheese, shredded
- 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and finely chopped
- 1/2 cup roast red peppers, drained and chopped

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a 9-inch round cake pan or cast-iron skillet.
2. In a large bowl, combine the corn meal, flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat the eggs and then add the buttermilk and melted butter. Mix well.
4. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
5. Fold in the shredded cheddar cheese, chopped jalapenos, and roasted red peppers.
6. Pour the batter into the prepared pan or skillet.
7. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the cornbread to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving. Enjoy your Spicy Jalapeno Cheddar Cornbread!"

input: Ingredients: water, purple onion, skinless chicken thighs, ground black pepper, sweet paprika, olive oil, salt, bay leaves, pitted prunes. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Paprika Chicken with Prunes and Onions

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of water
- 1 large purple onion
- 8 skinless chicken thighs
- 1 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 2 tablespoons sweet paprika
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 bay leaves
- 1 cup pitted prunes

Instructions:
1. Slice the purple onion into thin rings.
2. Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
3. Add the chicken thighs to the pan and season with salt and pepper. Cook until browned on both sides, about 5 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
5. In the same pan, add the sliced onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
6. Add the sweet paprika and bay leaves to the pan, stirring to combine with the onions.
7. Return the chicken to the pan, adding the pitted prunes and water.
8. Cover the pan and let it simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the flavors have melded together.
9. Serve the chicken hot, garnished with the cooked onions and prunes."

input: Ingredients: medium egg noodles, chinese five-spice powder, sunflower oil, stir fry vegetable blend, pork tenderloin, Madras curry powder, prawns, teriyaki sauce. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Five-Spice Pork and Prawn Stir Fry

Ingredients:
- 200g medium egg noodles
- 1 tsp Chinese five-spice powder
- 2 tbsp sunflower oil
- 400g stir fry vegetable blend
- 300g pork tenderloin
- 1 tsp Madras curry powder
- 200g prawns
- 3 tbsp teriyaki sauce

Instructions:
1. Cook the medium egg noodles according to the package instructions, then drain and set aside.
2. Slice the pork tenderloin into thin strips.
3. Heat 1 tbsp of sunflower oil in a large wok or frying pan over medium-high heat.
4. Add the pork tenderloin to the pan and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, or until cooked through.
5. Sprinkle the Chinese five-spice powder and Madras curry powder over the pork, stirring well to coat the meat in the spices.
6. Remove the pork from the pan and set aside.
7. Add the remaining 1 tbsp of sunflower oil to the pan.
8. Add the stir fry vegetable blend to the pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
9. Add the prawns to the pan and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, or until the prawns are pink and cooked through.
10. Return the pork to the pan and add the cooked noodles and teriyaki sauce.
11. Stir well to combine all the ingredients and heat through for 2-3 minutes.
12. Serve the Five-Spice Pork and Prawn Stir Fry hot. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: water, worcestershire sauce, salt, ketchup, chili powder, dry mustard, chicken pieces, chips, paprika, lemon juice, cider vinegar, butter, crushed red pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Barbecue Chicken with Chips

Ingredients:
- 8 chicken pieces
- 1 cup of water
- 1/2 cup of worcestershire sauce
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 cup of ketchup
- 1 tablespoon of chili powder
- 1 teaspoon of dry mustard
- 1 bag of chips
- 1 teaspoon of paprika
- 2 tablespoons of lemon juice
- 1/4 cup of cider vinegar
- 2 tablespoons of butter
- 1/2 teaspoon of crushed red pepper

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the water, worcestershire sauce, salt, ketchup, chili powder, dry mustard, paprika, lemon juice, cider vinegar, butter, and crushed red pepper. Stir until all the ingredients are well combined.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 15 minutes.
4. Place the chicken pieces in a baking dish and pour the sauce over them, making sure all the pieces are well coated.
5. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for about 45 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
6. Serve the spicy barbecue chicken with a side of chips."

input: Ingredients: tomato sauce, part-skim mozzarella cheese, part-skim ricotta cheese, frozen chopped spinach, low-fat cottage cheese, whole wheat lasagna noodles, shredded parmesan cheese, eggs, eggplant, garlic, olive oil, ground black pepper, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Healthy Spinach and Eggplant Lasagna

Ingredients:
- 3 cups of tomato sauce
- 2 cups of part-skim mozzarella cheese
- 1 cup of part-skim ricotta cheese
- 1 cup of frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
- 1 cup of low-fat cottage cheese
- 12 whole wheat lasagna noodles
- 1/2 cup of shredded parmesan cheese
- 2 eggs
- 1 large eggplant, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds
- 3 cloves of garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook lasagna noodles until al dente. Drain and set aside.
3. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
4. Add the eggplant slices to the skillet, season with salt and pepper, and cook until tender and slightly browned. Set aside.
5. In a large bowl, combine ricotta cheese, cottage cheese, spinach, and eggs. Mix until well combined.
6. Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Arrange a layer of lasagna noodles over the sauce. Spread a layer of the cheese and spinach mixture over the noodles. Arrange a layer of cooked eggplant slices over the cheese. Repeat these layers until all ingredients are used, ending with a layer of noodles.
8. Top the final layer of noodles with the remaining tomato sauce, then sprinkle with mozzarella and parmesan cheese.
9. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
10. Remove the foil and continue baking for another 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
11. Let the lasagna rest for 10 minutes before slicing and serving. Enjoy your Healthy Spinach and Eggplant Lasagna!"

input: Ingredients: fresh cilantro, zucchini, green onions, olive oil, Sriracha, crushed red pepper flakes, low sodium soy sauce, fresh ginger, large eggs, linguine, brown sugar, peanuts, mushrooms, garlic. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Zucchini and Mushroom Linguine Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
- 2 medium zucchinis, sliced
- 4 green onions, chopped
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 tablespoons Sriracha
- 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
- 1/4 cup low sodium soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated
- 2 large eggs, beaten
- 8 ounces linguine
- 2 tablespoons brown sugar
- 1/2 cup peanuts, chopped
- 1 cup mushrooms, sliced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced

Instructions:
1. Cook the linguine according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the beaten eggs and scramble until fully cooked. Remove from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add the remaining olive oil, garlic, and ginger. Sauté for about 1 minute until fragrant.
4. Add the zucchini and mushrooms to the pan. Cook for about 5 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
5. Stir in the Sriracha, soy sauce, brown sugar, and crushed red pepper flakes. Cook for another 2 minutes.
6. Add the cooked linguine, scrambled eggs, and half of the green onions to the pan. Toss everything together until the noodles are well coated in the sauce.
7. Serve the stir-fry topped with the chopped peanuts, remaining green onions, and fresh cilantro."

input: Ingredients: tomatoes, sea salt, olive oil, dry bread crumbs, fresh basil, garlic, jalapeno chilies. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Tomato and Basil Bruschetta 

Ingredients:
- 4 large tomatoes
- 1 teaspoon sea salt
- 3 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 cup dry bread crumbs
- 1 cup fresh basil leaves
- 2 cloves garlic
- 2 jalapeno chilies

Instructions:

1. Dice the tomatoes and place them in a large bowl.
2. Finely chop the fresh basil leaves and add them to the bowl with the tomatoes.
3. Mince the garlic and jalapeno chilies. Add these to the bowl as well.
4. Add the sea salt and 2 tablespoons of olive oil to the bowl. Stir all the ingredients together until they are well combined.
5. Cover the bowl and let it sit at room temperature for 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
7. Spread the bread crumbs out on a baking sheet and drizzle them with the remaining tablespoon of olive oil.
8. Toast the bread crumbs in the oven for about 5 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. Once the bread crumbs are toasted, remove them from the oven and let them cool.
10. Once the bread crumbs are cool, stir them into the tomato mixture.
11. Serve the bruschetta at room temperature. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: olive oil, garlic, frozen corn kernels, pasta, chili powder, greek style plain yogurt, green onions, shredded sharp cheddar cheese, green chile, diced tomatoes, yellow onion. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Corn and Green Chile Pasta

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup frozen corn kernels
- 8 ounces pasta
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1/2 cup Greek style plain yogurt
- 2 green onions, chopped
- 1 cup shredded sharp cheddar cheese
- 1 green chile, chopped
- 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes
- 1 yellow onion, chopped

Instructions:
1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the yellow onion, garlic, and green chile. Cook until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the frozen corn kernels to the skillet and cook for another 5 minutes, until the corn is heated through.
4. Stir in the diced tomatoes (with their juice) and chili powder. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and stir until it's well coated with the tomato and corn mixture.
6. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the Greek yogurt and shredded cheddar cheese until the pasta is creamy and the cheese is melted.
7. Sprinkle the chopped green onions on top of the pasta before serving."

input: Ingredients: shredded cheddar cheese, cooked ham, cream cheese, butter crackers, jalapeno chilies, round sourdough bread, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Ham and Cheese Stuffed Sourdough

Ingredients:
- 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
- 1 cup diced cooked ham
- 1 cup cream cheese
- 1 cup crushed butter crackers
- 2 jalapeno chilies, finely chopped
- 1 round sourdough bread
- 1 medium onion, finely chopped

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Cut the top off the round sourdough bread and hollow out the inside, leaving about a 1-inch thick shell.
3. In a large bowl, combine the shredded cheddar cheese, diced cooked ham, cream cheese, crushed butter crackers, finely chopped jalapeno chilies, and finely chopped onion. Mix until all ingredients are well incorporated.
4. Spoon the cheese and ham mixture into the hollowed-out sourdough bread. Replace the top of the bread.
5. Wrap the stuffed sourdough bread in aluminum foil and place it on a baking sheet.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for about 45 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the bread is crispy.
7. Allow the bread to cool for a few minutes before serving. Cut into wedges or serve as a pull-apart bread. Enjoy your Spicy Ham and Cheese Stuffed Sourdough!"

input: Ingredients: eggs, butter, milk, country ham, yellow corn meal, baking powder. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Country Ham and Cornmeal Pancakes

Ingredients:
- 2 large eggs
- 4 tablespoons of butter
- 1 cup of milk
- 1 cup of diced country ham
- 1 cup of yellow corn meal
- 2 teaspoons of baking powder

Instructions:
1. Preheat your griddle or skillet over medium heat.
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the yellow corn meal and baking powder.
3. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs, then add the milk and melted butter. Mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
5. Fold in the diced country ham.
6. Grease the preheated griddle or skillet with a small amount of butter.
7. Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the griddle for each pancake.
8. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
9. Serve the pancakes warm with additional butter if desired."

input: Ingredients: french bread, dried basil, garlic cloves, salt, olive oil, dried oregano. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Garlic and Herb French Bread

Ingredients:
- 1 loaf of French bread
- 2 teaspoons of dried basil
- 4 garlic cloves
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1/4 cup of olive oil
- 1 teaspoon of dried oregano

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Cut the French bread into slices, but not all the way through, leave about 1 inch at the bottom.
3. Mince the garlic cloves.
4. In a small bowl, combine the minced garlic, dried basil, dried oregano, salt, and olive oil.
5. Stir until all the ingredients are well mixed.
6. Using a spoon, spread the garlic and herb mixture between each slice of bread.
7. Wrap the bread in foil and place it on a baking sheet.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.
9. After 15 minutes, open the foil and bake for another 5 minutes to make the top crispy.
10. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: sugar, whipping cream, toasted almonds, powdered sugar, red currant jelly, cake flour, eggs, baking powder, vanilla extract, slivered almonds, amaretto, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Amaretto Almond Cake with Red Currant Jelly

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 cups of sugar
- 1 cup of whipping cream
- 1/2 cup of toasted almonds
- 1/2 cup of powdered sugar
- 1/2 cup of red currant jelly
- 2 cups of cake flour
- 4 eggs
- 2 teaspoons of baking powder
- 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract
- 1/2 cup of slivered almonds
- 2 tablespoons of amaretto
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan.

2. In a large bowl, combine the cake flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.

3. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs until they are light and fluffy. Gradually add the sugar mixture to the eggs, beating well after each addition.

4. Stir in the vanilla extract and amaretto.

5. Gradually add the whipping cream to the batter, mixing well after each addition.

6. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan. Sprinkle the top with the slivered and toasted almonds.

7. Bake in the preheated oven for 40-45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.

8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and allow it to cool completely on a wire rack.

9. Once the cake is cool, spread the red currant jelly over the top. Dust the top of the cake with the powdered sugar before serving."

input: Ingredients: spring mix, pico de gallo, tortillas, burgers, sour cream, shredded cheddar cheese. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cheesy Burger Tacos with Pico de Gallo

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of spring mix
- 1 cup of pico de gallo
- 4 tortillas
- 4 burgers
- 1/2 cup of sour cream
- 1 cup of shredded cheddar cheese

Instructions:
1. Cook the burgers on a grill or stovetop until they reach your desired level of doneness. Let them rest for a few minutes.
2. Warm the tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat until they are soft and pliable.
3. Cut the burgers into thin slices.
4. Assemble the tacos by placing a handful of spring mix on each tortilla.
5. Add the sliced burgers on top of the spring mix.
6. Sprinkle a generous amount of shredded cheddar cheese over the burgers.
7. Top each taco with a spoonful of pico de gallo.
8. Add a dollop of sour cream on top of the pico de gallo.
9. Serve immediately and enjoy your Cheesy Burger Tacos with Pico de Gallo."

input: Ingredients: pitted kalamata olives, balsamic vinegar, dried fig, olive oil, thyme sprigs, water, chopped fresh thyme, soft goat's cheese, ground black pepper, whole wheat english muffins. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Fig and Goat Cheese English Muffin with Kalamata Olive Tapenade

Ingredients:
- 1 cup pitted kalamata olives
- 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar
- 1/2 cup dried figs
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 thyme sprigs
- 1/4 cup water
- 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme
- 4 ounces soft goat's cheese
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 4 whole wheat English muffins

Instructions:
1. In a small saucepan, combine the dried figs, water, and thyme sprigs. Bring to a simmer over medium heat and cook until the figs are soft and the water has evaporated, about 10 minutes. Remove from heat and discard the thyme sprigs.
2. In a food processor, combine the softened figs, kalamata olives, balsamic vinegar, and olive oil. Pulse until a chunky paste forms. This is your tapenade.
3. Split the English muffins in half and toast them until they are golden brown.
4. Spread a generous amount of goat's cheese on each toasted muffin half.
5. Top the goat's cheese with a spoonful of the olive and fig tapenade.
6. Sprinkle the tapenade with chopped fresh thyme and ground black pepper.
7. Serve the English muffins warm. Enjoy your Fig and Goat Cheese English Muffin with Kalamata Olive Tapenade!"

input: Ingredients: ground ginger, sesame seeds, fresh green bean, rice, low sodium soy sauce, sesame oil, salt, onions, chicken broth, garlic powder, dry sherry, carrots, pepper, red pepper flakes, boneless skinless chicken. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sesame Ginger Chicken Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 1 lb boneless skinless chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces
- 1 cup fresh green beans, trimmed
- 1 cup carrots, sliced
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 2 cups rice
- 2 cups chicken broth
- 1/4 cup low sodium soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons sesame oil
- 2 tablespoons dry sherry
- 1 tablespoon sesame seeds
- 1 teaspoon ground ginger
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Cook the rice according to package instructions, using chicken broth instead of water.
2. Heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Add the chicken to the skillet, season with salt and pepper, and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the remaining sesame oil, onions, carrots, and green beans. Cook until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
5. Add the ground ginger, garlic powder, and red pepper flakes to the skillet and stir to combine.
6. Return the chicken to the skillet and add the soy sauce and dry sherry. Stir well to combine and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
7. Sprinkle the stir-fry with sesame seeds before serving over the cooked rice."

input: Ingredients: ketchup, red wine vinegar, celery, creole mustard, green onions, paprika, onions, lettuce leaves, worcestershire sauce, cooked shrimp, tomato purÃ©e, vegetable oil, flat leaf parsley. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creole Shrimp Lettuce Wraps

Ingredients:
- 1 cup cooked shrimp
- 1/2 cup ketchup
- 1/4 cup red wine vinegar
- 1/2 cup chopped celery
- 2 tablespoons creole mustard
- 1/4 cup chopped green onions
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- 1/2 cup chopped onions
- 8 large lettuce leaves
- 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
- 1/2 cup tomato purée
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 1/4 cup chopped flat leaf parsley

Instructions:
1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the onions and celery to the skillet and sauté until they are soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the cooked shrimp to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables.
4. In a small bowl, combine the ketchup, red wine vinegar, creole mustard, Worcestershire sauce, tomato purée, and paprika. Stir until well combined.
5. Pour the sauce mixture over the shrimp and vegetables in the skillet. Stir to combine and coat the shrimp and vegetables in the sauce.
6. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
7. Stir in the chopped green onions and flat leaf parsley.
8. Spoon the shrimp mixture onto the lettuce leaves, fold in the sides and roll up to serve. Enjoy your Creole Shrimp Lettuce Wraps!"

input: Ingredients: cooking oil, salt, brewed coffee, baking powder, cream of tartar, egg yolks, white sugar, egg whites, all-purpose flour. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Coffee Angel Food Cake

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of all-purpose flour
- 1 1/2 cups of white sugar
- 12 egg whites
- 1 1/2 teaspoons of cream of tartar
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1 teaspoon of baking powder
- 1/2 cup of brewed coffee
- 3 egg yolks
- 1 tablespoon of cooking oil

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
2. In a large bowl, combine 1 cup of all-purpose flour and 1/2 cup of white sugar. Set aside.
3. In a separate large bowl, beat 12 egg whites until foamy. Add 1 1/2 teaspoons of cream of tartar, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, and 1 teaspoon of baking powder. Beat the mixture until soft peaks form.
4. Gradually add the remaining 1 cup of white sugar, and continue beating until stiff peaks form.
5. Gently fold in the flour mixture into the egg white mixture, a little at a time, until it is fully incorporated.
6. In a separate bowl, mix together 1/2 cup of brewed coffee, 3 egg yolks, and 1 tablespoon of cooking oil. Gently fold this into the egg white and flour mixture.
7. Pour the batter into an ungreased 10-inch tube pan.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until the top springs back when lightly touched.
9. Invert the pan on a wire rack and let it cool completely. Once cooled, run a knife around the edges of the pan to loosen the cake, then remove it from the pan.
10. Slice and serve the Coffee Angel Food Cake as desired."

input: Ingredients: ground black pepper, fine sea salt, ground cumin, olive oil, fresh thyme leaves, sea salt flakes, chickpea flour, zucchini, apricots, base, tart. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Zucchini and Apricot Chickpea Tart

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 teaspoon fine sea salt
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves
- 1/2 teaspoon sea salt flakes
- 1 cup chickpea flour
- 2 medium zucchini, thinly sliced
- 6 fresh apricots, halved and pitted
- 1 pre-made tart base

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Place the tart base in a tart pan and set aside.
3. In a large bowl, combine the chickpea flour, ground cumin, fine sea salt, and ground black pepper.
4. Gradually add in 1 tablespoon of olive oil while stirring the mixture until it forms a dough.
5. Press the dough evenly into the tart base.
6. Arrange the thinly sliced zucchini and halved apricots on top of the dough in the tart base.
7. Drizzle the remaining olive oil over the zucchini and apricots.
8. Sprinkle the fresh thyme leaves and sea salt flakes over the top.
9. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges of the tart are golden brown and the zucchini and apricots are tender.
10. Allow the tart to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving. Enjoy your Zucchini and Apricot Chickpea Tart!"

input: Ingredients: sugar, large eggs, apricots, water, heavy cream, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, sliced almonds, almond extract, grappa. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Apricot Almond Grappa Cream Dessert

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of sugar
- 3 large eggs
- 10 fresh apricots
- 1/2 cup of water
- 2 cups of heavy cream
- Zest of 1 lemon
- 2 tablespoons of fresh lemon juice
- 1/2 cup of sliced almonds
- 1 teaspoon of almond extract
- 1/4 cup of grappa

Instructions:
1. Cut the apricots in half and remove the pits. Place them in a saucepan with the water, half of the sugar (1/2 cup), and lemon zest. Simmer over medium heat until the apricots are soft and the sugar is fully dissolved.
2. Once the apricots are soft, remove from heat and let them cool. Once cooled, blend the mixture until smooth.
3. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs with the remaining sugar (1/2 cup) until the mixture is light and fluffy.
4. In another bowl, whip the heavy cream until it forms soft peaks. Fold in the almond extract and grappa.
5. Gradually add the egg mixture to the whipped cream, folding gently to keep the mixture light.
6. Stir in the apricot puree and fresh lemon juice until well combined.
7. Pour the mixture into a serving dish and sprinkle the sliced almonds on top.
8. Chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving."

input: Ingredients: pepper, worcestershire sauce, salt, shrimp, fresh thyme leaves, vegetable broth, ham, sliced green onions, dry white wine, heavy cream, cayenne pepper, corn grits, butter, garlic, fresh lemon juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Shrimp and Ham Grits

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon of pepper
- 2 tablespoons of Worcestershire sauce
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 pound of shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1 tablespoon of fresh thyme leaves
- 2 cups of vegetable broth
- 1 cup of ham, diced
- 1/2 cup of sliced green onions
- 1/2 cup of dry white wine
- 1 cup of heavy cream
- 1/2 teaspoon of cayenne pepper
- 1 cup of corn grits
- 2 tablespoons of butter
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons of fresh lemon juice

Instructions:
1. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
2. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the ham and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the ham from the skillet and set aside with the shrimp.
4. Deglaze the skillet with the white wine, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the skillet. 
5. Add the vegetable broth, Worcestershire sauce, thyme, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Slowly whisk in the corn grits, then reduce the heat to low and cover the skillet. Cook the grits, stirring occasionally, until they are tender and have absorbed the broth, about 15-20 minutes.
7. Stir in the heavy cream, then return the shrimp and ham to the skillet. Cook until the shrimp and ham are heated through, about 2-3 minutes.
8. Stir in the lemon juice and green onions, then remove the skillet from the heat. 
9. Serve the creamy shrimp and ham grits hot. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: roquefort, wine, pepper, unsalted butter. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Roquefort and Wine Butter Sauce

Ingredients:
- 100g Roquefort cheese
- 1 cup of red wine
- 1/2 teaspoon of pepper
- 100g unsalted butter

Instructions:
1. In a saucepan, melt the unsalted butter over medium heat.
2. Add the red wine to the saucepan and stir until well combined.
3. Crumble the Roquefort cheese into the saucepan, stirring continuously until it melts into the wine and butter mixture.
4. Add the pepper and stir until well combined.
5. Continue to cook the sauce on low heat for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Once the sauce has thickened to your liking, remove from heat.
7. Serve immediately over your dish of choice."

input: Ingredients: fresh ginger, rolls, white vinegar, dry sherry, corn starch, black bean sauce, scallions, honey, duck. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Honey-Glazed Duck Rolls with Black Bean Sauce

Ingredients:
- 1 whole duck (about 4-5 pounds)
- 2 tablespoons fresh ginger, grated
- 4 rolls
- 1/4 cup white vinegar
- 1/4 cup dry sherry
- 2 tablespoons corn starch
- 1/2 cup black bean sauce
- 4 scallions, chopped
- 1/2 cup honey

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). 

2. Rinse the duck and pat dry. Rub the duck inside and out with the grated ginger.

3. In a small bowl, mix together the honey, vinegar, and dry sherry. Brush this mixture all over the duck.

4. Place the duck on a rack in a roasting pan and roast in the preheated oven for about 2 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C). Baste the duck with the honey mixture every 30 minutes.

5. While the duck is roasting, prepare the black bean sauce. In a small bowl, mix together the black bean sauce and corn starch until smooth.

6. Remove the duck from the oven and let it rest for 15 minutes. Then, carve the duck and slice it into thin pieces.

7. Warm the rolls and cut them in half. Spread a generous amount of the black bean sauce on each half.

8. Place the sliced duck on the bottom half of each roll. Top with chopped scallions and the top half of the roll.

9. Serve the Honey-Glazed Duck Rolls with Black Bean Sauce immediately and enjoy."

input: Ingredients: beef tenderloin, soy sauce, corn starch, cooking oil, snow peas, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Stir-Fried Beef Tenderloin with Snow Peas

Ingredients:
- 1 lb beef tenderloin
- 1/4 cup soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons corn starch
- 2 tablespoons cooking oil
- 2 cups snow peas
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. Slice the beef tenderloin into thin strips.
2. In a bowl, mix the soy sauce and corn starch until smooth. Add the beef strips and toss to coat. Let it marinate for 15 minutes.
3. Heat 1 tablespoon of cooking oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
4. Add the beef strips and stir-fry for about 2-3 minutes or until they are browned. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil. Add the snow peas and salt, and stir-fry for about 2 minutes or until they are tender-crisp.
6. Return the beef to the skillet and stir-fry for another minute to combine with the snow peas.
7. Serve hot."

input: Ingredients: chopped tomatoes, marinade, pinto beans, kosher salt, flour tortillas, purple onion, chopped cilantro, sirloin tip, ground black pepper, vegetable oil, fresh lime juice, minced garlic, jalapeno chilies, salsa, serrano chile. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Sirloin Tip and Pinto Bean Tacos

Ingredients:
- 1 pound sirloin tip
- 1 cup marinade
- 1 can (15 ounces) pinto beans
- 1 teaspoon kosher salt
- 8 small flour tortillas
- 1 medium purple onion, chopped
- 1/2 cup chopped cilantro
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- Juice of 2 fresh limes
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and chopped
- 1 cup salsa
- 1 serrano chile, seeded and chopped
- 1 cup chopped tomatoes

Instructions:
1. Marinate the sirloin tip in the marinade for at least 2 hours, or overnight if possible.
2. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the marinated sirloin tip and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Add the chopped purple onion, minced garlic, jalapeno chilies, and serrano chile to the skillet. Cook until the onions are translucent and the peppers are softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Drain the pinto beans and add them to the skillet. Stir in the kosher salt and ground black pepper.
5. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and let the mixture simmer for about 15 minutes.
6. Warm the flour tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat until they are soft and pliable.
7. To assemble the tacos, spoon some of the sirloin and bean mixture onto each tortilla. Top with chopped tomatoes, chopped cilantro, and a squeeze of fresh lime juice.
8. Serve the tacos with salsa on the side. Enjoy your Spicy Sirloin Tip and Pinto Bean Tacos!"

input: Ingredients: pepper, cooking spray, ground allspice, rutabaga, dried thyme, beef broth, lamb leg, water, quick-cooking barley, carrots, green cabbage, garlic powder, chopped onion, bay leaf. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Lamb and Vegetable Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 lamb leg (about 2 pounds)
- 1 teaspoon ground allspice
- 1 teaspoon dried thyme
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 1 large rutabaga, peeled and cubed
- 2 large carrots, peeled and sliced
- 1/2 green cabbage, chopped
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1 bay leaf
- 4 cups beef broth
- 2 cups water
- 1 cup quick-cooking barley
- Cooking spray

Instructions:
1. Spray a large pot with cooking spray and place it over medium heat.
2. Add the lamb leg to the pot and brown on all sides. Remove the lamb and set it aside.
3. In the same pot, add the chopped onion and cook until it becomes translucent.
4. Add the ground allspice, dried thyme, garlic powder, and pepper to the pot. Stir well to combine with the onions.
5. Return the lamb leg to the pot. Add the rutabaga, carrots, cabbage, and bay leaf.
6. Pour in the beef broth and water. Bring the mixture to a boil.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 1.5 hours, or until the lamb is tender.
8. Remove the lamb from the pot and let it cool. Once cool, remove the meat from the bone and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
9. While the lamb is cooling, add the barley to the pot and let it simmer for about 10 minutes, or until the barley is tender.
10. Return the lamb pieces to the pot. Stir well to combine.
11. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, then remove the bay leaf before serving."

input: Ingredients: mustard, pepper, tahini, whole wheat tortillas, lemon juice, tumeric, nutritional yeast, mushrooms, salt, onions, spinach, water, potatoes, low-fat soy milk, corn starch, black beans, garlic powder, onion powder, salsa, olives. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Vegan Spinach and Mushroom Enchiladas

Ingredients and Amounts:
- 4 whole wheat tortillas
- 2 cups of spinach
- 1 cup of mushrooms
- 1 onion
- 2 potatoes
- 1 cup of black beans
- 1/2 cup of olives
- 1 cup of salsa
- 2 tablespoons of tahini
- 1 tablespoon of mustard
- 1 tablespoon of lemon juice
- 1 teaspoon of tumeric
- 2 tablespoons of nutritional yeast
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 teaspoon of pepper
- 2 cloves of garlic powder
- 1 teaspoon of onion powder
- 1 cup of low-fat soy milk
- 2 tablespoons of corn starch
- 1/2 cup of water

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees.
2. Dice the onion, mushrooms, and potatoes. Slice the olives.
3. In a large pan, sauté the onions and mushrooms until they are soft.
4. Add the spinach, potatoes, black beans, olives, and salsa to the pan. Stir well.
5. In a small bowl, mix together the tahini, mustard, lemon juice, tumeric, nutritional yeast, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder.
6. Pour the tahini mixture into the pan with the vegetables. Stir well.
7. In a separate bowl, mix together the soy milk and corn starch until there are no lumps. Add this to the pan and stir well.
8. Cook the mixture on medium heat until it thickens.
9. Spoon the mixture onto the tortillas and roll them up. Place them in a baking dish.
10. Pour the remaining sauce over the tortillas.
11. Bake for 20 minutes, or until the tortillas are crispy and golden.
12. Serve hot. Enjoy your Vegan Spinach and Mushroom Enchiladas!"

input: Ingredients: marmite, cream cheese, bagels. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Marmite and Cream Cheese Bagel

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons of Marmite
- 4 tablespoons of Cream Cheese
- 2 Bagels

Instructions:
1. Slice the bagels in half.
2. Toast the bagel halves until they are golden brown.
3. Spread 1 tablespoon of cream cheese on each bagel half.
4. Add 1/2 tablespoon of marmite on top of the cream cheese on each bagel half.
5. Serve the bagels while they are still warm. Enjoy your Marmite and Cream Cheese Bagel."

input: Ingredients: water, raisins, cumin seed, cashew nuts, clove, bay leaves, salt, onions, saffron threads, chopped almonds, whipping cream, cinnamon sticks, basmati rice, black peppercorns, vegetable oil, cardamom pods, frozen peas. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Saffron Rice with Nuts and Peas

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of water
- 1/2 cup of raisins
- 1 teaspoon of cumin seeds
- 1/2 cup of cashew nuts
- 2 cloves
- 2 bay leaves
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 large onion, finely chopped
- A pinch of saffron threads
- 1/4 cup of chopped almonds
- 1/2 cup of whipping cream
- 2 cinnamon sticks
- 1 cup of basmati rice
- 1 teaspoon of black peppercorns
- 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil
- 4 cardamom pods
- 1 cup of frozen peas

Instructions:
1. Rinse the basmati rice under cold water until the water runs clear. Soak the rice in 2 cups of water for 30 minutes.
2. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the cumin seeds, cloves, bay leaves, cinnamon sticks, black peppercorns, and cardamom pods. Cook for 2 minutes until fragrant.
3. Add the chopped onion to the pan and sauté until it becomes translucent.
4. Drain the rice and add it to the pan. Stir well to coat the rice with the spices and oil.
5. Add the saffron threads, salt, and 2 cups of water to the pan. Bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and let it simmer for 15 minutes.
7. While the rice is cooking, in a separate pan, toast the cashew nuts and chopped almonds until they are golden brown.
8. After 15 minutes, add the frozen peas, raisins, toasted nuts, and whipping cream to the rice. Stir gently to combine.
9. Cover the pan again and cook for another 5 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the peas are cooked.
10. Remove the pan from the heat and let it stand for 5 minutes before serving. Enjoy your Saffron Rice with Nuts and Peas."

input: Ingredients: almonds, confectioners sugar, orange, almond extract, large eggs, superfine sugar, lemon. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Almond Citrus Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of almonds
- 1 cup of confectioners sugar
- 1 large orange
- 1 teaspoon of almond extract
- 4 large eggs
- 1 cup of superfine sugar
- 1 large lemon

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a 9-inch round cake pan and line it with parchment paper.

2. In a food processor, grind the almonds until they are finely ground.

3. Zest the orange and lemon. Squeeze out the juice and set aside.

4. In a large bowl, beat the eggs until they are light and fluffy. Gradually add the superfine sugar, beating continuously.

5. Stir in the ground almonds, citrus zest, and almond extract into the egg mixture. Mix until well combined.

6. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.

7. Bake in the preheated oven for about 40-45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.

8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

9. Once the cake is cooled, dust it with the confectioners sugar.

10. Serve the cake with the reserved orange and lemon juice drizzled over the top."

input: Ingredients: black pepper, salt, chili powder, corn starch, garlic powder, sweet paprika, chicken bouillon granules, onion powder, ground cumin. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chicken Seasoning Mix

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon black pepper
- 2 teaspoons salt
- 1 tablespoon chili powder
- 2 tablespoons corn starch
- 1 tablespoon garlic powder
- 1 tablespoon sweet paprika
- 2 teaspoons chicken bouillon granules
- 1 tablespoon onion powder
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin

Instructions:
1. In a small bowl, combine 1 teaspoon of black pepper, 2 teaspoons of salt, 1 tablespoon of chili powder, 2 tablespoons of corn starch, 1 tablespoon of garlic powder, 1 tablespoon of sweet paprika, 2 teaspoons of chicken bouillon granules, 1 tablespoon of onion powder, and 1 teaspoon of ground cumin.
2. Mix all the ingredients together until well combined.
3. Store the seasoning mix in an airtight container.
4. Use this mix to season chicken before grilling, baking, or frying. For best results, use about 1 tablespoon of seasoning per pound of chicken."

input: Ingredients: olive oil, coarse salt, all purpose unbleached flour, red bell pepper, mozzarella cheese, dry yeast, chopped fresh thyme, purple onion, honey, grated parmesan cheese, large garlic cloves, all-purpose flour, warm water, prosciutto, balsamic vinegar, worcestershire sauce. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Prosciutto and Mozzarella Pizza with Balsamic Glaze

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon coarse salt
- 2 cups all purpose unbleached flour
- 1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced
- 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
- 1 packet (2 1/4 teaspoons) dry yeast
- 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme
- 1 purple onion, thinly sliced
- 1 tablespoon honey
- 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 2 large garlic cloves, minced
- 1/2 cup warm water (110 degrees F)
- 6 slices prosciutto
- 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar
- 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the yeast, honey, and warm water. Let it sit for 5 minutes until it becomes frothy.
2. Add the all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon of olive oil, and 1/2 teaspoon of coarse salt to the yeast mixture. Stir until a dough forms.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface for about 5 minutes until it's smooth and elastic. Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover it with a towel, and let it rise for 1 hour.
4. Preheat your oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C). If you have a pizza stone, place it in the oven while it preheats.
5. In a skillet, heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and bell pepper, and cook until they're soft and slightly caramelized.
6. Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness. If you're using a pizza stone, transfer the dough to a pizza peel or an inverted baking sheet dusted with flour.
7. Spread the cooked onions and bell peppers evenly over the dough, leaving a border for the crust. Top with the mozzarella and parmesan cheese, then arrange the prosciutto slices on top.
8. Transfer the pizza to the preheated oven (or onto the pizza stone if using) and bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly and slightly browned.
9. While the pizza is baking, combine the balsamic vinegar and Worcestershire sauce in a small saucepan. Bring to a simmer over medium heat and cook until it reduces to a glaze.
10. Remove the pizza from the oven and drizzle the balsamic glaze over the top. Sprinkle with the chopped fresh thyme and the remaining coarse salt. Slice and serve immediately."

input: Ingredients: celery ribs, green bell pepper, worcestershire sauce, okra, onions, tomatoes, frozen whole kernel corn, hot sauce, garlic cloves, chicken broth, olive oil, salt, freshly ground pepper, sliced green onions, cooked rice, dry white wine, creole seasoning, field peas. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creole Vegetable Medley

Ingredients:
- 2 celery ribs, chopped
- 1 green bell pepper, chopped
- 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
- 1 cup okra, sliced
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 2 large tomatoes, chopped
- 1 cup frozen whole kernel corn
- 1 teaspoon hot sauce
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- 2 cups chicken broth
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- Salt to taste
- Freshly ground pepper to taste
- 1/2 cup sliced green onions
- 2 cups cooked rice
- 1/2 cup dry white wine
- 1 tablespoon Creole seasoning
- 1 cup field peas

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
2. Add the celery, bell pepper, and onion to the pot. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the garlic to the pot and cook for another minute.
4. Stir in the tomatoes, okra, corn, and field peas.
5. Pour in the chicken broth and white wine. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Add the Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, Creole seasoning, salt, and pepper. Stir well to combine.
7. Cover the pot and let the mixture simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the vegetables are cooked to your liking.
8. Stir in the sliced green onions and cooked rice. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the rice is heated through.
9. Taste and adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve hot."

input: Ingredients: amaretti, fresh lemon juice, vanilla extract, balsamic vinegar, frozen strawberries, sugar, strawberries. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Strawberry Balsamic Amaretti Dessert

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of amaretti
- 2 tablespoons of fresh lemon juice
- 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract
- 2 tablespoons of balsamic vinegar
- 2 cups of frozen strawberries
- 1/2 cup of sugar
- 1 cup of fresh strawberries

Instructions:

1. In a saucepan, combine the frozen strawberries, sugar, and balsamic vinegar. 
2. Cook over medium heat until the strawberries are soft and the sugar has dissolved, about 10 minutes.
3. Remove from heat and stir in the fresh lemon juice and vanilla extract.
4. Allow the mixture to cool slightly, then transfer to a blender or food processor.
5. Blend until smooth, then strain through a fine-mesh sieve to remove any seeds.
6. Pour the mixture into a bowl and refrigerate until chilled, about 2 hours.
7. Once chilled, divide the mixture among four dessert glasses.
8. Top each serving with a layer of crushed amaretti and a few fresh strawberries.
9. Serve immediately and enjoy your Strawberry Balsamic Amaretti Dessert."

input: Ingredients: white vinegar, minced garlic, cilantro, onions, black beans, Tabasco Pepper Sauce, salt, green bell pepper, olive oil, white rice, dried oregano, pepper, lime wedges, red bell pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Black Beans and Rice

Ingredients:
- 1 cup white rice
- 2 cups water
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 green bell pepper, chopped
- 1 red bell pepper, chopped
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 1 can (15 ounces) black beans, drained and rinsed
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 1 tablespoon white vinegar
- 1 tablespoon Tabasco Pepper Sauce
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
- 2 lime wedges

Instructions:
1. In a saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the rice, reduce heat to low, cover, and let simmer for 20 minutes or until rice is tender and water is absorbed.
2. While the rice is cooking, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chopped onion, green bell pepper, and red bell pepper. Cook until vegetables are softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and cook for another minute.
4. Stir in the black beans, dried oregano, salt, and pepper. Cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the white vinegar and Tabasco Pepper Sauce to the skillet. Stir to combine and cook for another 2 minutes.
6. Once the rice is done, add it to the skillet and stir to combine with the other ingredients.
7. Remove from heat and stir in the chopped cilantro.
8. Serve hot with a lime wedge on the side."

input: Ingredients: sugar, fino sherry, water. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Fino Sherry Simple Syrup

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of sugar
- 1 cup of fino sherry
- 1 cup of water

Instructions:
1. In a medium saucepan, combine 1 cup of sugar and 1 cup of water.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring until the sugar has completely dissolved.
3. Once the sugar is dissolved, reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for about 10 minutes.
4. After 10 minutes, remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool down.
5. Once the mixture is cool, stir in 1 cup of fino sherry.
6. Store the syrup in a clean glass jar or bottle in the refrigerator. It can be used to sweeten cocktails, coffee, or desserts."

input: Ingredients: black pepper, salt, white sandwich bread, whole milk, Maggi, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, cooked ham, mushrooms, sour cream. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Ham and Mushroom Toast

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 4 slices white sandwich bread
- 1 cup whole milk
- 1 tablespoon Maggi
- 2 tablespoons unsalted butter
- 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
- 1 cup cooked ham, diced
- 1 cup mushrooms, sliced
- 1/2 cup sour cream

Instructions:
1. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the mushrooms and cook until they are soft and browned, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the diced ham to the skillet and cook for another 2-3 minutes until it is heated through.
3. Sprinkle the flour over the ham and mushrooms, stirring to coat them evenly. Cook for another minute.
4. Slowly pour in the milk, stirring constantly to prevent lumps from forming. Add the Maggi, salt, and black pepper. Continue to cook and stir until the sauce has thickened, about 5 minutes.
5. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the sour cream until it is fully incorporated.
6. Toast the bread slices to your desired level of crispness.
7. Spoon the creamy ham and mushroom mixture over the toasted bread slices and serve immediately. Enjoy your Creamy Ham and Mushroom Toast!"

input: Ingredients: grated parmesan cheese, bow-tie pasta, cooked ham, red pepper, freshly ground pepper, Alfredo sauce, chopped fresh sage, olive oil, garlic. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Ham and Red Pepper Bow-Tie Pasta

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of grated parmesan cheese
- 8 ounces of bow-tie pasta
- 1 cup of cooked ham, diced
- 1 red pepper, diced
- 1/2 teaspoon of freshly ground pepper
- 1 jar (15 ounces) of Alfredo sauce
- 2 tablespoons of chopped fresh sage
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced

Instructions:
1. Cook the bow-tie pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. While the pasta is cooking, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the diced ham to the skillet and cook until it starts to brown, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the diced red pepper to the skillet and cook until it's tender, about 5 minutes.
5. Stir in the Alfredo sauce and freshly ground pepper. Reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 5 minutes.
6. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and stir until it's well coated with the sauce.
7. Stir in the chopped fresh sage and half of the grated parmesan cheese until well combined.
8. Serve the pasta in bowls, topped with the remaining grated parmesan cheese."

input: Ingredients: whole grain mustard, onions, pepper, garlic, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, corned beef, Guinness Beer, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Guinness Braised Corned Beef

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon whole grain mustard
- 2 large onions, sliced
- 1 teaspoon pepper
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/4 cup brown sugar
- 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
- 3 pounds corned beef
- 1 can (14.9 oz) Guinness Beer
- 1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large Dutch oven, place the sliced onions at the bottom.
3. Rub the corned beef with the whole grain mustard, then sprinkle with pepper and salt.
4. Place the corned beef on top of the onions in the Dutch oven.
5. Sprinkle the minced garlic and brown sugar over the corned beef.
6. Drizzle the Worcestershire sauce over the top.
7. Pour the Guinness beer into the Dutch oven, around the sides of the corned beef.
8. Cover the Dutch oven and place in the preheated oven.
9. Cook for about 3 hours, or until the corned beef is tender.
10. Once cooked, remove from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing.
11. Serve the corned beef with the onions and some of the cooking liquid. Enjoy your Guinness Braised Corned Beef!"

input: Ingredients: light soy sauce, ginger, corn starch, Shaoxing wine, garlic, beef brisket, star anise, cinnamon sticks, rock sugar, daikon, sauce. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chinese Braised Beef Brisket with Daikon Radish

Ingredients:
- 1.5 lbs beef brisket
- 2 tablespoons light soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon corn starch
- 1/4 cup Shaoxing wine
- 3 cloves garlic
- 2 slices ginger
- 2 star anise
- 2 cinnamon sticks
- 2 tablespoons rock sugar
- 1 large daikon
- 1/4 cup sauce (soy sauce)

Instructions:
1. Cut the beef brisket into large chunks and marinate with light soy sauce and corn starch for 30 minutes.
2. Peel and slice the ginger. Peel and mince the garlic. Peel and cut the daikon into large chunks.
3. Heat a pot over medium heat, add the beef brisket and sear until browned on all sides. Remove the beef from the pot and set aside.
4. In the same pot, add the ginger, garlic, star anise, and cinnamon sticks. Stir-fry until fragrant.
5. Add the rock sugar to the pot and stir until it melts and turns a caramel color.
6. Return the beef to the pot and add the Shaoxing wine. Stir well to combine.
7. Add the daikon and enough water to cover the beef and daikon. Bring to a boil.
8. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 2 hours, or until the beef is tender.
9. Add the sauce (soy sauce) and stir well. Simmer for another 10 minutes.
10. Serve the braised beef brisket with daikon radish hot. Enjoy your meal!"

input: Ingredients: pepper, tomatillos, chicken, jack, salt, lime, garlic, plain yogurt, tortillas, Hatch Green Chiles. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hatch Green Chile Chicken Enchiladas

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon of pepper
- 8 tomatillos
- 2 chicken breasts
- 2 cups of shredded jack cheese
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 lime
- 2 cloves of garlic
- 1 cup of plain yogurt
- 8 tortillas
- 2 Hatch Green Chiles

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees.
2. Boil the chicken breasts until fully cooked, then shred them.
3. Roast the tomatillos and Hatch Green Chiles in the oven for about 15 minutes, or until they're charred.
4. Peel and deseed the chiles and tomatillos, then blend them with the garlic, salt, pepper, and the juice of the lime until smooth.
5. Mix half of the sauce with the shredded chicken.
6. Spread a thin layer of the sauce on the bottom of a baking dish.
7. Fill each tortilla with the chicken mixture and a sprinkle of cheese, then roll them up and place them in the baking dish.
8. Pour the remaining sauce over the enchiladas and sprinkle the rest of the cheese on top.
9. Bake for 20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the enchiladas with a dollop of plain yogurt on top."

input: Ingredients: pasta sauce, crushed tomatoes, marinara sauce, garlic, ground beef, green bell pepper, kosher salt, grated parmesan cheese, parsley, thyme, oregano, tomato paste, white wine, parmesan cheese, cheese slices, yellow onion, spaghetti, bread, sugar, olive oil, bay leaves, crushed red pepper, fresh parsley. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Spaghetti Bolognese with Garlic Bread

Ingredients:
- 1 lb spaghetti
- 1 lb ground beef
- 1 jar (24 oz) pasta sauce
- 1 can (14.5 oz) crushed tomatoes
- 1/2 cup marinara sauce
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 green bell pepper, diced
- 1 tsp kosher salt
- 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 1 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped
- 1/2 tsp thyme
- 1/2 tsp oregano
- 2 tbsp tomato paste
- 1/4 cup white wine
- 4 slices of bread
- 1 tbsp sugar
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 2 bay leaves
- 1/2 tsp crushed red pepper
- 1 yellow onion, diced
- 4 slices of cheese

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion, bell pepper, and garlic. Cook until softened.
3. Add ground beef to the skillet. Cook until browned and drain excess fat.
4. Stir in pasta sauce, crushed tomatoes, marinara sauce, tomato paste, white wine, sugar, bay leaves, thyme, oregano, crushed red pepper, and kosher salt. Bring to a simmer.
5. Reduce heat to low, cover, and let it simmer for 30 minutes.
6. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Place bread slices on a baking sheet. Top each slice with a cheese slice and sprinkle with garlic. Bake until cheese is melted and bread is toasted.
7. Stir in half of the parmesan cheese into the sauce. Add cooked spaghetti and toss until well coated.
8. Serve spaghetti with a sprinkle of remaining parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, and a side of garlic bread."

input: Ingredients: large eggs, butter, panko breadcrumbs, black pepper, cooking spray, all-purpose flour, italian seasoning, grated parmesan cheese, salt, garlic salt, milk, chives, chicken fingers. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Parmesan Crusted Chicken Fingers

Ingredients:
- 1.5 lbs chicken fingers
- 2 large eggs
- 1 cup panko breadcrumbs
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- Cooking spray
- 1 cup all-purpose flour
- 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning
- 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic salt
- 1/4 cup milk
- 2 tablespoons chopped chives
- 2 tablespoons butter

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and lightly grease a baking sheet with cooking spray.
2. In a shallow dish, whisk together the eggs and milk.
3. In a separate dish, combine the panko breadcrumbs, Italian seasoning, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, garlic salt, and black pepper.
4. Dredge each chicken finger in the flour, shaking off any excess. Then dip it into the egg mixture, and finally coat it in the breadcrumb mixture. Place the coated chicken fingers on the prepared baking sheet.
5. Melt the butter and drizzle it over the chicken fingers.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the coating is golden brown and crispy.
7. Sprinkle the cooked chicken fingers with chopped chives before serving."

input: Ingredients: romano cheese, ground black pepper, garlic cloves, sundried tomato paste, olive oil, dry white wine, sliced green onions, fava beans, morel, salt, arborio rice, fat free less sodium chicken broth, leeks, boiling water. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sundried Tomato and Morel Risotto

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of grated Romano cheese
- 1 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 3 garlic cloves, minced
- 2 tablespoons of sundried tomato paste
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1/2 cup of dry white wine
- 1/2 cup of sliced green onions
- 1 cup of shelled fava beans
- 1 cup of morels, cleaned and sliced
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 1/2 cups of Arborio rice
- 4 cups of fat-free less sodium chicken broth
- 2 leeks, cleaned and thinly sliced
- 1 cup of boiling water

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the leeks and garlic, sauté until they are soft and fragrant.
2. Add the Arborio rice to the pan, stir to coat the rice in the oil and cook until the edges become translucent, about 2 minutes.
3. Pour in the white wine, stirring constantly until the wine is fully absorbed.
4. Add 1 cup of the chicken broth to the rice, and stir until the broth is absorbed. Continue adding broth 1 cup at a time, stirring continuously, until the liquid is absorbed and the rice is al dente, about 15 to 20 minutes.
5. In a separate pan, add the morels and fava beans to the boiling water. Cook for 2-3 minutes, then drain.
6. Stir the sundried tomato paste, cooked morels, and fava beans into the risotto. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, until everything is heated through.
7. Remove from heat, and stir in the Romano cheese, sliced green onions, salt, and pepper.
8. Serve immediately, garnishing with additional Romano cheese and green onions if desired."

input: Ingredients: coconut oil, garam masala, chickpeas, ground ginger, fresh leav spinach, garlic, fresh lemon juice, red chili peppers, sea salt, cumin seed, tomatoes, coriander seeds, yellow onion, ground turmeric. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chickpea and Spinach Curry

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons coconut oil
- 1 teaspoon garam masala
- 1 can (15 ounces) chickpeas, drained and rinsed
- 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger
- 4 cups fresh spinach leaves
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice
- 2 red chili peppers, finely chopped
- 1 teaspoon sea salt
- 1 teaspoon cumin seeds
- 2 medium tomatoes, chopped
- 1 teaspoon coriander seeds
- 1 large yellow onion, chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric

Instructions:
1. Heat the coconut oil in a large pan over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion to the pan and sauté until it becomes translucent.
3. Add the minced garlic, chopped red chili peppers, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, ground turmeric, ground ginger, and garam masala to the pan. Stir well and cook for about 2 minutes.
4. Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan and cook until they become soft.
5. Add the chickpeas to the pan and stir well to combine with the other ingredients. Cook for about 5 minutes.
6. Add the fresh spinach leaves to the pan and stir well. Cook until the spinach wilts.
7. Add the sea salt and fresh lemon juice to the pan and stir well. Cook for another 2 minutes.
8. Serve the curry hot. Enjoy your Spicy Chickpea and Spinach Curry!"

input: Ingredients: extra-virgin olive oil, salt, cannellini beans, chopped fresh sage, garlic. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cannellini Beans with Sage and Garlic

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 cans (15 ounces each) cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
- 2 tablespoons chopped fresh sage
- 3 cloves garlic, minced

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and sauté until it becomes fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the cannellini beans to the skillet, stirring to coat them in the garlic and oil.
4. Sprinkle the salt over the beans and continue to cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes.
5. Add the chopped sage to the skillet and stir to combine.
6. Continue to cook the beans for another 5 minutes, or until they are heated through and have absorbed the flavors of the garlic and sage.
7. Taste and adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve warm."

input: Ingredients: black pepper, green bell pepper, slice, thyme, tomatoes, lime, salt, onions, red bell pepper, sliced, butter, hot water, snappers, hot pepper sauce, tomato ketchup, fish. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Snapper with Bell Peppers and Tomato Sauce

Ingredients:
- 2 whole snappers, cleaned and scaled
- 1 teaspoon black pepper
- 1 green bell pepper, sliced
- 1 teaspoon thyme
- 2 tomatoes, diced
- 1 lime, juiced
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 onion, sliced
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1 cup hot water
- 2 tablespoons hot pepper sauce
- 2 tablespoons tomato ketchup

Instructions:
1. Season the snappers with salt, black pepper, and lime juice. Set aside for 15 minutes to marinate.
2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onions, green bell pepper, and red bell pepper. Sauté until the vegetables are tender.
3. Add the diced tomatoes to the skillet and cook for another 2 minutes.
4. Place the marinated snappers in the skillet. Cook each side for about 5 minutes until they are browned.
5. In a small bowl, mix the hot water, hot pepper sauce, and tomato ketchup. Pour this mixture over the snappers in the skillet.
6. Sprinkle the thyme over the snappers. Cover the skillet and let it simmer for about 15 minutes.
7. Serve the snappers hot, topped with the bell peppers and tomato sauce from the skillet."

input: Ingredients: 1% low-fat cottage cheese, salt, frozen chopped spinach, ground nutmeg, feta cheese crumbles, dried basil, garlic cloves, pasta, marinara sauce, fresh parsley. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spinach and Feta Pasta Bake

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of 1% low-fat cottage cheese
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 package (10 ounces) of frozen chopped spinach
- 1/4 teaspoon of ground nutmeg
- 1 cup of feta cheese crumbles
- 1 teaspoon of dried basil
- 2 garlic cloves
- 8 ounces of pasta
- 2 cups of marinara sauce
- 1/4 cup of fresh parsley

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
3. While the pasta is cooking, defrost the frozen spinach and squeeze out excess water.
4. In a large bowl, combine the cottage cheese, spinach, feta cheese, dried basil, ground nutmeg, and salt. Mince the garlic cloves and add them to the mixture.
5. Add the cooked pasta to the cheese and spinach mixture and stir until well combined.
6. Spread half of the marinara sauce on the bottom of a baking dish.
7. Pour the pasta mixture into the baking dish and spread it out evenly.
8. Pour the remaining marinara sauce over the pasta.
9. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake for 20 minutes.
10. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 10 minutes, or until the top is golden and bubbly.
11. Chop the fresh parsley and sprinkle it over the top of the pasta bake before serving."

input: Ingredients: soy sauce, chili powder, carrots, granulated sugar, garlic, pork belly, sesame oil, onions, green onions, Gochujang base. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Korean Pork Belly Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 500g pork belly
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon chili powder
- 2 carrots
- 2 tablespoons granulated sugar
- 3 cloves garlic
- 2 tablespoons sesame oil
- 1 large onion
- 2 green onions
- 3 tablespoons Gochujang base

Instructions:
1. Slice the pork belly into thin strips.
2. In a bowl, mix together the soy sauce, chili powder, granulated sugar, and Gochujang base.
3. Mince the garlic and add it to the bowl. Stir until well combined.
4. Marinate the pork belly in the sauce for at least 30 minutes.
5. While the pork is marinating, chop the carrots, onion, and green onions.
6. Heat the sesame oil in a large pan over medium heat.
7. Add the onions and carrots to the pan and sauté until they begin to soften.
8. Add the marinated pork belly to the pan and stir-fry until it is fully cooked.
9. Add the green onions and stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
10. Serve the Spicy Korean Pork Belly Stir-Fry hot. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: pork belly, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh rosemary, orange, fennel seeds, kosher salt, garlic cloves, fresh sage, pork loin. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Roasted Pork Loin with Belly, Fennel, and Citrus

Ingredients:
- 2 lbs pork belly
- 1 tsp crushed red pepper flakes
- 2 sprigs fresh rosemary
- 1 orange
- 1 tsp fennel seeds
- 2 tsp kosher salt
- 4 garlic cloves
- 2 sprigs fresh sage
- 3 lbs pork loin

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

2. Take your pork belly and score the skin side with a sharp knife, making sure not to cut into the meat.

3. Rub the pork belly and pork loin with the kosher salt, crushed red pepper flakes, and fennel seeds.

4. Peel and finely chop the garlic cloves. Sprinkle them over the pork.

5. Take the fresh rosemary and sage sprigs and remove the leaves from the stems. Chop the leaves finely and sprinkle them over the pork.

6. Cut the orange in half. Squeeze the juice of one half over the pork, making sure to distribute it evenly.

7. Cut the remaining half of the orange into thin slices and place them on top of the pork.

8. Place the pork belly, skin side up, and the pork loin in a roasting pan.

9. Roast in the preheated oven for about 1 hour and 30 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the skin on the pork belly is crispy.

10. Let the pork rest for 10 minutes before slicing and serving."

input: Ingredients: cotija, chicken breasts, red pepper flakes, salt, smoked paprika, coriander, avocado, radishes, lime wedges, diced tomatoes, yellow onion, bay leaf, hominy, chili powder, shredded lettuce, hot sauce, red bell pepper, cumin, chicken broth, fresh thyme, tomatillos, garlic, fresh oregano, chopped cilantro. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chicken and Hominy Soup

Ingredients:
- 2 chicken breasts
- 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
- 1 teaspoon coriander
- 1 avocado, sliced
- 4 radishes, sliced
- 2 lime wedges
- 1 can diced tomatoes
- 1 yellow onion, chopped
- 1 bay leaf
- 1 can hominy, drained
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1 cup shredded lettuce
- 1 tablespoon hot sauce
- 1 red bell pepper, chopped
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- 4 cups chicken broth
- 1 teaspoon fresh thyme
- 4 tomatillos, chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 teaspoon fresh oregano
- 1/4 cup chopped cilantro
- 1/2 cup cotija cheese

Instructions:
1. Season the chicken breasts with salt, smoked paprika, coriander, and chili powder.
2. In a large pot, sauté the onion, red bell pepper, and garlic until softened.
3. Add the seasoned chicken to the pot and cook until browned on all sides.
4. Add the diced tomatoes, hominy, chicken broth, bay leaf, fresh thyme, tomatillos, and fresh oregano to the pot. Bring to a boil.
5. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
6. Remove the chicken from the pot and shred it. Return the shredded chicken to the pot.
7. Stir in the hot sauce and adjust seasoning with salt and red pepper flakes if needed.
8. Serve the soup in bowls, topped with shredded lettuce, sliced avocado, sliced radishes, chopped cilantro, and cotija cheese. Serve with a lime wedge on the side."

input: Ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic cloves, tumeric, purple onion, green cabbage, ginger, mustard seeds, dry coconut, cumin seed. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spiced Cabbage Stir Fry with Coconut

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 4 garlic cloves, minced
- 1 teaspoon turmeric
- 1 large purple onion, thinly sliced
- 1 medium green cabbage, shredded
- 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated
- 1 teaspoon mustard seeds
- 1/2 cup dry coconut, grated
- 1 teaspoon cumin seeds

Instructions:
1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat.
2. Add the mustard seeds and cumin seeds to the pan. Cook until they start to pop.
3. Add the minced garlic and grated ginger to the pan. Sauté for about 1 minute until fragrant.
4. Add the sliced purple onion to the pan. Cook until the onion becomes soft and translucent.
5. Stir in the turmeric, making sure to coat the onions evenly.
6. Add the shredded green cabbage to the pan. Stir well to combine with the other ingredients.
7. Cover the pan and let it cook for about 10 minutes, or until the cabbage is tender.
8. Add the grated dry coconut to the pan. Stir well to combine.
9. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, then remove from heat.
10. Serve the Spiced Cabbage Stir Fry with Coconut warm. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: eggs, butter, chicken thighs, ketchup, oil, cooked rice, salt, frozen peas, pepper, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chicken Fried Rice

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 4 chicken thighs
- 2 tablespoons ketchup
- 2 tablespoons oil
- 3 cups cooked rice
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup frozen peas
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 2 onions

Instructions:
1. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken thighs and cook until browned and no longer pink in the center, about 6-8 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
2. In the same skillet, add the remaining oil and butter. Once the butter is melted, add the onions and cook until they are soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. While the onions are cooking, chop the cooked chicken into bite-sized pieces.
4. Push the onions to one side of the skillet and crack the eggs into the other side. Scramble the eggs and cook until they are set.
5. Add the cooked rice, chopped chicken, frozen peas, ketchup, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Stir everything together and cook until the rice is heated through and the peas are cooked, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Serve the chicken fried rice hot."

input: Ingredients: tomatoes, paprika, all-purpose flour, English muffins, shredded sharp cheddar cheese, beer, pepper, dry mustard, sauce, butter, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Beer Cheese English Muffin Pizzas

Ingredients:
- 2 large tomatoes
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
- 4 English muffins, split
- 2 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese
- 1/2 cup beer
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon dry mustard
- 1/2 cup tomato sauce
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

2. Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir in the flour until smooth and cook for a minute.

3. Slowly whisk in the beer, then add the shredded cheddar cheese, stirring until melted and smooth.

4. Stir in the dry mustard, paprika, salt, and pepper. Remove from heat.

5. Place the split English muffins on a baking sheet. Spread a tablespoon of tomato sauce on each muffin half.

6. Slice the tomatoes and place a slice on top of the sauce on each muffin half.

7. Spoon the beer cheese mixture over the tomatoes, spreading to cover each muffin half.

8. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and slightly browned.

9. Allow to cool for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy your Beer Cheese English Muffin Pizzas!"

input: Ingredients: balsamic vinegar, salt, sea scallops, watercress, ground black pepper, extra-virgin olive oil, chopped fresh thyme. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Balsamic Glazed Scallops with Thyme and Watercress

Ingredients:
- 1/4 cup balsamic vinegar
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 12 large sea scallops
- 2 cups watercress
- 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme

Instructions:

1. Rinse the scallops and pat them dry with a paper towel. Season them with 1/4 teaspoon of salt and 1/4 teaspoon of ground black pepper.

2. Heat 1 tablespoon of extra-virgin olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the scallops and cook until they are golden brown and opaque in the center, about 2-3 minutes per side. Remove the scallops from the skillet and set them aside.

3. In the same skillet, add the balsamic vinegar and bring it to a simmer over medium heat. Cook until the vinegar is reduced by half, about 2 minutes.

4. Return the scallops to the skillet and toss them in the reduced vinegar. Sprinkle the chopped fresh thyme over the scallops.

5. In a separate bowl, toss the watercress with the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil and 1/4 teaspoon of salt.

6. To serve, divide the watercress among 4 plates. Top each with 3 scallops and drizzle any remaining glaze from the skillet over the top."

input: Ingredients: soy sauce, peanuts, rice noodles, scallions, sugar, water, vinegar, ginger, canola oil, fish sauce, minced garlic, hoisin sauce, cilantro, carrots, pork, honey, hot pepper, peanut butter. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Pork and Peanut Noodle Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 200g rice noodles
- 500g pork, thinly sliced
- 1 cup peanuts, roughly chopped
- 4 scallions, thinly sliced
- 2 carrots, julienned
- 2 tablespoons minced garlic
- 1 tablespoon ginger, grated
- 1 hot pepper, finely chopped
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 1/4 cup soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons fish sauce
- 2 tablespoons hoisin sauce
- 1 tablespoon vinegar
- 2 tablespoons sugar
- 2 tablespoons honey
- 1/4 cup water
- 2 tablespoons peanut butter
- 1/4 cup cilantro, chopped

Instructions:
1. Cook the rice noodles according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. Heat the canola oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the pork and cook until browned. Remove from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add the garlic, ginger, and hot pepper. Cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
4. Add the carrots and half of the scallions to the pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the carrots are tender.
5. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, fish sauce, hoisin sauce, vinegar, sugar, honey, water, and peanut butter. Pour this sauce into the pan.
6. Return the pork to the pan and add the cooked noodles. Toss everything together to combine and heat through.
7. Serve the stir-fry topped with the remaining scallions, chopped peanuts, and cilantro."

input: Ingredients: avocado, diced green chilies, lime wedges, chopped cilantro fresh, cotija, poblano peppers, salt, ground cumin, chicken stock, white hominy, garlic, chicken, olive oil, radishes, yellow onion. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chicken Poblano Hominy Soup

Ingredients:
- 1 ripe avocado
- 1 can (4 oz) diced green chilies
- 2 lime wedges
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
- 1/2 cup crumbled cotija cheese
- 2 poblano peppers
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 4 cups chicken stock
- 1 can (15 oz) white hominy, drained and rinsed
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 lb chicken breast
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 4 radishes, thinly sliced
- 1 large yellow onion, diced

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the diced onion, minced garlic, and diced poblano peppers. Cook until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the chicken to the pot and season with salt and cumin. Cook until the chicken is browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Add the chicken stock, diced green chilies, and white hominy to the pot. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for 20 minutes.
4. While the soup is simmering, slice the avocado and radishes, and cut the lime into wedges.
5. After 20 minutes, remove the chicken from the pot and shred it using two forks. Return the shredded chicken to the pot.
