6. Serve the soup hot, garnished with the sliced avocado, radishes, chopped cilantro, crumbled cotija cheese, and a lime wedge."

input: Ingredients: kale, ground black pepper, chili powder, salt, dried oregano, olive oil, ground red pepper, red wine vinegar, garlic cloves, dried thyme, cooking spray, baking potatoes, hot sauce, ground cumin, water, garlic powder, flank steak, paprika, garlic salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Flank Steak with Chili Roasted Potatoes and Garlic Kale

Ingredients:
- 1 pound flank steak
- 1 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1/2 teaspoon ground red pepper
- 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
- 3 garlic cloves, minced
- 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme
- Cooking spray
- 2 large baking potatoes, cubed
- 1 tablespoon hot sauce
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1/4 cup water
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic salt
- 2 cups kale, chopped

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F and spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.
2. In a large bowl, combine the cubed potatoes, 1 tablespoon olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, and garlic salt. Toss until the potatoes are well coated.
3. Spread the potatoes out on the prepared baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until crispy and golden brown.
4. While the potatoes are baking, season the flank steak with salt, ground black pepper, dried oregano, ground red pepper, and ground cumin.
5. Heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add the steak and cook for 5-7 minutes on each side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness. Remove from heat and let it rest.
6. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant. Add the kale, red wine vinegar, and water. Cook until the kale is wilted and tender.
7. Slice the steak against the grain and serve with the roasted potatoes and garlic kale. Drizzle with hot sauce if desired."

input: Ingredients: black pepper, roma tomatoes, chili powder, garlic, oil, cumin, chili beans, lime, guacamole, butter, salsa, onions, black beans, jalapeno chilies, tenderloin, salt, sour cream, romaine lettuce, flour tortillas, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cilantro, hot sauce, oregano. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Chicken and Tenderloin Tacos

Ingredients:
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts
- 1 tenderloin
- 1 teaspoon black pepper
- 2 roma tomatoes
- 1 tablespoon chili powder
- 2 cloves garlic
- 2 tablespoons oil
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- 1 can chili beans
- 1 lime
- 1 cup guacamole
- 1 tablespoon butter
- 1 cup salsa
- 2 onions
- 1 can black beans
- 2 jalapeno chilies
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup sour cream
- 1 head romaine lettuce
- 8 flour tortillas
- 1 bunch cilantro
- 1 tablespoon hot sauce
- 1 teaspoon oregano

Instructions:
1. Season the chicken breasts and tenderloin with salt, black pepper, chili powder, cumin, and oregano.
2. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the chicken and tenderloin and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add butter and sauté onions, garlic, and jalapeno chilies until softened.
4. Add the chili beans and black beans to the pan and cook for a few minutes.
5. Slice the cooked chicken and tenderloin into thin strips and add them back to the pan. Stir well to combine.
6. Warm the flour tortillas in a dry pan over medium heat.
7. To assemble the tacos, spread a layer of guacamole on each tortilla. Top with the chicken and tenderloin mixture, salsa, diced roma tomatoes, sour cream, and shredded romaine lettuce.
8. Garnish with cilantro and a squeeze of lime. Serve with hot sauce on the side."

input: Ingredients: chicken broth, flour, ground sirloin, garlic, chopped onion, celery, ketchup, sherry, lemon, beef broth, thyme, pepper, bay leaves, worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, flat leaf parsley, tomato purÃ©e, hard-boiled egg, butter, salt, lemon juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sirloin Stew with Lemon and Sherry

Ingredients:
- 1 lb ground sirloin
- 1 cup chicken broth
- 1 cup beef broth
- 1/4 cup flour
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 2 stalks celery, chopped
- 2 tablespoons ketchup
- 1/4 cup sherry
- 1 lemon, juiced
- 1 teaspoon thyme
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 2 bay leaves
- 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
- 1 teaspoon hot sauce
- 1/4 cup flat leaf parsley, chopped
- 1/2 cup tomato purée
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the ground sirloin and cook until browned. Remove the sirloin from the pot and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the chopped onion, celery, and minced garlic. Cook until the vegetables are softened.
3. Stir in the flour until the vegetables are coated. Slowly add the chicken and beef broth, stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
4. Return the sirloin to the pot. Add the ketchup, sherry, lemon juice, thyme, pepper, bay leaves, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, and tomato purée. Stir well to combine.
5. Bring the stew to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the sirloin is tender.
6. Remove the bay leaves. Stir in the chopped parsley and hard-boiled eggs. Season with salt to taste.
7. Serve the stew hot. Enjoy your Sirloin Stew with Lemon and Sherry!"

input: Ingredients: arborio rice, pinenuts, butter, white wine, sliced black olives, onions, reduced sodium chicken broth, ground black pepper, medium shrimp, red chili peppers, olive oil, carrots. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Shrimp Risotto with Pinenuts and Olives

Ingredients:
- 1 cup arborio rice
- 1/4 cup pinenuts
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1/2 cup white wine
- 1/2 cup sliced black olives
- 1 medium onion, finely chopped
- 4 cups reduced sodium chicken broth
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 2 red chili peppers, finely chopped
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 medium carrots, finely chopped

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion, carrots, and red chili peppers. Cook until the vegetables are softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the arborio rice to the saucepan. Stir to coat the rice in the oil and cook until the edges of the rice become translucent, about 2 minutes.
3. Pour in the white wine and stir until it is fully absorbed by the rice.
4. Add the chicken broth, one cup at a time, stirring continuously until each cup is absorbed before adding the next. This process should take about 20 minutes.
5. In a separate pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the shrimp and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 5 minutes. Season with the ground black pepper.
6. Once the rice is tender and creamy, stir in the cooked shrimp, sliced black olives, and pinenuts.
7. Serve the risotto hot, garnished with additional pinenuts if desired."

input: Ingredients: lime wedges, grated jack cheese, black pepper, large garlic cloves, onions, vegetable oil, rotisserie chicken, flour tortillas, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Rotisserie Chicken Quesadillas

Ingredients:
- 4 lime wedges
- 2 cups of grated jack cheese
- 1/2 teaspoon of black pepper
- 2 large garlic cloves, minced
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil
- 1 rotisserie chicken, shredded
- 8 large flour tortillas
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:

1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 

2. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the skillet. Cook until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.

3. Add the shredded rotisserie chicken to the skillet. Season with salt and black pepper. Stir well to combine and cook for another 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.

4. Lay out the flour tortillas and evenly distribute the chicken mixture on one half of each tortilla. 

5. Sprinkle the grated jack cheese over the chicken mixture on each tortilla. Fold the tortillas in half over the filling.

6. Wipe out the skillet and heat the remaining tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium heat. 

7. Cook the quesadillas in the skillet, two at a time, until golden brown on both sides, about 3 minutes per side. 

8. Repeat with the remaining quesadillas, adding more oil to the skillet as needed.

9. Cut each quesadilla into wedges and serve with a lime wedge."

input: Ingredients: cherry tomatoes, sea salt, white wine vinegar, red bell pepper, quinoa, extra-virgin olive oil, english cucumber, honey, kalamata, purple onion, italian seasoning, baby spinach, garlic, feta cheese crumbles. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 cup quinoa
- 2 cups water
- 1/2 teaspoon sea salt
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1 red bell pepper, diced
- 1 English cucumber, diced
- 1/2 cup kalamata olives, pitted and halved
- 1/2 purple onion, thinly sliced
- 2 cups baby spinach
- 1/2 cup feta cheese crumbles
- 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil
- 2 tablespoons white wine vinegar
- 1 tablespoon honey
- 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning
- 2 cloves garlic, minced

Instructions:
1. Rinse the quinoa under cold water until the water runs clear. 
2. In a medium saucepan, bring the quinoa, water, and 1/4 teaspoon of the sea salt to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and let it simmer for 15 minutes, or until the quinoa is tender and the water has been absorbed. 
3. Remove the quinoa from the heat and let it cool.
4. In a large bowl, combine the cherry tomatoes, red bell pepper, cucumber, kalamata olives, purple onion, and baby spinach.
5. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, white wine vinegar, honey, Italian seasoning, minced garlic, and the remaining 1/4 teaspoon of sea salt.
6. Pour the dressing over the vegetable mixture and toss to combine.
7. Once the quinoa has cooled, add it to the vegetable mixture. Toss until everything is well combined.
8. Sprinkle the feta cheese crumbles over the top of the salad before serving."

input: Ingredients: tahini, crushed red pepper, garlic, garbanzo beans, lemon juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Tahini Garbanzo Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of tahini
- 1 teaspoon of crushed red pepper
- 2 cloves of garlic
- 2 cups of garbanzo beans
- 2 tablespoons of lemon juice

Instructions:
1. Rinse and drain the garbanzo beans.
2. In a food processor, combine the garbanzo beans, tahini, crushed red pepper, and garlic.
3. Process the mixture until it becomes smooth.
4. Add the lemon juice and process again until well combined.
5. Taste and adjust the seasoning if necessary.
6. Serve the dip with your favorite snacks."

input: Ingredients: crawfish, beaten eggs, dijon mustard, canola oil, mayonaise, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, crackers. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Crawfish Cakes

Ingredients:
- 1 pound of crawfish
- 2 beaten eggs
- 2 tablespoons of dijon mustard
- 2 tablespoons of canola oil
- 1/2 cup of mayonnaise
- 1 tablespoon of Worcestershire sauce
- 1 teaspoon of hot pepper sauce
- 1 cup of crushed crackers

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the crawfish, beaten eggs, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce. Mix until all ingredients are well combined.
2. Gradually add the crushed crackers into the mixture. Stir until the mixture holds together like a dough.
3. Shape the mixture into small patties.
4. Heat the canola oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
5. Cook the patties in the heated oil until they are golden brown on both sides, about 4 minutes per side.
6. Once cooked, remove the patties from the skillet and drain on paper towels.
7. Serve the spicy crawfish cakes hot."

input: Ingredients: lime zest, pepper, flour tortillas, chili powder, beer, ground cumin, brown sugar, olive oil, flour, salt, cumin, tomato paste, lime, jalapeno chilies, onion powder, smoked paprika, tomato sauce, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cayenne pepper, monterey jack. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Beer-Braised Chicken Tacos

Ingredients:
- 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 teaspoon lime zest
- 1 lime
- 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and finely chopped
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon onion powder
- 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 tablespoon brown sugar
- 1 cup beer
- 2 tablespoons tomato paste
- 1/2 cup tomato sauce
- 8 flour tortillas
- 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken breasts, seasoning them with salt, pepper, and lime zest. Cook until browned on both sides, about 5-7 minutes per side.
2. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. In the same skillet, add the jalapeno chilies, chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, and brown sugar. Stir to combine.
3. Add the beer to the skillet, scraping the bottom to deglaze the pan. Stir in the tomato paste and tomato sauce.
4. Return the chicken to the skillet, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
5. While the chicken is cooking, warm the flour tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat until they are pliable.
6. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the skillet and shred it using two forks. Return the shredded chicken to the skillet and stir to coat it in the sauce.
7. To serve, spoon some of the chicken mixture onto each tortilla. Top with shredded Monterey Jack cheese and a squeeze of fresh lime juice."

input: Ingredients: hoisin sauce, vegetable stock, rice vinegar, noodles, low sodium soy sauce, udon, red pepper flakes, carrots, tofu, extra firm tofu, butter, juice, orange zest, vegetables, broccoli florets, veggies, corn starch. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Orange Tofu and Vegetable Stir Fry

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of extra firm tofu
- 2 cups of udon noodles
- 1 cup of broccoli florets
- 1 cup of mixed vegetables (carrots, veggies)
- 2 tablespoons of butter
- 1 tablespoon of hoisin sauce
- 1 tablespoon of low sodium soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon of rice vinegar
- 1/2 teaspoon of red pepper flakes
- 1 cup of vegetable stock
- 1 tablespoon of corn starch
- Juice and zest of 1 orange

Instructions:
1. Press the tofu to remove excess water and cut into cubes.
2. In a large pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the tofu cubes and cook until golden brown on all sides. Remove from the pan and set aside.
3. In the same pan, add the mixed vegetables and broccoli florets. Stir fry until they are tender.
4. In a small bowl, mix together the hoisin sauce, soy sauce, rice vinegar, orange juice, orange zest, and red pepper flakes.
5. In another small bowl, mix the corn starch with a little bit of vegetable stock to create a slurry.
6. Pour the remaining vegetable stock into the pan with the vegetables. Bring to a simmer.
7. Stir in the sauce mixture and the corn starch slurry. Continue to stir until the sauce has thickened.
8. Add the cooked tofu back into the pan and stir to coat with the sauce.
9. Cook the udon noodles according to the package instructions. Drain and add to the pan, stirring to combine with the vegetables and sauce.
10. Serve the stir fry hot, garnished with additional orange zest if desired."

input: Ingredients: ground cinnamon, lemon, dark brown sugar, crystallized ginger, cayenne pepper, pears, quatre Ã©pices, raisins, mustard seeds, apple cider vinegar, chopped onion. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spiced Pear and Ginger Chutney

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 1 lemon, zested and juiced
- 1 cup dark brown sugar
- 1/4 cup crystallized ginger, finely chopped
- 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper
- 4 pears, peeled, cored and chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon quatre épices
- 1/2 cup raisins
- 1 tablespoon mustard seeds
- 1 cup apple cider vinegar
- 1 large onion, finely chopped

Instructions:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the chopped onion, pears, dark brown sugar, apple cider vinegar, crystallized ginger, raisins, mustard seeds, ground cinnamon, quatre épices, and cayenne pepper.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring frequently.
3. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer. Add the lemon zest and juice.
4. Continue to cook on low heat for about 1 hour, stirring occasionally until the mixture thickens and the pears are soft.
5. Once the chutney has thickened, remove from heat and let it cool.
6. Transfer the chutney to sterilized jars, seal tightly, and store in a cool, dark place. The chutney will be ready to eat after 1-2 weeks and can be stored for up to a year."

input: Ingredients: raw honey, ice, avocado, fresh mint, vanilla, sweetener, coconut milk. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Minty Avocado Coconut Smoothie

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons of raw honey
- 1 cup of ice
- 1 ripe avocado
- 10 fresh mint leaves
- 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract
- 2 tablespoons of sweetener (optional)
- 1 cup of coconut milk

Instructions:
1. Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh.
2. In a blender, add the avocado, 1 cup of coconut milk, 2 tablespoons of raw honey, 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract, and 10 fresh mint leaves.
3. Blend until the mixture is smooth and creamy.
4. Taste the smoothie. If desired, add 2 tablespoons of sweetener and blend again until well mixed.
5. Add 1 cup of ice to the blender and blend until the ice is crushed and the smoothie is chilled.
6. Pour the smoothie into a glass and serve immediately. Enjoy your Minty Avocado Coconut Smoothie!"

input: Ingredients: peaches, old-fashioned oats, salt, brown sugar, large eggs, butter, lemon juice, granulated sugar, baking powder, all-purpose flour, sugar, flour, vanilla extract. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Peach Crumble Bars

Ingredients:
- 4 cups of peaches, peeled and sliced
- 1 cup of old-fashioned oats
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 cup of brown sugar
- 2 large eggs
- 1/2 cup of butter, melted
- 1 tablespoon of lemon juice
- 1 cup of granulated sugar
- 1 teaspoon of baking powder
- 1 1/2 cups of all-purpose flour
- 1/2 cup of sugar
- 1/2 cup of flour
- 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
2. In a large bowl, combine the peaches, lemon juice, and 1/2 cup of sugar. Set aside.
3. In another bowl, combine the oats, 1 1/2 cups of flour, brown sugar, granulated sugar, baking powder, and salt.
4. Beat in the eggs, melted butter, and vanilla extract until the mixture is crumbly.
5. Press half of the oat mixture into the bottom of the prepared baking dish.
6. Spread the peach mixture over the crust.
7. Crumble the remaining oat mixture over the peaches.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the top is lightly browned.
9. Allow to cool before cutting into bars."

input: Ingredients: parmigiano-reggiano cheese, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, water, salt, fresh mint, baguette, extra-virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, eggs, ground black pepper, anchovy fillets, arugula. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Arugula Salad with Anchovy-Mint Dressing and Parmesan Croutons

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese
- 2 tablespoons of worcestershire sauce
- 3 garlic cloves
- 1/4 cup of water
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 cup of fresh mint leaves
- 1 baguette
- 1/2 cup of extra-virgin olive oil
- 2 tablespoons of fresh lemon juice
- 2 eggs
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 6 anchovy fillets
- 4 cups of arugula

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut the baguette into 1-inch cubes and toss with 1/4 cup of olive oil, 1/2 cup of grated cheese, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, and 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 10-15 minutes until golden and crispy.
3. While the croutons are baking, make the dressing. Combine the mint, garlic, anchovy fillets, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper, and water in a blender. Blend until smooth.
4. With the blender running, slowly add the remaining 1/4 cup of olive oil until the dressing is emulsified.
5. In a large bowl, toss the arugula with the dressing until well coated.
6. In a small saucepan, bring water to a simmer. Carefully add the eggs and cook for 6-7 minutes for a soft center. Remove with a slotted spoon and place in a bowl of cold water to stop the cooking process. Once cool, peel and cut in half.
7. To serve, divide the dressed arugula among four plates. Top with the croutons, remaining cheese, and a soft-boiled egg."

input: Ingredients: vegetable oil, crushed red pepper flakes, chicken legs, garlic, water, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Garlic Chicken Legs

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
- 4 chicken legs
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup water
- 1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the crushed red pepper flakes to the skillet and cook for 1 minute.
3. Add the chicken legs to the skillet and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
6. Return the chicken legs to the skillet and add the water and salt.
7. Cover the skillet and simmer over low heat for 30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the flavors have melded together.
8. Serve the chicken legs hot, with the spicy garlic sauce from the skillet."

input: Ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic, oil, green bell pepper, marinade, rice vinegar, corn starch, sugar, sesame oil, sauce, red bell pepper, chili, ginger, roasted peanuts, gluten free soy sauce. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Gluten-Free Kung Pao Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts
- 3 cloves garlic
- 2 tablespoons oil
- 1 green bell pepper
- 1 red bell pepper
- 1/4 cup rice vinegar
- 2 tablespoons corn starch
- 1 tablespoon sugar
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 1 tablespoon chili
- 1 tablespoon ginger
- 1/2 cup roasted peanuts
- 1/4 cup gluten free soy sauce

Instructions:
1. Cut the chicken breasts into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a bowl, mix together the gluten free soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, chili, ginger, and corn starch. This will be your marinade.
3. Add the chicken pieces to the marinade and let it sit for at least 30 minutes.
4. While the chicken is marinating, chop the garlic, green bell pepper, and red bell pepper.
5. Heat the oil in a pan over medium heat.
6. Add the garlic to the pan and sauté until it becomes fragrant.
7. Add the marinated chicken to the pan and cook until it is no longer pink in the middle.
8. Add the green and red bell peppers to the pan and cook until they are tender.
9. Pour the remaining marinade into the pan and bring it to a boil. The sauce will thicken due to the corn starch.
10. Stir in the sesame oil and roasted peanuts.
11. Serve the Kung Pao Chicken hot. Enjoy your meal!"

input: Ingredients: toasted walnuts, honey, plain yogurt, vanilla. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Honey Walnut Yogurt Delight

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of toasted walnuts
- 2 tablespoons of honey
- 2 cups of plain yogurt
- 1 teaspoon of vanilla

Instructions:
1. Start by toasting the walnuts in a dry pan over medium heat. Stir them occasionally to prevent burning. Once they're golden brown and fragrant, remove them from the heat and let them cool.
2. In a bowl, combine the plain yogurt and vanilla. Stir until the vanilla is evenly distributed.
3. Chop the cooled toasted walnuts into small pieces.
4. Add the chopped walnuts to the yogurt mixture and stir until they're evenly distributed.
5. Drizzle the honey over the top of the yogurt mixture.
6. Stir the honey into the yogurt mixture until it's evenly distributed.
7. Serve the Honey Walnut Yogurt Delight immediately, or refrigerate it for later. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: water, butternut squash, garlic cloves, black pepper, olive oil, yellow onion, greek yogurt, lower sodium chicken broth, honey, ground red pepper, carrots, kosher salt, garam masala, acorn squash, Madras curry powder. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Curried Squash and Carrot Soup

Ingredients:
- 4 cups of water
- 1 medium butternut squash
- 1 medium acorn squash
- 4 garlic cloves
- 1 teaspoon black pepper
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 large yellow onion
- 1 cup Greek yogurt
- 4 cups lower sodium chicken broth
- 2 tablespoons honey
- 1/2 teaspoon ground red pepper
- 2 large carrots
- 1 teaspoon kosher salt
- 1 teaspoon garam masala
- 2 teaspoons Madras curry powder

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
2. Cut the butternut and acorn squash in half lengthwise and remove the seeds.
3. Place the squash halves on a baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and black pepper.
4. Roast the squash in the preheated oven for about 50 minutes, or until the flesh is tender and lightly browned.
5. While the squash is roasting, chop the onion and garlic. Peel and chop the carrots.
6. Heat the remaining olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, and carrots. Cook until the vegetables are softened, about 10 minutes.
7. Stir in the Madras curry powder, garam masala, and ground red pepper. Cook for another 2 minutes.
8. Add the chicken broth, water, and honey to the pot. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer.
9. Once the squash is done roasting, let it cool slightly before scooping out the flesh. Add the squash to the pot.
10. Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until it's smooth. If you don't have an immersion blender, you can transfer the soup to a regular blender in batches.
11. Stir in the Greek yogurt until it's well combined. Season the soup with additional salt and pepper to taste.
12. Serve the soup hot, with a dollop of Greek yogurt on top if desired."

input: Ingredients: fine salt, gruyere cheese, butter, flat leaf parsley, shallots, garlic cloves, ground pepper, snails. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Classic French Escargot with Gruyere Cheese

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon fine salt
- 1 cup gruyere cheese, grated
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened
- 1/4 cup flat leaf parsley, finely chopped
- 2 shallots, finely chopped
- 4 garlic cloves, minced
- 1/2 teaspoon ground pepper
- 24 canned snails, drained

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

2. In a medium bowl, combine the softened butter, minced garlic, chopped shallots, chopped parsley, ground pepper, and fine salt. Mix until all ingredients are well incorporated.

3. Add the drained snails to the butter mixture and stir until they are well coated.

4. Place the snails into individual snail dishes or in a single layer in a baking dish.

5. Sprinkle the grated gruyere cheese evenly over the snails.

6. Bake in the preheated oven for about 15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

7. Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy your Classic French Escargot with Gruyere Cheese!"

input: Ingredients: cherry tomatoes, black olives, extra large eggs, chopped parsley, gruyere cheese, clarified butter, artichoke hearts, fresh mushrooms. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Mediterranean Vegetable Frittata

Ingredients:
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes
- 1/2 cup black olives
- 6 extra large eggs
- 1/4 cup chopped parsley
- 1 cup gruyere cheese
- 2 tablespoons clarified butter
- 1 cup artichoke hearts
- 1 cup fresh mushrooms

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.

2. In a large oven-safe skillet, melt the clarified butter over medium heat.

3. Add the fresh mushrooms to the skillet and sauté until they are browned and tender.

4. Add the cherry tomatoes, black olives, and artichoke hearts to the skillet. Cook for another 5 minutes until the tomatoes start to burst.

5. In a large bowl, whisk together the extra large eggs. Stir in the chopped parsley and half of the gruyere cheese.

6. Pour the egg mixture over the vegetables in the skillet, making sure the ingredients are evenly distributed.

7. Sprinkle the remaining gruyere cheese on top of the egg mixture.

8. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the frittata is set and the cheese is golden and bubbly.

9. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving."

input: Ingredients: pepper, low-fat buttermilk, baby beets, salad dressing, olive oil, cooking spray, all-purpose flour, dried thyme, crumbled blue cheese, salt, romaine lettuce, garlic powder, chicken breasts, dry bread crumbs. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Crispy Chicken Salad with Roasted Baby Beets and Blue Cheese

Ingredients:
- 4 chicken breasts
- 1 cup all-purpose flour
- 1 cup dry bread crumbs
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1 teaspoon dried thyme
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 cup low-fat buttermilk
- Cooking spray
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 8 baby beets
- 1 head romaine lettuce
- 1/2 cup crumbled blue cheese
- 1/2 cup salad dressing

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.

2. In a shallow dish, combine the all-purpose flour, dry bread crumbs, garlic powder, dried thyme, salt, and pepper. 

3. Dip each chicken breast into the low-fat buttermilk, then dredge in the flour mixture, making sure each piece is fully coated. Place the coated chicken breasts onto the prepared baking sheet.

4. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the coating is golden and crispy.

5. While the chicken is baking, toss the baby beets with the olive oil and a pinch of salt and pepper. Spread them out on a separate baking sheet and roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.

6. Wash and chop the romaine lettuce and place it in a large salad bowl.

7. Once the chicken and beets are done, let them cool slightly. Slice the chicken into thin strips.

8. Add the roasted beets, sliced chicken, and crumbled blue cheese to the salad bowl. Drizzle with your favorite salad dressing and toss gently to combine.

9. Serve the Crispy Chicken Salad with Roasted Baby Beets and Blue Cheese immediately, while the chicken and beets are still warm. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: pork belly, thai chile, oil, water, salt, onions, pepper, garlic, coconut milk, shrimp paste, coconut cream. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Coconut Pork Belly

Ingredients:
- 1 kg pork belly
- 2 Thai chiles
- 2 tablespoons oil
- 1 cup water
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 onions
- 1 teaspoon pepper
- 4 cloves garlic
- 1 can (400 ml) coconut milk
- 1 tablespoon shrimp paste
- 1 can (400 ml) coconut cream

Instructions:
1. Cut the pork belly into bite-sized pieces.
2. Finely chop the Thai chiles, onions, and garlic.
3. Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat.
4. Add the pork belly to the pan and cook until browned on all sides.
5. Remove the pork belly from the pan and set aside.
6. In the same pan, add the chopped Thai chiles, onions, and garlic. Cook until the onions are translucent.
7. Add the shrimp paste to the pan and stir until it is well combined with the other ingredients.
8. Return the pork belly to the pan and add the coconut milk, coconut cream, water, salt, and pepper.
9. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 1 hour, or until the pork belly is tender and the sauce has thickened.
10. Serve the Spicy Coconut Pork Belly hot. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: grape tomatoes, basil, shredded parmesan cheese, baby spinach, garlic, freshly ground pepper, olive oil, linguine, white beans, butter, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Linguine with White Beans, Spinach, and Tomatoes

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of grape tomatoes
- 1 cup of fresh basil leaves
- 1 cup of shredded parmesan cheese
- 2 cups of baby spinach
- 3 cloves of garlic
- 1 teaspoon of freshly ground pepper
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 8 ounces of linguine
- 1 can (15 ounces) of white beans, drained and rinsed
- 2 tablespoons of butter
- 1 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:
1. Cook the linguine according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. While the linguine is cooking, heat the olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
3. Add the garlic to the skillet and sauté until fragrant, about 1 minute.
4. Add the grape tomatoes to the skillet and cook until they start to burst, about 5 minutes.
5. Add the white beans to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook until the beans are heated through, about 2 minutes.
6. Add the baby spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
7. Season the skillet mixture with salt and freshly ground pepper.
8. Add the cooked linguine to the skillet and toss to combine.
9. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the shredded parmesan cheese and fresh basil leaves.
10. Serve the linguine with additional parmesan cheese and basil on top, if desired."

input: Ingredients: tomatoes, cilantro leaves, coriander, seeds, oil, ginger paste, red chili powder, okra, ground turmeric, salt, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Okra Stir Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 medium tomatoes, chopped
- 1/2 cup cilantro leaves, chopped
- 1 teaspoon coriander seeds
- 2 tablespoons oil
- 1 tablespoon ginger paste
- 1 teaspoon red chili powder
- 500 grams okra, chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric
- Salt to taste
- 2 medium onions, chopped

Instructions:
1. Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat.
2. Add the coriander seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
3. Add the chopped onions to the pan and sauté until they turn golden brown.
4. Add the ginger paste to the pan and stir well.
5. Add the chopped tomatoes, red chili powder, ground turmeric, and salt to the pan. Cook until the tomatoes are soft.
6. Add the chopped okra to the pan and stir well to combine with the other ingredients. Cook for about 10 minutes, or until the okra is cooked through.
7. Turn off the heat and add the chopped cilantro leaves to the pan. Stir well to combine.
8. Serve the Spicy Okra Stir Fry hot."

input: Ingredients: celery ribs, sliced almonds, water chestnuts, sour cream, andouille sausage, milk, cajun seasoning, onions, green bell pepper, shredded cheddar cheese, cooked chicken, cream of mushroom soup, bread crumb fresh, black-eyed peas, butter, long grain and wild rice mix. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cajun Chicken and Sausage Casserole

Ingredients:
- 2 celery ribs, chopped
- 1/2 cup sliced almonds
- 1 can (8 oz) water chestnuts, drained and chopped
- 1 cup sour cream
- 1 lb andouille sausage, sliced
- 1/2 cup milk
- 2 tablespoons cajun seasoning
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1 green bell pepper, chopped
- 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
- 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded
- 1 can (10.75 oz) cream of mushroom soup
- 1 cup fresh bread crumbs
- 1 can (15 oz) black-eyed peas, drained and rinsed
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1 package (6 oz) long grain and wild rice mix

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a large baking dish with butter.
2. Cook the long grain and wild rice mix according to package instructions.
3. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the celery, onion, and green bell pepper. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
4. Add the andouille sausage to the skillet and cook until browned.
5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked vegetables, sausage, cooked chicken, cooked rice, water chestnuts, black-eyed peas, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, milk, cajun seasoning, and 1 cup of the shredded cheese. Stir until well combined.
6. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish. Top with the remaining cheese, sliced almonds, and bread crumbs.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and the top is golden brown. Let the casserole cool for a few minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: water, jalapeno chilies, sweet onion, smoked turkey, salt, collard greens, turkey legs. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Smoky Turkey and Collard Greens Stew

Ingredients:
- 8 cups of water
- 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and chopped
- 1 large sweet onion, chopped
- 1 pound of smoked turkey, chopped
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 2 pounds of collard greens, stems removed and leaves chopped
- 2 turkey legs

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, add the turkey legs and water. Bring to a boil over high heat.
2. Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover the pot, and simmer until the turkey meat is tender, about 1 hour.
3. Remove the turkey legs from the pot. When cool enough to handle, remove the meat from the bones and chop it. Discard the bones.
4. Add the chopped smoked turkey, jalapeno chilies, sweet onion, and salt to the pot. Stir well.
5. Add the collard greens to the pot. Stir again to combine all the ingredients.
6. Cover the pot and simmer until the collard greens are tender, about 1 hour.
7. Return the chopped turkey leg meat to the pot. Stir well.
8. Continue to simmer the stew for another 15 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
9. Taste the stew and add more salt if needed.
10. Serve the stew hot. Enjoy your Smoky Turkey and Collard Greens Stew!"

input: Ingredients: olive oil, chili powder, cumin, tomatoes, garlic powder, cilantro, pepper, granulated sugar, purple onion, lime juice, jalapeno chilies, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Tomato and Jalapeno Salsa

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- 4 medium tomatoes
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/4 cup chopped cilantro
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 1 teaspoon granulated sugar
- 1 medium purple onion
- 2 tablespoons lime juice
- 2 jalapeno chilies
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. Dice the tomatoes, purple onion, and jalapeno chilies. Set aside.
2. Heat the olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
3. Add the diced purple onion to the pan and sauté until it becomes translucent.
4. Add the diced tomatoes and jalapeno chilies to the pan. Stir well.
5. Add the chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, pepper, and salt to the pan. Stir well to combine.
6. Cook the mixture for about 10 minutes, or until the tomatoes are soft.
7. Add the lime juice and granulated sugar to the pan. Stir well.
8. Remove the pan from the heat and let the mixture cool.
9. Once cooled, add the chopped cilantro to the mixture and stir well.
10. Serve the salsa with your favorite chips or use it as a topping for tacos or burritos. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: cornbread, ground chuck, bell pepper, ground pork, celery, eggs, onion soup, butter, thyme, whole wheat bread toasted, pepper, green onions, garlic, onions, chicken broth, water, parsley, salt, sage. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Cornbread and Pork Stuffing

Ingredients:
- 4 cups of cornbread, crumbled
- 1 lb ground chuck
- 1 lb ground pork
- 1 bell pepper, diced
- 2 stalks of celery, diced
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 1 packet of onion soup mix
- 1/2 cup of butter
- 1 tsp thyme
- 2 slices of whole wheat bread, toasted and crumbled
- 1 tsp pepper
- 1/2 cup of green onions, chopped
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 large onion, diced
- 1 cup of chicken broth
- 1/2 cup of water
- 1/4 cup of parsley, chopped
- 1 tsp salt
- 1 tsp sage

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the ground chuck and ground pork, cook until browned and crumbled. Drain the excess fat.
3. Add the diced bell pepper, celery, garlic, and onion to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
4. Stir in the onion soup mix, thyme, pepper, salt, and sage. Cook for another 2 minutes.
5. In a large bowl, combine the cornbread and toasted whole wheat bread crumbs.
6. Add the meat and vegetable mixture to the bowl. Mix well.
7. Stir in the beaten eggs, green onions, parsley, chicken broth, and water. Mix until the stuffing is moistened.
8. Transfer the stuffing to a greased baking dish.
9. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes.
10. Remove the foil and bake for another 15 minutes, or until the top is golden brown.
11. Let the stuffing cool for a few minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: cooking oil, water, tomato ketchup, white vinegar, salt, granulated sugar, corn starch. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Homemade Sweet and Sour Sauce

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon cooking oil
- 1/2 cup water
- 1/2 cup tomato ketchup
- 1/3 cup white vinegar
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 cup granulated sugar
- 1 tablespoon corn starch

Instructions:
1. In a medium saucepan, heat the cooking oil over medium heat.
2. Add the tomato ketchup, white vinegar, salt, and granulated sugar to the saucepan. Stir until well combined.
3. In a small bowl, mix the corn starch with the water until it forms a smooth paste.
4. Gradually add the corn starch mixture to the saucepan, stirring constantly.
5. Continue to cook the sauce over medium heat, stirring frequently, until it thickens to your desired consistency.
6. Once thickened, remove the sauce from the heat and allow it to cool before serving."

input: Ingredients: water, chile pepper, cilantro leaves, onions, tomatoes, cooking oil, salt, brown cardamom, ground cumin, red chili powder, bay leaves, lamb chops, cinnamon sticks, fresh ginger root, garlic, green cardamom, ground turmeric. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Lamb Chops with Cardamom and Cilantro

Ingredients:
- 4 lamb chops
- 2 cups of water
- 1 chile pepper, finely chopped
- 1/2 cup of cilantro leaves, finely chopped
- 2 onions, finely chopped
- 2 tomatoes, finely chopped
- 2 tablespoons of cooking oil
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 2 brown cardamom pods
- 1 teaspoon of ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon of red chili powder
- 2 bay leaves
- 2 cinnamon sticks
- 1 inch of fresh ginger root, finely chopped
- 3 cloves of garlic, finely chopped
- 2 green cardamom pods
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground turmeric

Instructions:
1. Heat the cooking oil in a large pan over medium heat.
2. Add the onions, garlic, and ginger to the pan and sauté until the onions are golden brown.
3. Add the ground cumin, red chili powder, ground turmeric, brown cardamom, green cardamom, cinnamon sticks, and bay leaves to the pan. Stir well and cook for 2 minutes.
4. Add the lamb chops to the pan and cook until they are browned on all sides.
5. Add the tomatoes, chile pepper, and salt to the pan. Stir well and cook for 5 minutes.
6. Add the water to the pan and bring the mixture to a boil.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and simmer for 30 minutes, or until the lamb is tender.
8. Sprinkle the cilantro leaves over the lamb chops just before serving."

input: Ingredients: ground black pepper, garlic cloves, fat free less sodium chicken broth, butter, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, fresh cilantro, salt, canola oil, lime wedges, fresh lime juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Lime Cilantro Chicken

Ingredients:
- 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- 1 cup fat free less sodium chicken broth
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1/2 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 4 lime wedges
- 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice

Instructions:
1. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
2. Heat the canola oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Add the chicken to the skillet and cook until golden brown on both sides, about 5-7 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
5. Add the chicken broth to the skillet and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and stir in the butter until melted.
6. Return the chicken to the skillet, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
7. Stir in the fresh cilantro and lime juice.
8. Serve the chicken with the sauce from the skillet and a lime wedge on the side."

input: Ingredients: low sodium chicken broth, diced tomatoes, onions, milk, vegetable oil, salt, eggs, flour, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, ground black pepper, butter, cornmeal. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chicken Breast with Tomato Sauce and Cornmeal Dumplings

Ingredients:
- 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
- 2 cups low sodium chicken broth
- 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- Salt and ground black pepper to taste
- 1 cup milk
- 2 eggs
- 1 cup flour
- 1 cup cornmeal
- 4 tablespoons butter

Instructions:

1. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-7 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.

2. In the same skillet, add the chopped onion and minced garlic. Cook until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.

3. Add the diced tomatoes and chicken broth to the skillet. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low. Return the chicken breasts to the skillet, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes.

4. While the chicken is simmering, prepare the cornmeal dumplings. In a large bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, and a pinch of salt. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk and eggs. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until a dough forms.

5. Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Drop spoonfuls of the dumpling dough into the skillet. Cook the dumplings until they are golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.

6. Serve the chicken breasts with the tomato sauce and cornmeal dumplings on the side."

input: Ingredients: butter, salt, ground black pepper, diced tomatoes, fresh parsley, fish fillets, large garlic cloves, thyme, dry white wine, chopped celery, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: White Wine Fish Fillets with Tomato and Parsley

Ingredients:
- 4 tablespoons of butter
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 1 can (14.5 ounces) of diced tomatoes
- 1/4 cup of fresh parsley, chopped
- 4 fish fillets
- 3 large garlic cloves, minced
- 1 teaspoon of thyme
- 1 cup of dry white wine
- 1 cup of chopped celery
- 2 medium onions, chopped

Instructions:
1. Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onions, minced garlic, and chopped celery to the skillet. Cook until the onions are translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Season the fish fillets with salt and pepper, then add them to the skillet. Cook each side for about 4 minutes, or until the fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork.
4. Remove the fish from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the diced tomatoes, thyme, and white wine. Bring the mixture to a simmer and let it cook for about 10 minutes, or until the liquid is reduced by half.
6. Return the fish to the skillet, spooning the tomato and wine sauce over the fillets. Let it cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the fish is heated through.
7. Sprinkle the fresh parsley over the fish before serving."

input: Ingredients: pepper, bacon slices, mustard seeds, cider vinegar, green onions, salt, red potato, sweet potatoes, purple onion, canola oil, large eggs, crushed red pepper, fresh parsley. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Potato and Bacon Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 6 bacon slices
- 1 teaspoon mustard seeds
- 3 tablespoons cider vinegar
- 4 green onions, chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 2 red potatoes, cubed
- 2 sweet potatoes, cubed
- 1 purple onion, chopped
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 2 large eggs, hard-boiled and chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper
- 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, bring water to a boil. Add the red potatoes and sweet potatoes. Cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain, cool and chop into bite-size pieces.
2. In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium high heat until evenly brown. Remove from skillet, crumble and set aside.
3. In the same skillet with some retained bacon fat, add the purple onion. Cook until translucent.
4. Add mustard seeds to the skillet and cook until they start to pop. Then add cider vinegar, crushed red pepper, salt, and pepper. Stir well.
5. In a large bowl, combine the potatoes, bacon, onion-vinegar mixture, green onions, and canola oil. Toss well to coat everything.
6. Gently mix in the chopped eggs and fresh parsley.
7. Serve warm or refrigerate and serve cold."

input: Ingredients: sugar, corn starch, egg whites, boiling water, cold water, egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk, milk, Jell-O Gelatin Dessert. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Jell-O Custard Pudding

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of sugar
- 3 tablespoons of corn starch
- 4 egg whites
- 1 cup of boiling water
- 1/2 cup of cold water
- 4 egg yolks
- 1 can (14 ounces) of sweetened condensed milk
- 2 cups of milk
- 1 package (3 ounces) of Jell-O Gelatin Dessert, any flavor

Instructions:
1. In a large saucepan, combine sugar and corn starch. Gradually stir in cold water until smooth. Stir in milk and egg yolks until blended.
2. Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture thickens and comes to a boil. Reduce heat; cook and stir 2 minutes longer. Remove from the heat; stir in sweetened condensed milk until smooth.
3. In a separate bowl, add Jell-O Gelatin Dessert to boiling water and stir until completely dissolved.
4. Gradually stir the hot Jell-O into the custard mixture until well combined.
5. Beat egg whites in a separate bowl until stiff peaks form. Gradually fold the egg whites into the custard mixture.
6. Pour the mixture into dessert dishes or a large serving bowl. 
7. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until set before serving."

input: Ingredients: eggs, crushed tomatoes, parmigiano reggiano cheese, freshly ground pepper, flat leaf parsley, bread crumb fresh, olive oil, yellow onion, juice, ground beef, fresh basil, milk, ground pork, garlic cloves, romana, kosher salt, prosciutto, fresh oregano, gnocchi. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Gnocchi with Meatballs and Tomato Sauce

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs
- 2 cans (28 ounces each) crushed tomatoes
- 1 cup grated parmigiano reggiano cheese
- 1 teaspoon freshly ground pepper
- 1/4 cup chopped flat leaf parsley
- 1 cup fresh bread crumbs
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 large yellow onion, finely chopped
- 1 pound ground beef
- 1/2 cup fresh basil leaves, chopped
- 1/2 cup milk
- 1/2 pound ground pork
- 4 garlic cloves, minced
- 1 cup grated romana cheese
- 1 teaspoon kosher salt
- 4 slices prosciutto, chopped
- 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano
- 1 package (16 ounces) gnocchi

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine ground beef, ground pork, bread crumbs, eggs, 1/2 cup parmigiano reggiano cheese, milk, prosciutto, garlic, salt, pepper, and half of the parsley. Mix until well combined.
2. Shape the mixture into 1-inch meatballs and set aside.
3. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the meatballs and cook until browned on all sides, about 10 minutes. Remove the meatballs from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the crushed tomatoes, basil, oregano, and the remaining parsley. Bring to a simmer.
5. Return the meatballs to the skillet, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes.
6. Meanwhile, cook the gnocchi according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
7. Add the cooked gnocchi to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
8. Sprinkle the dish with the remaining parmigiano reggiano cheese and the romana cheese before serving."

input: Ingredients: fish sauce, squid, fresh pineapple, vegetable oil, onions, garlic, white sugar, ground black pepper, celery. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Pineapple Squid Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons fish sauce
- 500 grams squid, cleaned and cut into rings
- 1 cup fresh pineapple, cut into chunks
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 1 large onion, thinly sliced
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon white sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 2 stalks celery, sliced

Instructions:
1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat.
2. Add the garlic and onions to the pan and sauté until the onions become translucent.
3. Add the squid to the pan and cook for about 2 minutes, or until the squid turns opaque.
4. Add the pineapple chunks, celery, white sugar, and ground black pepper to the pan. Stir well to combine.
5. Pour the fish sauce over the mixture in the pan and stir again to combine.
6. Continue to cook the mixture for another 2-3 minutes, or until the squid is cooked through and the pineapple is heated.
7. Serve the Pineapple Squid Stir-Fry hot. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: olive oil, whole milk ricotta cheese, grated parmesan cheese, large eggs, grated nutmeg, flour. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Ricotta and Parmesan Cheese Gnocchi

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 cups whole milk ricotta cheese
- 1 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 2 large eggs
- 1/4 teaspoon grated nutmeg
- 1 1/2 cups flour

Instructions:

1. In a large bowl, combine the ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, eggs, and nutmeg. Mix until well combined.

2. Gradually add the flour to the cheese mixture, stirring until a soft dough forms.

3. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead gently for a few minutes.

4. Divide the dough into 4 equal parts. Roll each part into a long rope, about 1 inch in diameter.

5. Cut each rope into 1-inch pieces to form the gnocchi.

6. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the gnocchi and cook until they float to the top, about 2-3 minutes.

7. Drain the gnocchi and return them to the pot. Add the olive oil and toss to coat.

8. Serve the gnocchi warm, topped with additional grated parmesan cheese if desired."

input: Ingredients: extra-virgin olive oil, red pepper flakes, feta cheese crumbles, cannellini beans, garlic, diced tomatoes, chopped cilantro fresh. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Cannellini Beans with Feta and Tomatoes

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
- 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes
- 1 cup feta cheese crumbles
- 2 cans (15 ounces each) cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and red pepper flakes to the skillet. Sauté for about 1 minute until the garlic is fragrant.
3. Add the diced tomatoes to the skillet. Stir well to combine with the garlic and red pepper flakes.
4. Add the cannellini beans to the skillet. Stir well to combine with the other ingredients.
5. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and let it simmer for about 15 minutes.
6. Remove the skillet from the heat. Stir in the feta cheese crumbles and chopped cilantro.
7. Serve the dish warm. Enjoy your Spicy Cannellini Beans with Feta and Tomatoes!"

input: Ingredients: shiitake, green onions, Gochujang base, seafood stock, ginger, steak, radishes, watercress, shrimp, olive oil, jalapeno chilies, garlic, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Korean Surf and Turf Soup

Ingredients:
- 1 cup shiitake mushrooms, sliced
- 4 green onions, chopped
- 2 tablespoons Gochujang base
- 4 cups seafood stock
- 1 tablespoon ginger, minced
- 1 pound steak, thinly sliced
- 1 cup radishes, sliced
- 1 cup watercress
- 1 pound shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 jalapeno chilies, sliced
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 large onion, chopped

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the steak and cook until browned. Remove the steak from the pot and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the onions, garlic, and ginger. Cook until the onions are translucent.
3. Add the shiitake mushrooms and radishes to the pot. Cook for another 5 minutes.
4. Stir in the Gochujang base until the vegetables are well coated.
5. Pour in the seafood stock. Bring the soup to a boil.
6. Lower the heat and let the soup simmer for 20 minutes.
7. Add the shrimp to the pot. Cook until the shrimp are pink and cooked through.
8. Return the steak to the pot. Add the watercress and jalapeno chilies. Cook for another 2 minutes.
9. Garnish the soup with the chopped green onions before serving."

input: Ingredients: golden delicious apples, allspice, apple juice, cinnamon, sugar, corn starch. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spiced Golden Delicious Apple Compote

Ingredients:
- 6 Golden Delicious Apples
- 1/2 teaspoon Allspice
- 1 cup Apple Juice
- 1 teaspoon Cinnamon
- 1/2 cup Sugar
- 2 tablespoons Corn Starch

Instructions:
1. Peel, core, and slice the Golden Delicious apples.
2. In a large saucepan, combine the apple slices, allspice, apple juice, cinnamon, and sugar.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
4. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10 minutes, or until the apples are tender.
5. In a small bowl, mix the corn starch with a little cold water until smooth.
6. Stir the corn starch mixture into the apple mixture.
7. Increase the heat to medium and cook, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.
8. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the compote cool before serving."

input: Ingredients: light sour cream, flour tortillas, black olives, ground cumin, frozen whole kernel corn, green onions, fresh lime juice, refried beans, cooking spray, salsa, Mexican cheese blend, paprika, chopped cilantro fresh. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Mexican Fiesta Tortilla Bake

Ingredients:
- 1 cup light sour cream
- 8 flour tortillas (8-inch size)
- 1/2 cup sliced black olives
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 cup frozen whole kernel corn, thawed
- 1/2 cup chopped green onions
- 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice
- 1 can (16 ounces) refried beans
- Cooking spray
- 1 cup salsa
- 2 cups shredded Mexican cheese blend
- 1/2 teaspoon paprika
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly coat a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.
2. Spread each tortilla with refried beans, then sprinkle with cumin. Roll up each tortilla and place seam side down in the prepared baking dish.
3. In a bowl, combine the corn, green onions, and lime juice. Spread this mixture over the tortillas in the baking dish.
4. Pour the salsa evenly over the corn mixture, then sprinkle with the cheese and olives.
5. Cover the baking dish with foil and bake for 25 minutes.
6. Remove the foil, then sprinkle the paprika over the top. Bake, uncovered, for another 5 minutes or until the cheese is bubbly and starting to brown.
7. Remove from the oven and let stand for 5 minutes before serving. Sprinkle with the chopped cilantro and a dollop of sour cream on top before serving."

input: Ingredients: bread crumbs, green onions, all-purpose flour, garlic powder, bacon, elbow macaroni, milk, butter, sharp cheddar cheese, ground black pepper, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Bacon and Cheddar Macaroni & Cheese

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of bread crumbs
- 2 green onions, chopped
- 3 tablespoons of all-purpose flour
- 1/2 teaspoon of garlic powder
- 6 slices of bacon
- 2 cups of elbow macaroni
- 2 cups of milk
- 4 tablespoons of butter
- 2 cups of sharp cheddar cheese, shredded
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2. Cook the elbow macaroni according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
3. In a large skillet, cook the bacon over medium-high heat until crispy. Remove the bacon from the skillet, crumble, and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Stir in the flour, garlic powder, salt, and pepper until smooth.
5. Gradually whisk in the milk, and continue cooking over medium heat until the mixture is thick and bubbly.
6. Remove the skillet from the heat, and stir in the shredded cheddar cheese until melted and smooth.
7. Add the cooked macaroni to the cheese sauce, and stir until well coated.
8. Transfer the macaroni and cheese to a baking dish. Sprinkle the crumbled bacon, chopped green onions, and bread crumbs evenly over the top.
9. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the bread crumbs are golden brown and the cheese is bubbly.
10. Let the macaroni and cheese stand for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy your Bacon and Cheddar Macaroni & Cheese!"

input: Ingredients: tomato purÃ©e, dried thyme, bay leaves, white rice, okra, diced onions, minced garlic, ground black pepper, red wine, salt, red bell pepper, chicken stock, dried basil, hot pepper sauce, bacon, peanut oil, green bell pepper, eggplant, fully cooked ham, smoked sausage, diced celery. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Creole Jambalaya

Ingredients:
- 1 cup tomato purée
- 1 teaspoon dried thyme
- 2 bay leaves
- 2 cups white rice
- 2 cups okra, sliced
- 1 cup diced onions
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1/2 cup red wine
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 red bell pepper, diced
- 4 cups chicken stock
- 1 teaspoon dried basil
- 1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce
- 4 strips bacon
- 2 tablespoons peanut oil
- 1 green bell pepper, diced
- 1 eggplant, diced
- 1 cup fully cooked ham, diced
- 1 cup smoked sausage, sliced
- 1 cup diced celery

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, cook bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove bacon and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add peanut oil, onions, celery, bell peppers, and garlic. Sauté until vegetables are softened.
3. Add the sausage, ham, and eggplant to the pot. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Stir in the tomato purée, red wine, chicken stock, hot pepper sauce, dried thyme, dried basil, bay leaves, salt, and black pepper. Bring to a boil.
5. Reduce heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 20 minutes.
6. Add the rice and okra to the pot. Stir well, cover, and let it simmer for another 20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and has absorbed most of the liquid.
7. Crumble the cooked bacon and stir it into the jambalaya.
8. Serve hot. Enjoy your Hearty Creole Jambalaya!"

input: Ingredients: butter, fresh mushrooms, cooked ham, linguine, fresh basil leaves, ground black pepper, garlic, whipping cream, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Ham and Mushroom Linguine

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons of butter
- 2 cups of fresh mushrooms, sliced
- 1 cup of cooked ham, diced
- 8 ounces of linguine
- 1/4 cup of fresh basil leaves, chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 cup of whipping cream
- 1 medium onion, chopped

Instructions:

1. Cook the linguine according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.

2. While the linguine is cooking, melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat.

3. Add the onions to the skillet and sauté until they become translucent.

4. Add the garlic to the skillet and sauté for another minute until it becomes fragrant.

5. Add the mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they are browned and tender.

6. Add the diced ham to the skillet and cook for another 2-3 minutes until it is heated through.

7. Pour the whipping cream into the skillet and bring the mixture to a simmer.

8. Season the mixture with the ground black pepper.

9. Add the cooked linguine to the skillet and toss until it is well coated with the cream sauce.

10. Sprinkle the chopped basil leaves over the linguine just before serving.

Enjoy your Creamy Ham and Mushroom Linguine!"

input: Ingredients: corn, white cheddar cheese, monterey jack, chicken breasts, rice, refried beans, salt, pepper, cilantro, enchilada sauce. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Cheesy Chicken Enchilada Rice Bake

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of corn
- 1 cup of shredded white cheddar cheese
- 1 cup of shredded monterey jack cheese
- 2 chicken breasts
- 1 cup of rice
- 1 can of refried beans
- Salt to taste
- Pepper to taste
- 1/4 cup of chopped cilantro
- 1 can of enchilada sauce

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees.
2. Cook the chicken breasts in a pan over medium heat until no longer pink in the middle. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Once cooked, shred the chicken and set aside.
3. Cook the rice according to package instructions and set aside.
4. In a large bowl, combine the shredded chicken, cooked rice, corn, refried beans, half of the shredded cheeses, and half of the enchilada sauce. Mix until well combined.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and spread it out evenly.
6. Pour the remaining enchilada sauce over the top of the mixture in the baking dish.
7. Sprinkle the remaining shredded cheeses on top.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove from the oven and sprinkle the chopped cilantro on top before serving."

input: Ingredients: powdered sugar, large eggs, salt, mascarpone, whole milk ricotta cheese, grated lemon peel, sugar, whole milk, all-purpose flour, unsalted butter, vegetable oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Lemon Ricotta and Mascarpone Pancakes

Ingredients:
- 1 cup all-purpose flour
- 2 tablespoons powdered sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup whole milk ricotta cheese
- 1/2 cup mascarpone
- 2 large eggs
- 1/2 cup whole milk
- 1 tablespoon grated lemon peel
- 2 tablespoons sugar
- 2 tablespoons unsalted butter
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, powdered sugar, and salt.
2. In another bowl, mix together the ricotta cheese, mascarpone, eggs, whole milk, grated lemon peel, and sugar until well combined.
3. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, stirring until just combined.
4. Heat a large non-stick skillet over medium heat and add the unsalted butter and vegetable oil.
5. Once the butter has melted, scoop 1/4 cup of the pancake batter onto the skillet for each pancake.
6. Cook the pancakes until the edges are golden brown and bubbles form on the top, about 2-3 minutes.
7. Flip the pancakes and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until golden brown.
8. Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more butter and oil as needed.
9. Serve the pancakes warm, dusted with additional powdered sugar if desired."

input: Ingredients: pork, dry sherry, flat leaf parsley, olive oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sherry Glazed Pork with Parsley

Ingredients:
- 1 lb pork loin
- 1/2 cup dry sherry
- 1/2 cup chopped flat leaf parsley
- 2 tablespoons olive oil

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Heat the olive oil in a large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Add the pork loin to the skillet and sear on all sides until browned, about 2-3 minutes per side.
4. Remove the skillet from heat and pour the dry sherry over the pork loin.
5. Place the skillet in the preheated oven and roast for 25-30 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through.
6. Remove the skillet from the oven and let the pork rest for a few minutes.
7. Sprinkle the chopped parsley over the pork before serving."

input: Ingredients: milk, gravy, salt, seasoned flour, pepper, unsalted butter, buttermilk, peanut oil, kosher salt, ground pepper, onion powder, round steaks, eggs, garlic powder, chili powder, all-purpose flour. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Southern Style Chicken Fried Steak with Gravy

Ingredients:
- 4 round steaks
- 1 cup all-purpose flour
- 1 teaspoon seasoned flour
- 1 teaspoon kosher salt
- 1 teaspoon ground pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon onion powder
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/4 teaspoon chili powder
- 2 eggs
- 1/2 cup buttermilk
- 1/2 cup peanut oil
- 2 tablespoons unsalted butter
- 1 cup milk
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 cup gravy

Instructions:
1. In a shallow dish, combine all-purpose flour, seasoned flour, kosher salt, ground pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, and chili powder.
2. In another dish, whisk together eggs and buttermilk.
3. Dredge each steak first in the flour mixture, then in the buttermilk mixture, and again in the flour mixture.
4. Heat peanut oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the steaks, a few at a time, and cook until nicely browned, about 5 minutes each side.
5. Remove the steaks from the skillet and keep warm.
6. In the same skillet, reduce the heat to low and add the milk. Stir it around to dissolve the flour from the bottom of the skillet.
7. Add the gravy and stir until the mixture thickens and bubbles. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Return the steaks to the skillet and let them warm in the gravy for a few minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: vinaigrette dressing, ground black pepper, cherry tomatoes, lemon juice, kale, kalamata, feta cheese, oregano. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Greek Kale Salad with Feta and Kalamata

Ingredients:
- 1/4 cup vinaigrette dressing
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes
- 2 tablespoons lemon juice
- 4 cups kale, chopped
- 1/2 cup kalamata olives, pitted
- 1/2 cup feta cheese, crumbled
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano

Instructions:
1. In a large salad bowl, combine the chopped kale, cherry tomatoes, and kalamata olives.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the vinaigrette dressing, lemon juice, ground black pepper, and dried oregano.
3. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss well to combine.
4. Sprinkle the crumbled feta cheese over the top of the salad.
5. Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 2 hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld together."

input: Ingredients: sugar, peeled fresh ginger, all-purpose flour, ground ginger, crystallized ginger, buttermilk, baking soda, baking powder, pecan halves, unsalted butter, vanilla extract. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Ginger Pecan Buttermilk Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 cups sugar
- 2 tablespoons peeled fresh ginger
- 3 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 tablespoon ground ginger
- 1/2 cup crystallized ginger, finely chopped
- 1 cup buttermilk
- 1 teaspoon baking soda
- 1 teaspoon baking powder
- 1 cup pecan halves, chopped
- 1 cup unsalted butter, softened
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9x13 inch baking pan.
2. In a large bowl, cream together the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Beat in the fresh ginger and vanilla extract into the butter mixture.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, ground ginger, baking soda, and baking powder.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients into the butter mixture, alternating with the buttermilk. Begin and end with the dry ingredients. Mix until just combined.
6. Fold in the chopped crystallized ginger and pecan halves.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared baking pan, spreading it out evenly.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely."

input: Ingredients: sugar, celery, lettuce, mandarin orange segments, almonds, dressing, green onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Mandarin Orange Almond Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon sugar
- 2 stalks celery
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 can (11 ounces) mandarin orange segments
- 1/2 cup almonds
- 1/2 cup dressing (your choice, but a sweet vinaigrette works well)
- 2 green onions

Instructions:
1. Rinse the lettuce, celery, and green onions under cold water. Pat dry with a clean towel.
2. Chop the lettuce and celery into bite-sized pieces and place them in a large salad bowl.
3. Drain the mandarin orange segments and add them to the salad bowl.
4. Slice the green onions and add them to the salad bowl.
5. In a small pan over medium heat, add the almonds and sugar. Stir continuously until the sugar melts and coats the almonds. Remove from heat and let cool.
6. Once the almonds are cooled, add them to the salad bowl.
7. Drizzle your chosen dressing over the salad.
8. Toss the salad gently until all ingredients are mixed and coated with the dressing.
9. Serve immediately and enjoy your Mandarin Orange Almond Salad."

input: Ingredients: sugar, ground nutmeg, salt, ground cinnamon, dried currants, baking powder, dark brown sugar, dark molasses, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, melted butter, baking soda, buttermilk. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spiced Currant Molasses Cookies

Ingredients:
- 1 cup dark brown sugar
- 1/2 cup dark molasses
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter
- 1/2 cup melted butter
- 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
- 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
- 1 cup dried currants
- 1/2 cup buttermilk
- 1/4 cup sugar for dusting

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. In a large bowl, combine the dark brown sugar, dark molasses, unsalted butter, and melted butter. Stir until well combined.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, ground cinnamon, and ground nutmeg. Stir until well mixed.
4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, alternating with the buttermilk, beginning and ending with the dry ingredients. Stir until just combined.
5. Fold in the dried currants.
6. Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of the dough onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing them about 2 inches apart.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are set and the centers are still slightly soft.
8. Remove from the oven and immediately sprinkle with the sugar. Let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely."

input: Ingredients: corn, shallots, cabbage, pork, Shaoxing wine, garlic cloves, shredded carrots, salt, black pepper, lettuce leaves, bamboo shoots. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Pork and Vegetable Stir Fry Lettuce Wraps

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of corn
- 2 shallots, finely chopped
- 1 cup of cabbage, shredded
- 500 grams of pork, thinly sliced
- 2 tablespoons of Shaoxing wine
- 3 garlic cloves, minced
- 1 cup of shredded carrots
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 teaspoon of black pepper
- 8 large lettuce leaves
- 1 cup of bamboo shoots, sliced

Instructions:

1. Heat a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the pork and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the pork from the pan and set aside.

2. In the same pan, add the shallots and garlic. Cook until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes.

3. Add the cabbage, carrots, bamboo shoots, and corn to the pan. Stir fry for about 5 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.

4. Return the pork to the pan. Add the Shaoxing wine, salt, and black pepper. Stir well to combine.

5. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, until the pork is cooked through and the flavors have melded together.

6. To serve, spoon the pork and vegetable mixture onto the lettuce leaves. Wrap the lettuce around the filling and enjoy."

input: Ingredients: kale, low sodium chicken broth, scotch bonnet chile, okra, kosher salt, ground black pepper, vegetable oil, ground allspice, bone in chicken thighs, dried thyme, sweet potatoes, light coconut milk, medium shrimp, canned chopped tomatoes, bay leaves, garlic, onions. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Caribbean Chicken and Shrimp Stew

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of kale, chopped
- 4 cups of low sodium chicken broth
- 1 scotch bonnet chile, seeded and minced
- 1 cup of okra, sliced
- 1 teaspoon of kosher salt
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground allspice
- 4 bone-in chicken thighs
- 1 teaspoon of dried thyme
- 2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and diced
- 1 can (13.5 ounces) of light coconut milk
- 1 pound of medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1 can (14.5 ounces) of canned chopped tomatoes
- 2 bay leaves
- 3 cloves of garlic, minced
- 2 medium onions, chopped

Instructions:
1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the chicken thighs and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the onions, garlic, and scotch bonnet chile. Cook until the onions are translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the ground allspice, dried thyme, kosher salt, and black pepper to the pot. Stir to combine.
4. Add the sweet potatoes, okra, canned chopped tomatoes, and chicken broth to the pot. Stir to combine.
5. Return the chicken thighs to the pot and add the bay leaves. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes.
6. Add the coconut milk, shrimp, and kale to the pot. Stir to combine and continue to simmer for another 10 minutes, or until the shrimp are cooked through and the chicken is tender.
7. Remove the bay leaves before serving. Enjoy your Spicy Caribbean Chicken and Shrimp Stew."

input: Ingredients: lasagna noodles, ricotta cheese, salt, onions, tomato sauce, fresh thyme, red pepper flakes, shredded mozzarella cheese, zucchini, baby spinach, fresh oregano, eggplant, crimini mushrooms, garlic, red bell pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Vegetable Lasagna with Ricotta and Mozzarella

Ingredients:
- 12 lasagna noodles
- 2 cups ricotta cheese
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 3 cups tomato sauce
- 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes
- 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
- 2 medium zucchinis, sliced
- 2 cups baby spinach
- 1 tablespoon fresh oregano, chopped
- 1 large eggplant, sliced
- 2 cups crimini mushrooms, sliced
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 large red bell pepper, chopped

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. Cook the lasagna noodles according to the package instructions. Once done, drain and set aside.
3. In a large skillet over medium heat, sauté the onion, garlic, zucchini, eggplant, mushrooms, and red bell pepper until they are soft. This should take about 10 minutes.
4. Add the tomato sauce, fresh thyme, fresh oregano, red pepper flakes, and salt to the skillet. Stir well to combine.
5. In a 9x13 inch baking dish, spread a thin layer of the vegetable and sauce mixture. Layer with 4 lasagna noodles, then spread half of the ricotta cheese on top. Add a layer of baby spinach, then sprinkle with a third of the mozzarella cheese.
6. Repeat the layers, starting with the vegetable and sauce mixture, then noodles, ricotta, spinach, and mozzarella.
7. Top with a final layer of the remaining 4 noodles, the rest of the sauce, and the remaining mozzarella.
8. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes.
9. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 10 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden.
10. Let the lasagna rest for 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy your Vegetable Lasagna with Ricotta and Mozzarella!"

input: Ingredients: red chili peppers, thai basil, coconut milk, fish sauce, lemongrass, green onions, chicken broth, minced ginger, mushrooms, cooked shrimp, coconut oil, lime, garlic. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Thai Coconut Shrimp Soup

Ingredients:
- 2 red chili peppers, finely chopped
- 1 cup Thai basil leaves
