- 2 cups of enchilada sauce
- 1 can (15 oz) of black beans
- 1 lb of ground beef
- 8 Old El Paso Flour Tortillas
- 2 cups of shredded cheese

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium-high heat until no longer pink. Drain the excess fat.
3. Rinse and drain the black beans. Add them to the skillet with the cooked beef.
4. Pour in 1 cup of the enchilada sauce into the beef and bean mixture. Stir well to combine.
5. Lay out the Old El Paso Flour Tortillas and evenly distribute the beef and bean mixture among them. Sprinkle a handful of cheese over the mixture in each tortilla.
6. Roll up each tortilla and place them seam-side down in a 13x9-inch (3-quart) baking dish.
7. Pour the remaining 1 cup of enchilada sauce over the filled tortillas. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top.
8. Bake for 20 minutes or until the cheese is melted and the enchiladas are heated through."

input: Ingredients: fresh ginger, ground pork, oyster sauce, spring roll wrappers, spring onions, salt, cabbage, flour, garlic, carrots, soy sauce, vegetable oil, freshly ground pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Homemade Pork Spring Rolls

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated
- 500 grams ground pork
- 2 tablespoons oyster sauce
- 20 spring roll wrappers
- 4 spring onions, finely chopped
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 cups cabbage, finely shredded
- 2 tablespoons flour
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup carrots, finely shredded
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 1 cup vegetable oil
- 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the ground pork, grated ginger, minced garlic, shredded cabbage, shredded carrots, chopped spring onions, oyster sauce, soy sauce, salt, and freshly ground pepper. Mix until well combined.
2. Lay a spring roll wrapper flat on a clean surface. Place about 2 tablespoons of the pork mixture onto the lower third of the wrapper.
3. Fold the bottom of the wrapper over the filling, then fold in the sides and roll tightly. Seal the edge with a little bit of flour mixed with water to form a paste.
4. Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling.
5. Heat the vegetable oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat.
6. Once the oil is hot, carefully add the spring rolls, a few at a time, and fry until golden brown and crispy, about 2-3 minutes per side.
7. Use a slotted spoon to remove the spring rolls from the oil and drain on paper towels.
8. Serve the spring rolls hot with soy sauce for dipping."

input: Ingredients: pepper, spicy brown mustard, boneless chicken breast halves, peach preserves, dried thyme, salt, melted butter, balsamic vinegar. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Peach Glazed Chicken

Ingredients:
- 4 boneless chicken breast halves
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 teaspoon of pepper
- 1 tablespoon of dried thyme
- 2 tablespoons of melted butter
- 1/4 cup of spicy brown mustard
- 1/2 cup of peach preserves
- 2 tablespoons of balsamic vinegar

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Season both sides of the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and dried thyme.
3. Heat the melted butter in a large oven-safe skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until they are browned on both sides, about 5 minutes per side.
4. In a small bowl, combine the spicy brown mustard, peach preserves, and balsamic vinegar. Stir until well mixed.
5. Pour the peach preserve mixture over the chicken in the skillet, making sure each piece is well coated.
6. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the glaze is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
7. Remove from the oven and let the chicken rest for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy your Spicy Peach Glazed Chicken!"

input: Ingredients: pepper, lamb loin chops, salt, fat. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Simple Seasoned Lamb Loin Chops

Ingredients:
- 4 lamb loin chops
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 teaspoon of pepper
- 2 tablespoons of fat (preferably lamb fat)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your grill or broiler on high heat.
2. Rub each lamb loin chop with half a tablespoon of fat, ensuring all sides are covered.
3. Season each chop evenly with the salt and pepper.
4. Place the chops on the grill or under the broiler.
5. Cook for about 4-5 minutes on each side for medium-rare, or until they reach your desired level of doneness.
6. Remove the chops from the grill or broiler and let them rest for a few minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: egg substitute, chicken breast halves, pasta sauce, part-skim mozzarella cheese, spaghetti, olive oil, fresh parsley, seasoned bread crumbs, grated parmesan cheese. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Chicken Parmesan with Spaghetti

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup egg substitute
- 4 chicken breast halves
- 2 cups pasta sauce
- 1 cup part-skim mozzarella cheese
- 8 ounces spaghetti
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped
- 1 cup seasoned bread crumbs
- 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. Dip each chicken breast half in the egg substitute, then coat with the seasoned bread crumbs.
3. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook until golden brown on both sides, about 5 minutes per side.
4. While the chicken is cooking, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add the spaghetti and cook until tender, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain and set aside.
5. Place the cooked chicken in a baking dish. Pour the pasta sauce over the chicken, then sprinkle with the mozzarella and parmesan cheeses.
6. Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese is melted and bubbly, about 20 minutes.
7. Serve the chicken and sauce over the cooked spaghetti. Garnish with the fresh parsley before serving."

input: Ingredients: sesame, low sodium chicken broth, yellow onion, canola oil, boneless pork shoulder, kosher salt, green onions, garlic cloves, cremini mushrooms, leeks, soft-boiled egg, low sodium soy sauce, fresh ginger, ramen noodles, Equal Sweetener. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sesame Ginger Pork Ramen

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon sesame seeds
- 6 cups low sodium chicken broth
- 1 large yellow onion, chopped
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 2 pounds boneless pork shoulder, cut into chunks
- 1 teaspoon kosher salt
- 2 green onions, chopped
- 4 garlic cloves, minced
- 1 cup cremini mushrooms, sliced
- 2 leeks, cleaned and sliced
- 4 soft-boiled eggs
- 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons fresh ginger, grated
- 4 packs ramen noodles
- 1 tablespoon Equal Sweetener

Instructions:
1. Heat a large pot over medium heat and add the sesame seeds. Toast until golden brown, then remove and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the canola oil and pork shoulder. Season with kosher salt and cook until browned on all sides.
3. Add the yellow onion, garlic, and ginger to the pot. Cook until the onion is translucent.
4. Add the chicken broth, soy sauce, and Equal Sweetener to the pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 2 hours.
5. In a separate pan, sauté the cremini mushrooms and leeks until tender. Set aside.
6. Cook the ramen noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
7. After 2 hours, remove the pork from the broth and shred it. Return the shredded pork to the pot.
8. To serve, divide the ramen noodles among 4 bowls. Ladle the broth and pork over the noodles. Top with the sautéed mushrooms, leeks, soft-boiled eggs, green onions, and toasted sesame seeds."

input: Ingredients: cottage cheese, lemon rind, eggs, cinnamon, sour cream, flour, lemon juice, sugar, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Lemon-Cinnamon Cottage Cheese Pancakes

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of cottage cheese
- 1 tablespoon of grated lemon rind
- 4 large eggs
- 1/2 teaspoon of cinnamon
- 1/2 cup of sour cream
- 1 cup of flour
- 2 tablespoons of lemon juice
- 1/4 cup of sugar
- 1/4 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:

1. In a large bowl, combine the cottage cheese, lemon rind, eggs, cinnamon, sour cream, lemon juice, sugar, and salt. Mix until well combined.

2. Gradually add the flour to the cottage cheese mixture, stirring until just combined.

3. Heat a large non-stick skillet over medium heat. 

4. Drop batter by 1/4 cupfuls onto the skillet, and cook until bubbles form and the edges are dry, about 2-3 minutes. Flip and cook until browned on the other side.

5. Repeat with remaining batter.

6. Serve the pancakes warm. Enjoy your Lemon-Cinnamon Cottage Cheese Pancakes!"

input: Ingredients: chopped parsley, grated parmesan cheese, unsalted butter, gnocchi, chopped fresh chives. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Parmesan Gnocchi with Herb Butter

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons chopped parsley
- 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 4 tablespoons unsalted butter
- 500 grams gnocchi
- 2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives

Instructions:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the gnocchi and cook until they float to the top, about 2-3 minutes. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, melt the unsalted butter over medium heat. 
3. Add the cooked gnocchi to the skillet and sauté until they start to brown, about 2-3 minutes.
4. Sprinkle the grated parmesan cheese over the gnocchi and stir until the cheese is melted and the gnocchi are well coated.
5. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the chopped parsley and chives.
6. Serve the gnocchi hot, garnished with a little extra parmesan cheese if desired."

input: Ingredients: ground black pepper, salt, bay leaves, dark brown sugar, clove, apple cider, fresh ham, dijon mustard, beer. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Apple Cider and Beer Glazed Ham

Ingredients:
- 1 fresh ham (about 8-10 pounds)
- 2 teaspoons ground black pepper
- 2 teaspoons salt
- 3 bay leaves
- 1 cup dark brown sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon clove
- 2 cups apple cider
- 1/4 cup dijon mustard
- 1 can beer (12 ounces)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (165°C).
2. Rinse the fresh ham under cold water and pat dry with paper towels.
3. Rub the ham all over with the ground black pepper and salt.
4. Place the ham in a large roasting pan and scatter the bay leaves around it.
5. In a medium saucepan, combine the dark brown sugar, clove, apple cider, dijon mustard, and beer. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring until the sugar is dissolved.
6. Pour the apple cider mixture over the ham, making sure to coat it evenly.
7. Cover the roasting pan with aluminum foil and place it in the preheated oven.
8. Bake for about 3 hours, basting the ham with the pan juices every 30 minutes.
9. Remove the foil and continue to bake for another hour, or until the ham is fully cooked and the glaze is caramelized.
10. Let the ham rest for 15 minutes before slicing and serving."

input: Ingredients: clove, pasilla chiles, almonds, tomatillos, pumpkin seeds, corn tortillas, anise seed, salt and ground black pepper, seeds, white rice, cinnamon sticks, chicken pieces, black peppercorns, coriander seeds, vegetable oil, mexican chocolate, ancho chile pepper, chicken broth, sesame seeds, mulato chiles, raisins, garlic cloves, french rolls. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Traditional Mexican Mole Poblano

Ingredients:
- 4 chicken pieces
- 2 liters chicken broth
- 3 ancho chile peppers
- 3 mulato chiles
- 3 pasilla chiles
- 2 tomatillos
- 2 garlic cloves
- 1/2 cup almonds
- 1/2 cup raisins
- 1/4 cup pumpkin seeds
- 1/4 cup sesame seeds
- 1/4 cup white rice
- 2 corn tortillas
- 2 french rolls
- 1 cinnamon stick
- 1 clove
- 1 anise seed
- 1 teaspoon coriander seeds
- 1 teaspoon black peppercorns
- 1 tablet Mexican chocolate
- Salt and ground black pepper to taste
- Vegetable oil as needed

Instructions:
1. In a large pot, add the chicken pieces and chicken broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until chicken is cooked through, about 30 minutes.
2. While the chicken is cooking, toast the ancho, mulato, and pasilla chiles in a dry pan over medium heat until fragrant. Remove from heat and soak in hot water until soft.
3. In the same pan, toast the almonds, raisins, pumpkin seeds, sesame seeds, and white rice until golden. Set aside.
4. Toast the corn tortillas and french rolls until crispy. Set aside.
5. In a blender, combine the softened chiles, toasted nuts and seeds, rice, tomatillos, garlic cloves, cinnamon stick, clove, anise seed, coriander seeds, black peppercorns, and Mexican chocolate. Blend until smooth.
6. Heat some vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the blended mixture and cook, stirring constantly, for about 10 minutes.
7. Add the cooked chicken and broth to the pot. Season with salt and ground black pepper to taste.
8. Simmer the mole for about 1 hour, until the flavors are well combined.
9. Serve the mole poblano hot, garnished with additional sesame seeds if desired."

input: Ingredients: dijon mustard, ground white pepper, soft goat's cheese, ricotta cheese, truffle oil, hazelnuts, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Truffle Goat Cheese and Ricotta Dip with Hazelnuts

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons dijon mustard
- 1/2 teaspoon ground white pepper
- 1 cup soft goat's cheese
- 1 cup ricotta cheese
- 2 tablespoons truffle oil
- 1/2 cup hazelnuts, toasted and chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. In a medium bowl, combine the soft goat's cheese and ricotta cheese. Mix until well combined.
2. Add the dijon mustard, ground white pepper, and salt to the cheese mixture. Stir until all ingredients are evenly distributed.
3. Drizzle in the truffle oil while continuing to stir the cheese mixture.
4. Fold in the toasted and chopped hazelnuts, reserving a small amount for garnish.
5. Transfer the dip to a serving bowl and sprinkle the remaining hazelnuts on top for garnish.
6. Serve immediately with your choice of bread or crackers. Enjoy this luxurious Truffle Goat Cheese and Ricotta Dip with Hazelnuts."

input: Ingredients: unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, capers, vegetable oil, dry white wine, flat leaf parsley, veal scallopini, lemon. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Veal Scallopini with Lemon and Capers

Ingredients:
- 4 veal scallopini (about 4 ounces each)
- 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
- 2 tablespoons unsalted butter
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 1/4 cup dry white wine
- 2 tablespoons capers, rinsed and drained
- 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice (from about 1 lemon)
- 1/4 cup flat-leaf parsley, chopped

Instructions:
1. Season the veal scallopini with salt and pepper, then dredge in the all-purpose flour, shaking off any excess.
2. In a large skillet, heat the unsalted butter and vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
3. Add the veal to the skillet and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side. Remove the veal from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the dry white wine and scrape the bottom of the skillet to loosen any browned bits. 
5. Add the capers and lemon juice to the skillet and bring to a simmer. Cook for 2 minutes.
6. Return the veal to the skillet and cook for an additional 2 minutes, turning to coat in the sauce.
7. Sprinkle the veal with the chopped flat-leaf parsley before serving."

input: Ingredients: sesame seeds, spinach, sesame oil, mirin, soy sauce. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sesame Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons sesame seeds
- 500 grams spinach
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 2 tablespoons mirin
- 1 tablespoon soy sauce

Instructions:
1. Rinse the spinach thoroughly under cold running water.
2. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add the spinach and blanch for 1 minute until wilted.
3. Drain the spinach and rinse under cold water. Squeeze out the excess water and set aside.
4. In a small pan, toast the sesame seeds over medium heat for about 2 minutes until they are golden brown and fragrant.
5. In a large bowl, combine the sesame oil, mirin, and soy sauce. Stir until well mixed.
6. Add the spinach to the bowl and toss until it is well coated with the dressing.
7. Sprinkle the toasted sesame seeds over the spinach.
8. Serve the salad chilled or at room temperature."

input: Ingredients: clove, boneless chicken skinless thigh, minced ginger, poppy seeds, blanched almonds, ground turmeric, black peppercorns, kosher salt, cinnamon, raw cashews, bay leaf, fennel seeds, plain yogurt, rose petals, paprika, fresh lemon juice, canola oil, green cardamom pods, cooked rice, minced garlic, heavy cream, yellow onion, serrano chile. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Chicken Korma with Almonds and Poppy Seeds

Ingredients:
- 4 boneless chicken skinless thighs
- 1 tablespoon minced ginger
- 1 tablespoon poppy seeds
- 1/2 cup blanched almonds
- 1 teaspoon ground turmeric
- 1 teaspoon black peppercorns
- 1 teaspoon kosher salt
- 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1/4 cup raw cashews
- 1 bay leaf
- 1 teaspoon fennel seeds
- 1 cup plain yogurt
- 1 tablespoon dried rose petals
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice
- 2 tablespoons canola oil
- 4 green cardamom pods
- 2 cups cooked rice
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 1/2 cup heavy cream
- 1 large yellow onion, finely chopped
- 1 serrano chile, finely chopped

Instructions:
1. Heat the canola oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the chicken thighs and cook until browned on all sides. Remove from the pan and set aside.
2. In the same pan, add the chopped onion, minced garlic, minced ginger, and serrano chile. Cook until the onion is translucent.
3. Add the ground turmeric, black peppercorns, kosher salt, cinnamon, bay leaf, fennel seeds, and green cardamom pods to the pan. Stir well to combine with the onion mixture.
4. Add the blanched almonds, raw cashews, and poppy seeds to the pan. Cook for a few minutes until the nuts are lightly toasted.
5. Transfer the mixture from the pan to a blender. Add the plain yogurt, dried rose petals, and fresh lemon juice. Blend until smooth.
6. Return the blended mixture to the pan over medium heat. Add the browned chicken thighs back into the pan. Stir well to coat the chicken with the sauce.
7. Cover the pan and let it simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
8. Stir in the heavy cream and paprika. Cook for another 2-3 minutes.
9. Serve the creamy chicken korma over cooked rice. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: warm water, gluten free all purpose flour, tapioca starch, eggs, xanthan gum. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Gluten-Free Bread

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 cups warm water
- 3 cups gluten free all purpose flour
- 1 cup tapioca starch
- 2 eggs
- 1 teaspoon xanthan gum

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the gluten free all purpose flour, tapioca starch, and xanthan gum.
3. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs and then add the warm water. Mix well.
4. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring continuously until a dough forms.
5. Knead the dough for about 5 minutes until it becomes smooth.
6. Place the dough in a greased bread pan and let it rise in a warm place for about 30 minutes.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for about 35-40 minutes, or until the top is golden brown.
8. Remove from the oven and let it cool before slicing."

input: Ingredients: sugar, ground nutmeg, lemon, cream cheese, greens, warm water, flour, vanilla, lemon juice, dough, cream, egg yolks, salt, confectioners sugar, melted butter, milk, cake, icing, yeast. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Lemon Cream Cheese Cake with Nutmeg and Vanilla Icing

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of sugar
- 1 teaspoon of ground nutmeg
- 1 lemon
- 8 ounces of cream cheese
- 1 cup of warm water
- 3 cups of flour
- 1 teaspoon of vanilla
- 2 tablespoons of lemon juice
- 1 cup of cream
- 4 egg yolks
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1 cup of confectioners sugar
- 1/2 cup of melted butter
- 1/2 cup of milk
- 1 teaspoon of yeast

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sugar, flour, yeast, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the warm water, milk, and melted butter. Gradually add this mixture to the dry ingredients, stirring until a dough forms.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface for about 10 minutes, then place it in a greased bowl, cover it, and let it rise for 1 hour.
5. While the dough is rising, mix the cream cheese, egg yolks, lemon juice, and 1 cup of sugar in a separate bowl until smooth.
6. Roll out the dough into a rectangle, spread the cream cheese mixture over it, then roll it up and place it in a greased loaf pan.
7. Bake for 30 minutes, or until the top is golden brown.
8. While the cake is baking, mix the confectioners sugar, vanilla, ground nutmeg, and cream to make the icing.
9. Once the cake is done, let it cool for 10 minutes, then drizzle the icing over the top.
10. Grate the lemon zest over the icing for garnish. Enjoy your Lemon Cream Cheese Cake with Nutmeg and Vanilla Icing!"

input: Ingredients: shredded mozzarella cheese, water, spaghetti, pasta, elbow macaroni, diced tomatoes. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Three Pasta Tomato and Cheese Bake

Ingredients:
- 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
- 6 cups water
- 1 cup spaghetti
- 1 cup pasta
- 1 cup elbow macaroni
- 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. In a large pot, bring the 6 cups of water to a boil.
3. Add the spaghetti, pasta, and elbow macaroni to the boiling water.
4. Cook the pasta for 8-10 minutes or until al dente, then drain.
5. In a large baking dish, combine the cooked pasta and diced tomatoes. Mix well.
6. Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese evenly over the top of the pasta and tomatoes.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: bread flour, bread yeast, warm water, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Simple Homemade Bread

Ingredients:
- 4 cups of bread flour
- 2 teaspoons of bread yeast
- 1 1/2 cups of warm water
- 1 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the bread flour and salt.
2. In a separate bowl, dissolve the yeast in warm water. Let it sit for about 5 minutes until it becomes frothy.
3. Gradually add the yeast mixture to the flour mixture, stirring until it forms a soft dough.
4. Knead the dough on a lightly floured surface for about 10 minutes, until it is smooth and elastic.
5. Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover it with a clean cloth, and let it rise in a warm place for about 1 hour, or until it has doubled in size.
6. Punch down the dough and knead it for a few more minutes. Shape it into a loaf and place it in a greased loaf pan.
7. Cover the pan and let the dough rise for another 30 minutes, or until it has doubled in size.
8. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius).
9. Bake the bread for about 30 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped on the bottom.
10. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack before slicing and serving."

input: Ingredients: chicken broth, fresh mushrooms, soy sauce, corn starch, green onions, beansprouts, eggs, peanut oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Mushroom and Bean Sprout Soup

Ingredients:
- 4 cups of chicken broth
- 2 cups of fresh mushrooms, sliced
- 2 tablespoons of soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon of corn starch
- 1/2 cup of green onions, chopped
- 1 cup of beansprouts
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 2 tablespoons of peanut oil

Instructions:
1. Heat the peanut oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the sliced mushrooms and sauté until they are browned and tender, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the chicken broth to the pot and bring the mixture to a boil.
3. In a small bowl, mix the corn starch with a little bit of cold water until it forms a smooth paste. Slowly stir this into the boiling broth, stirring continuously to prevent lumps from forming.
4. Reduce the heat to low and let the soup simmer for about 10 minutes, or until it has thickened slightly.
5. Stir in the soy sauce, green onions, and beansprouts. Let the soup simmer for another 5 minutes.
6. Slowly pour the beaten eggs into the soup, stirring continuously to create thin ribbons of egg.
7. Let the soup cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the eggs are fully cooked. Serve hot."

input: Ingredients: olive oil, red potato, vegan parmesan cheese, garlic, fresh chives, dried oregano. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Vegan Parmesan Roasted Red Potatoes

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1.5 pounds red potatoes
- 1/2 cup vegan parmesan cheese
- 3 cloves garlic
- 1/4 cup fresh chives
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Wash and cut the red potatoes into quarters.
3. Mince the garlic cloves.
4. In a large bowl, combine the quartered red potatoes, minced garlic, olive oil, and dried oregano. Toss until the potatoes are well coated.
5. Transfer the potatoes to a baking sheet and spread them out in a single layer.
6. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy.
7. While the potatoes are still hot, sprinkle the vegan parmesan cheese over them. Toss until the cheese is melted and coats the potatoes.
8. Chop the fresh chives and sprinkle them over the potatoes.
9. Serve the Vegan Parmesan Roasted Red Potatoes hot. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: saffron threads, minced garlic, ground black pepper, chopped onion, fat free less sodium chicken broth, fresh parmesan cheese, crushed red pepper, plum tomatoes, arborio rice, olive oil, dry white wine, flat leaf parsley, cremini mushrooms, sea scallops, butter, medium shrimp. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Seafood Risotto with Saffron and Cremini Mushrooms

Ingredients:
- 1/4 teaspoon saffron threads
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 cup chopped onion
- 4 cups fat free less sodium chicken broth
- 1/2 cup fresh parmesan cheese, grated
- 1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper
- 2 plum tomatoes, diced
- 1 1/2 cups arborio rice
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1/2 cup dry white wine
- 1/4 cup chopped flat leaf parsley
- 1 cup sliced cremini mushrooms
- 1/2 pound sea scallops
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1/2 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

Instructions:
1. Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add chopped onion and minced garlic, cook until soft.
2. Add arborio rice to the pan, stir to coat with oil. Cook for 2 minutes.
3. Pour in dry white wine, stir until it is fully absorbed by the rice.
4. Add 1 cup of chicken broth to the rice, stir until it is absorbed. Repeat this step until all broth is used.
5. Stir in saffron threads, ground black pepper, and crushed red pepper.
6. In a separate pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add sea scallops and shrimp, cook until they are done. Remove from heat.
7. Add diced plum tomatoes and sliced cremini mushrooms to the rice, cook for another 2 minutes.
8. Add cooked scallops and shrimp to the rice, stir to combine.
9. Remove from heat, stir in grated parmesan cheese and chopped flat leaf parsley.
10. Serve immediately. Enjoy your Seafood Risotto with Saffron and Cremini Mushrooms!"

input: Ingredients: peaches, brown sugar, old-fashioned oats, ground cinnamon, granulated sugar, biscuit baking mix. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Peach Crumble with Oat Topping

Ingredients:
- 6 peaches, peeled and sliced
- 1/2 cup brown sugar
- 1 cup old-fashioned oats
- 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 1/4 cup granulated sugar
- 2 cups biscuit baking mix

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced peaches, brown sugar, and 1/2 teaspoon of the ground cinnamon. Stir until the peaches are evenly coated. Pour the peach mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.

3. In another bowl, combine the old-fashioned oats, granulated sugar, biscuit baking mix, and the remaining 1/2 teaspoon of ground cinnamon. Stir until the mixture is well combined.

4. Sprinkle the oat mixture evenly over the peaches in the baking dish.

5. Bake in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the topping is golden brown and the peaches are bubbling.

6. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving."

input: Ingredients: ahi, french bread, olive oil, onions, capers, ground black pepper, kosher salt, fresh lemon juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Ahi Tuna Tartine with Capers and Onions

Ingredients:
- 2 ahi tuna steaks (about 6 ounces each)
- 1 loaf of French bread
- 4 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1 medium onion, thinly sliced
- 2 tablespoons of capers
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon of kosher salt
- 2 tablespoons of fresh lemon juice

Instructions:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan over medium-high heat.
2. Season the ahi tuna steaks with the kosher salt and ground black pepper.
3. Grill the ahi tuna steaks for about 2 minutes on each side, or until they reach your desired level of doneness. Remove from the grill and let them rest.
4. While the tuna is resting, slice the French bread into 1/2 inch thick slices and brush each side with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil.
5. Grill the bread slices for about 1 minute on each side, or until they are lightly toasted. Remove from the grill.
6. In a skillet over medium heat, add the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Add the sliced onions and cook until they are caramelized, about 10 minutes.
7. Slice the grilled ahi tuna steaks thinly.
8. To assemble the tartines, top each slice of grilled bread with the caramelized onions, followed by the sliced ahi tuna.
9. Sprinkle the capers over the top of the tuna, then drizzle with the fresh lemon juice.
10. Serve immediately. Enjoy your Ahi Tuna Tartine with Capers and Onions!"

input: Ingredients: chopped cilantro fresh, whole cranberry sauce, ground cinnamon, hot sauce. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Cranberry Cilantro Relish

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of chopped fresh cilantro
- 2 cups of whole cranberry sauce
- 1 teaspoon of ground cinnamon
- 2 tablespoons of hot sauce

Instructions:
1. In a medium-sized bowl, combine 2 cups of whole cranberry sauce and 1 teaspoon of ground cinnamon. Mix until the cinnamon is evenly distributed.
2. Add 2 tablespoons of hot sauce to the cranberry mixture. Stir until the hot sauce is fully incorporated.
3. Fold in 1 cup of chopped fresh cilantro, ensuring it's evenly distributed throughout the mixture.
4. Allow the relish to sit for at least 30 minutes before serving, this allows the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve as a side dish or a topping for your favorite meat or vegetarian dishes. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: milk, walnuts, sugar, flour, powdered sugar, unsalted butter, rose water, cinnamon. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Rose Water and Walnut Cookies

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of milk
- 1 cup of walnuts
- 1/2 cup of sugar
- 2 cups of flour
- 1/2 cup of powdered sugar
- 1 cup of unsalted butter
- 2 tablespoons of rose water
- 1 teaspoon of cinnamon

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, and cinnamon.
3. In a separate bowl, cream the unsalted butter until it is light and fluffy.
4. Gradually add the flour mixture to the butter, mixing well after each addition.
5. Stir in the milk and rose water until the dough comes together.
6. Fold in the walnuts.
7. Roll the dough into 1-inch balls and place them 2 inches apart on a baking sheet.
8. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the cookies are golden brown.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Dust the cooled cookies with powdered sugar before serving."

input: Ingredients: cooking oil, corn starch, red chili peppers, salt, lotus roots, light soy sauce, green chilies, eggs, garlic, ginger root. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Lotus Root Stir Fry

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons cooking oil
- 1 tablespoon corn starch
- 2 red chili peppers, sliced
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 lotus roots, peeled and sliced
- 3 tablespoons light soy sauce
- 2 green chilies, sliced
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 inch ginger root, minced

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix the sliced lotus roots with corn starch until they are well coated. Set aside.
2. Heat the cooking oil in a wok or large frying pan over medium heat.
3. Add the minced garlic and ginger to the pan and sauté until fragrant.
4. Add the red and green chilies to the pan and continue to sauté for another minute.
5. Add the coated lotus roots to the pan and stir fry for about 5 minutes, or until they start to become tender.
6. Push the lotus roots to one side of the pan and pour the beaten eggs into the other side. Scramble the eggs until they are fully cooked.
7. Mix the scrambled eggs with the lotus roots and add the light soy sauce and salt. Stir well to combine all the ingredients.
8. Continue to cook for another 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently.
9. Serve the Spicy Lotus Root Stir Fry hot. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: tomatoes, garlic powder, chili powder, dried minced onion, taco shells, condiments, cayenne pepper, dried oregano, tomato sauce, guacamole, salsa, ground beef, lettuce, refried beans, colby jack cheese, corn starch, ground cumin. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Beef Tacos with Homemade Salsa

Ingredients:
- 2 tomatoes
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1 tablespoon dried minced onion
- 12 taco shells
- Condiments (as desired)
- 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1 cup tomato sauce
- 1 cup guacamole
- 1 cup salsa
- 1 pound ground beef
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 can refried beans
- 1 cup shredded colby jack cheese
- 1 tablespoon corn starch
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin

Instructions:
1. In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat. Drain the excess fat.
2. Add the garlic powder, chili powder, dried minced onion, cayenne pepper, dried oregano, ground cumin, and corn starch to the skillet. Stir well to combine.
3. Add the tomato sauce to the skillet. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for 10 minutes.
4. While the beef is cooking, chop the lettuce and tomatoes. Set aside.
5. Warm the refried beans in a small saucepan over low heat.
6. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Place the taco shells on a baking sheet and heat in the oven for 5 minutes.
7. To assemble the tacos, spread a spoonful of refried beans on the bottom of each taco shell. Top with the beef mixture, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
8. Serve the tacos with guacamole, salsa, and other condiments as desired."

input: Ingredients: boneless chicken skinless thigh, curry powder, unsalted cashews, cilantro, onions, chicken broth, minced garlic, yoghurt, diced tomatoes, cinnamon sticks, tomato paste, cream, cayenne, butter, salt, fennel seeds, black pepper, fresh ginger, seeds, white wine vinegar. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Cashew Chicken Curry

Ingredients:
- 1.5 lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs
- 2 tablespoons curry powder
- 1 cup unsalted cashews
- 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 2 cups chicken broth
- 3 cloves minced garlic
- 1/2 cup yoghurt
- 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes
- 2 cinnamon sticks
- 2 tablespoons tomato paste
- 1/2 cup cream
- 1/2 teaspoon cayenne
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 teaspoon fennel seeds
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated
- 1 tablespoon white wine vinegar

Instructions:
1. Melt the butter in a large pan over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, and ginger. Cook until the onion is soft.
2. Add the chicken thighs to the pan. Cook until they are browned on all sides.
3. Add the curry powder, cayenne, salt, black pepper, and fennel seeds to the pan. Stir well to coat the chicken.
4. Add the tomato paste, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, and cinnamon sticks to the pan. Stir well.
5. Cover the pan and simmer for 20 minutes.
6. While the chicken is cooking, toast the cashews in a dry pan until they are golden brown. Set them aside to cool.
7. After the chicken has cooked for 20 minutes, stir in the yoghurt and cream. Cook for another 10 minutes.
8. Stir in the toasted cashews and white wine vinegar. Cook for another 2 minutes.
9. Serve the curry over rice, garnished with the chopped cilantro."

input: Ingredients: golden brown sugar, anjou pears, all purpose unbleached flour, fresh lemon juice, granny smith apples, crystallized ginger, ice water, salt, honey, unsalted butter, vegetable shortening, chinese five-spice powder, sugar, whole wheat flour, large eggs, whipping cream. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spiced Pear and Apple Pie with Ginger Crust

Ingredients:
- 1 cup golden brown sugar
- 3 anjou pears
- 2 cups all purpose unbleached flour
- 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice
- 3 granny smith apples
- 1/4 cup crystallized ginger
- 1/4 cup ice water
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 tablespoon honey
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter
- 1/2 cup vegetable shortening
- 1 teaspoon chinese five-spice powder
- 1/4 cup sugar
- 1/2 cup whole wheat flour
- 2 large eggs
- 1 cup whipping cream

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F.
2. In a large bowl, combine the all purpose unbleached flour, whole wheat flour, sugar, and salt. Cut in the unsalted butter and vegetable shortening until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
3. Stir in the crystallized ginger. Gradually add the ice water, stirring until the dough forms a ball. Divide the dough in half, wrap in plastic, and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
4. Peel and slice the anjou pears and granny smith apples. Toss with the golden brown sugar, chinese five-spice powder, and fresh lemon juice.
5. Roll out one half of the dough to fit a 9-inch pie plate. Place the crust in the pie plate and trim the edges. Spoon the pear and apple mixture into the crust.
6. Roll out the second half of the dough and place it over the filling. Trim and crimp the edges, then cut slits in the top crust to allow steam to escape.
7. Beat the large eggs with the honey and brush over the top crust. Sprinkle with additional sugar, if desired.
8. Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the filling is bubbly. Let cool on a wire rack.
9. While the pie is cooling, whip the cream until soft peaks form. Serve the pie with a dollop of whipped cream."

input: Ingredients: ground black pepper, arrowroot powder, carrots, cremini mushrooms, dried sage, extra-virgin olive oil, dried parsley, green cabbage, sweet potatoes, sea salt, onions, dried thyme, lamb stew meat, garlic, chicken. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Lamb and Chicken Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 2 tablespoons arrowroot powder
- 3 medium carrots, chopped
- 1 cup cremini mushrooms, sliced
- 1 teaspoon dried sage
- 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 teaspoon dried parsley
- 1/2 green cabbage, chopped
- 2 medium sweet potatoes, cubed
- 1 teaspoon sea salt
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1 teaspoon dried thyme
- 1 pound lamb stew meat, cubed
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 pound chicken, cubed

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the lamb and chicken, season with salt and pepper, and cook until browned on all sides. Remove the meat from the pot and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the onions, garlic, carrots, sweet potatoes, and mushrooms. Cook until the vegetables are softened.
3. Return the meat to the pot and add the cabbage, sage, parsley, and thyme. Stir well to combine.
4. Cover the pot and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the meat is tender.
5. In a small bowl, mix the arrowroot powder with a little water to make a slurry. Stir this into the stew to thicken it.
6. Continue to cook the stew for another 10-15 minutes, until it reaches your desired thickness.
7. Taste and adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve hot."

input: Ingredients: parmigiano-reggiano cheese, water, truffle oil, salt, onions, fat free less sodium chicken broth, large egg yolks, chopped fresh thyme, garlic cloves, tomato paste, kosher salt, ground black pepper, extra-virgin olive oil, flat leaf parsley, cremini mushrooms, olive oil, mushrooms, all-purpose flour. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Truffle Mushroom Risotto

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of parmigiano-reggiano cheese, grated
- 4 cups of water
- 2 tablespoons of truffle oil
- 1 teaspoon of salt
- 1 large onion, finely chopped
- 4 cups of fat free less sodium chicken broth
- 2 large egg yolks
- 1 tablespoon of chopped fresh thyme
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- 1 tablespoon of tomato paste
- 1 teaspoon of kosher salt
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 2 tablespoons of extra-virgin olive oil
- 1/4 cup of flat leaf parsley, chopped
- 2 cups of cremini mushrooms, sliced
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 2 cups of mushrooms, sliced
- 1 cup of all-purpose flour

Instructions:
1. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onions and garlic, sauté until they are soft and translucent.
2. Add the mushrooms to the pan and cook until they are browned and tender.
3. Stir in the tomato paste, thyme, salt, and pepper. Cook for another 2 minutes.
4. Add the flour to the pan and stir until the mushrooms are well coated.
5. Slowly pour in the chicken broth and water, stirring constantly to prevent lumps from forming.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the mixture has thickened.
7. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg yolks. Gradually add a small amount of the hot broth to the yolks, stirring constantly to temper the eggs.
8. Slowly pour the egg mixture back into the saucepan, stirring constantly.
9. Stir in the parmigiano-reggiano cheese until it is melted and the sauce is creamy.
10. Drizzle the truffle oil over the risotto and stir until it is well incorporated.
11. Serve the risotto hot, garnished with the chopped parsley."

input: Ingredients: sugar, vinegar, ground pork, minced ginger, szechwan peppercorns, salt, red chili peppers, green onions, garlic, stock, yardlong beans, vegetable oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Szechwan Ground Pork and Yardlong Beans Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon sugar
- 2 tablespoons vinegar
- 500 grams ground pork
- 1 tablespoon minced ginger
- 1 teaspoon szechwan peppercorns
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 2 red chili peppers, sliced
- 4 green onions, chopped
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup stock
- 500 grams yardlong beans, cut into 2-inch pieces
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil

Instructions:
1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large wok or frying pan over medium heat.
2. Add the szechwan peppercorns and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
3. Add the minced garlic, minced ginger, and sliced red chili peppers to the pan. Stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
4. Add the ground pork to the pan. Cook for 5-7 minutes, breaking it up with a spatula, until it is browned and cooked through.
5. Add the yardlong beans to the pan. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until they are bright green and slightly tender.
6. Pour in the stock, vinegar, and sugar. Stir well to combine.
7. Season with salt and let the mixture simmer for 10-15 minutes until the beans are cooked to your liking and the sauce has thickened slightly.
8. Stir in the chopped green onions and cook for another 2 minutes.
9. Serve the stir-fry hot with steamed rice or noodles. Enjoy your Szechwan Ground Pork and Yardlong Beans Stir-Fry!"

input: Ingredients: water, grated lemon zest, jalapeno chilies, soy sauce, dark brown sugar. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Lemon-Jalapeno Soy Glaze

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of water
- 2 tablespoons of grated lemon zest
- 2 jalapeno chilies, finely chopped
- 1/2 cup of soy sauce
- 1/2 cup of dark brown sugar

Instructions:
1. In a medium saucepan, combine 1 cup of water and 1/2 cup of dark brown sugar. 
2. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring until the sugar has completely dissolved.
3. Reduce the heat to low, then add 1/2 cup of soy sauce, 2 tablespoons of grated lemon zest, and the finely chopped jalapeno chilies.
4. Simmer the mixture for about 15-20 minutes, or until it has reduced by half and thickened into a glaze.
5. Remove the glaze from the heat and let it cool before using. It can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a week."

input: Ingredients: ground black pepper, garlic, bok choy, soy sauce, cooking oil, firm tofu, spinach, radishes, salt, snow peas, fresh ginger, sesame oil, lemon juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Stir-Fried Tofu with Bok Choy and Snow Peas

Ingredients:
- 1 block of firm tofu (14 ounces)
- 2 tablespoons of cooking oil
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon of fresh ginger, minced
- 1 head of bok choy, chopped
- 1 cup of snow peas
- 1 cup of spinach
- 4 radishes, sliced
- 2 tablespoons of soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon of sesame oil
- 1 tablespoon of lemon juice
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:
1. Drain the tofu and cut it into 1-inch cubes.
2. Heat the cooking oil in a large pan over medium heat.
3. Add the minced garlic and ginger to the pan and sauté for about 1 minute until fragrant.
4. Add the tofu cubes to the pan and cook for about 5 minutes until they are golden brown on all sides. Remove the tofu from the pan and set it aside.
5. In the same pan, add the chopped bok choy, snow peas, spinach, and sliced radishes. Stir-fry for about 3-4 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
6. In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, sesame oil, lemon juice, ground black pepper, and salt.
7. Add the tofu back into the pan with the vegetables. Pour the sauce over the tofu and vegetables and stir well to combine.
8. Cook for another 2-3 minutes until everything is heated through.
9. Serve the stir-fry hot. Enjoy your Stir-Fried Tofu with Bok Choy and Snow Peas!"

input: Ingredients: coconut milk, frozen banana, pure acai puree, almond butter. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Acai Almond Butter Smoothie

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of coconut milk
- 1 large frozen banana
- 2 tablespoons of pure acai puree
- 1 tablespoon of almond butter

Instructions:
1. Pour 1 cup of coconut milk into a blender.
2. Add 1 large frozen banana to the blender.
3. Add 2 tablespoons of pure acai puree to the blender.
4. Add 1 tablespoon of almond butter to the blender.
5. Blend all the ingredients together until smooth.
6. Once smooth, pour the mixture into a glass.
7. Serve immediately and enjoy your Acai Almond Butter Smoothie."

input: Ingredients: olive oil, green onions, frozen pastry puff sheets, sea salt, large eggs, fresh thyme leaves, soft goat's cheese, leeks, freshly ground pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Goat Cheese and Leek Tart with Thyme

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 cup green onions, chopped
- 2 frozen pastry puff sheets
- 1/2 teaspoon sea salt
- 2 large eggs
- 1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves
- 8 ounces soft goat's cheese
- 2 leeks, cleaned and thinly sliced
- 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground pepper

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the leeks and green onions, and sauté until they are soft and lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
3. Season the leek and onion mixture with sea salt and freshly ground pepper.
4. Roll out the frozen pastry puff sheets on a lightly floured surface. Transfer them to a baking sheet.
5. In a bowl, beat the eggs lightly. Crumble the goat cheese into the eggs and add the thyme leaves. Mix until well combined.
6. Spread the leek and onion mixture over the pastry puff sheets, leaving a 1-inch border around the edges.
7. Pour the egg and cheese mixture over the leeks and onions.
8. Fold the edges of the pastry over the filling, pinching the corners together.
9. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the pastry is golden and the filling is set.
10. Let the tart cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving."

input: Ingredients: olive oil, lean ground beef, fresh oregano, sausage links, whole peeled tomatoes, salt, spaghetti, tomato sauce, ground black pepper, garlic, bay leaf, dried basil, grated parmesan cheese, yellow onion. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spaghetti with Hearty Meat Sauce

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 pound lean ground beef
- 1 pound sausage links, casings removed
- 1 large yellow onion, finely chopped
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 can (28 ounces) whole peeled tomatoes
- 1 can (15 ounces) tomato sauce
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 1 bay leaf
- 1 teaspoon dried basil
- 1 tablespoon fresh oregano, chopped
- 1 pound spaghetti
- 1 cup grated parmesan cheese

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the ground beef and sausage, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned and no pink remains, about 10 minutes.
2. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the pot. Cook until the onions are translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the whole peeled tomatoes, tomato sauce, salt, black pepper, bay leaf, dried basil, and fresh oregano to the pot. Stir well to combine.
4. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for at least 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
5. About 15 minutes before the sauce is done, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the spaghetti and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.
6. Drain the spaghetti and return it to the pot.
7. Remove the bay leaf from the sauce and discard it. Pour the sauce over the cooked spaghetti and toss well to combine.
8. Serve the spaghetti with hearty meat sauce hot, topped with grated parmesan cheese."

input: Ingredients: pork tenderloin, salt, corn tortillas, monterey jack, brown sugar, ground red pepper, chopped onion, serrano chile, plantains, lower sodium chicken broth, cooking spray, cilantro leaves, fresh lime juice, canola oil, black beans, tomatillos, garlic cloves, dried oregano, ground cumin. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Pork Tacos with Plantains and Black Beans

Ingredients:
- 1 lb pork tenderloin
- 1 tsp salt
- 8 corn tortillas
- 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese
- 2 tbsp brown sugar
- 1/2 tsp ground red pepper
- 1 cup chopped onion
- 1 serrano chile, finely chopped
- 2 ripe plantains, peeled and sliced
- 1 cup lower sodium chicken broth
- Cooking spray
- 1/2 cup cilantro leaves
- 2 tbsp fresh lime juice
- 2 tbsp canola oil
- 1 can (15 oz) black beans, rinsed and drained
- 4 tomatillos, husked and chopped
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- 1/2 tsp dried oregano
- 1/2 tsp ground cumin

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F. 
2. Season the pork tenderloin with salt, ground red pepper, and brown sugar. 
3. Heat canola oil in a large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork and sear on all sides until browned. 
4. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and roast the pork for about 15-20 minutes or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145 degrees F. 
5. While the pork is roasting, heat a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the chopped onion, serrano chile, and minced garlic. Cook until the onion is translucent. 
6. Add the chopped tomatillos, black beans, chicken broth, dried oregano, and ground cumin to the saucepan. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes. 
7. In a separate skillet, heat some cooking spray over medium heat. Add the sliced plantains and cook until they are golden brown on both sides. 
8. Once the pork is done, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin strips. 
9. Warm the corn tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat. 
10. Assemble the tacos by placing some of the pork slices on a tortilla, topping it with the black bean mixture, some of the cooked plantains, and a sprinkle of Monterey Jack cheese. 
11. Garnish the tacos with fresh cilantro leaves and a squeeze of lime juice. Serve immediately."

input: Ingredients: blackberries, chambord, champagne. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Blackberry Chambord Champagne Cocktail

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of blackberries
- 2 ounces of Chambord
- 1 bottle of champagne

Instructions:
1. Place a few blackberries in each champagne flute.
2. Pour 1 ounce of Chambord over the blackberries in each glass.
3. Fill the rest of each glass with champagne.
4. Stir gently to combine.
5. Serve immediately and enjoy."

input: Ingredients: olive oil, garlic, italian seasoning, pepper, dry red wine, onions, tomato sauce, mushrooms, sweet italian sausage, pork chops, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Italian Pork Chops with Sausage and Mushroom Sauce

Ingredients:
- 4 pork chops
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 1/2 cup dry red wine
- 2 medium onions, chopped
- 1 can (15 oz) tomato sauce
- 1 cup mushrooms, sliced
- 1 lb sweet Italian sausage
- 1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:

1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 

2. Season the pork chops with salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning. 

3. Add the pork chops to the skillet and cook for about 5 minutes on each side, or until they are browned and cooked through. Remove the pork chops from the skillet and set them aside.

4. In the same skillet, add the sweet Italian sausage and cook until browned. Remove the sausage from the skillet and set it aside with the pork chops.

5. Add the chopped onions and minced garlic to the skillet and cook until the onions are translucent.

6. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook for another 5 minutes, or until the mushrooms are browned.

7. Pour the dry red wine into the skillet and let it simmer for a few minutes to deglaze the pan.

8. Add the tomato sauce to the skillet and stir well to combine.

9. Return the pork chops and sausage to the skillet, spooning the sauce over them.

10. Cover the skillet and let it simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the pork chops are tender and the flavors have melded together.

11. Serve the pork chops with the sausage and mushroom sauce on top. Enjoy your Italian Pork Chops with Sausage and Mushroom Sauce!"

input: Ingredients: baguette, radishes, dijon mustard, soft fresh goat cheese, olive oil, shallots, sherry vinegar, curly endive. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Goat Cheese and Radish Baguette with Endive Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 baguette
- 8 radishes
- 2 tablespoons dijon mustard
- 4 ounces soft fresh goat cheese
- 3 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 shallots
- 1 tablespoon sherry vinegar
- 2 cups curly endive

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Slice the baguette into 1/2 inch thick rounds and arrange them on a baking sheet.
3. Toast the baguette slices in the oven for about 10 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
4. While the baguette is toasting, thinly slice the radishes and shallots.
5. In a bowl, whisk together the dijon mustard, sherry vinegar, and olive oil to create a vinaigrette.
6. Toss the sliced radishes, shallots, and curly endive in the vinaigrette until they are well coated.
7. Once the baguette slices are toasted, spread a layer of goat cheese on each slice.
8. Top each goat cheese-covered baguette slice with a spoonful of the radish and endive salad.
9. Serve immediately and enjoy your Goat Cheese and Radish Baguette with Endive Salad."

input: Ingredients: kosher salt, sweet potatoes, ground ginger, unsalted butter, light brown sugar, water, cracked black pepper, ground cinnamon, granulated sugar. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Sweet and Spicy Roasted Sweet Potatoes

Ingredients:
- 2 large sweet potatoes
- 1 teaspoon kosher salt
- 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger
- 4 tablespoons unsalted butter
- 1/4 cup light brown sugar
- 1/4 cup water
- 1/2 teaspoon cracked black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 2 tablespoons granulated sugar

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
2. Peel the sweet potatoes and cut them into 1-inch cubes. Place them in a large bowl.
3. In a small saucepan, melt the unsalted butter over medium heat. Add the light brown sugar, granulated sugar, water, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, kosher salt, and cracked black pepper. Stir until the sugars are dissolved and the mixture is well combined.
4. Pour the butter and sugar mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss until the potatoes are well coated.
5. Transfer the sweet potatoes to a baking sheet, spreading them out in a single layer.
6. Roast in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender and caramelized, stirring occasionally for even cooking.
7. Remove from the oven and let them cool slightly before serving."

input: Ingredients: chicken broth, butter, ground nutmeg, all-purpose flour, country ham, whipping cream, frozen chopped spinach, grated parmesan cheese, freshly ground pepper. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Spinach and Ham Pasta

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of chicken broth
- 2 tablespoons of butter
- 1/2 teaspoon of ground nutmeg
- 2 tablespoons of all-purpose flour
- 1 cup of diced country ham
- 1 cup of whipping cream
- 1 package (10 ounces) of frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
- 1/2 cup of grated parmesan cheese
- 1/2 teaspoon of freshly ground pepper

Instructions:
1. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the diced country ham and cook until it is lightly browned. Remove the ham from the skillet and set it aside.
2. In the same skillet, add the all-purpose flour and cook for 1-2 minutes until it is lightly browned. Slowly whisk in the chicken broth, making sure there are no lumps. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
3. Add the ground nutmeg and freshly ground pepper to the skillet and stir to combine.
4. Slowly whisk in the whipping cream and continue to cook the mixture until it thickens.
5. Add the thawed and drained chopped spinach to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the spinach is heated through.
6. Return the cooked ham to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for another 2-3 minutes until the ham is heated through.
7. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the grated parmesan cheese until it is melted and the sauce is creamy.
8. Serve the creamy spinach and ham sauce over your favorite pasta. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: flour tortillas, Campbell's Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup, cooked chicken, sour cream, green onions, Pace Picante Sauce, tomatoes, chili powder, shredded Monterey Jack cheese. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Creamy Chicken Enchiladas

Ingredients:
- 8 flour tortillas
- 1 can (10.5 oz) Campbell's Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup
- 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded
- 1 cup sour cream
- 1/2 cup green onions, chopped
- 1 cup Pace Picante Sauce
- 2 medium tomatoes, diced
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the shredded chicken, half of the Monterey Jack cheese, chili powder, and half of the Pace Picante Sauce. Mix until well combined.
3. Lay out the flour tortillas and evenly distribute the chicken mixture among them. Roll up each tortilla and place seam side down in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the Campbell's Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup, sour cream, and the remaining Pace Picante Sauce. Spread this mixture over the top of the enchiladas in the baking dish.
5. Sprinkle the remaining Monterey Jack cheese over the top of the enchiladas.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and starting to brown.
7. Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes. Garnish with the chopped green onions and diced tomatoes before serving."

input: Ingredients: rosemary, mascarpone, freshly ground pepper, sugar, honey, extra-virgin olive oil, nectarines, peasant bread, sweet cherries, salt, orange zest, lavender buds, apricot halves, fresh lemon juice. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Summer Fruit Bruschetta with Honey Mascarpone 

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon rosemary, finely chopped
- 1 cup mascarpone
- 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper
- 1 tablespoon sugar
- 2 tablespoons honey
- 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
- 2 nectarines, pitted and sliced
- 4 slices of peasant bread
- 1 cup sweet cherries, pitted and halved
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 teaspoon orange zest
- 1 teaspoon lavender buds
- 4 apricot halves
- 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice

Instructions:
1. Preheat your grill to medium heat.
2. In a bowl, combine the mascarpone, honey, orange zest, and rosemary. Mix until well combined and set aside.
3. In another bowl, combine the nectarines, cherries, apricot halves, sugar, lavender buds, and lemon juice. Toss until the fruit is well coated.
4. Brush both sides of the peasant bread slices with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and freshly ground pepper.
5. Place the bread on the grill and cook until grill marks appear, about 2 minutes per side.
6. Once the bread is grilled, spread a generous amount of the mascarpone mixture on each slice.
7. Top with the fruit mixture and serve immediately. Enjoy your Summer Fruit Bruschetta with Honey Mascarpone!"

input: Ingredients: tomatoes, salt, onions, extra-virgin olive oil. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Simple Tomato and Onion Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 large ripe tomatoes
- 1 large onion
- 2 tablespoons of extra-virgin olive oil
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt

Instructions:
1. Wash the tomatoes and onion under cold water.
2. Slice the tomatoes and onion into thin rounds.
3. Arrange the tomato and onion slices on a serving platter, alternating and overlapping them.
4. Drizzle the extra-virgin olive oil evenly over the tomatoes and onions.
5. Sprinkle the salt evenly over the salad.
6. Let the salad sit for 10-15 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together before serving."

input: Ingredients: white onion, diced tomatoes in juice, zucchini, olive oil, italian seasoning, sugar, salt. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Italian Zucchini and Tomato Saute

Ingredients:
- 1 large white onion
- 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes in juice
- 2 medium zucchinis
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning
- 1 teaspoon sugar
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. Peel and chop the white onion into small pieces.
2. Wash the zucchinis, cut off the ends, and slice them into half-inch rounds.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
4. Add the chopped onion to the skillet and sauté until it becomes translucent, about 5 minutes.
5. Add the sliced zucchini to the skillet and continue to sauté for another 5 minutes, or until the zucchini begins to soften.
6. Add the can of diced tomatoes (with juice), Italian seasoning, sugar, and salt to the skillet. Stir well to combine all ingredients.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and let the mixture simmer for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
8. After simmering, check the zucchini for doneness. If it is tender, the dish is ready to serve. If not, continue to simmer until the desired tenderness is reached.
9. Serve hot as a side dish or over pasta or rice for a main dish. Enjoy your Italian Zucchini and Tomato Saute!"

input: Ingredients: crÃ¨me fraÃ®che, plums, sugar. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Crème Fraîche Plum Dessert

Ingredients:
- 1 cup of crème fraîche
- 6 ripe plums
- 1/2 cup of sugar

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Cut the plums in half and remove the pits.
3. Arrange the plum halves cut side up in a baking dish.
4. Sprinkle the sugar evenly over the plums.
5. Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the plums are soft and the sugar has caramelized.
6. Remove the plums from the oven and let them cool slightly.
7. Serve the warm plums with a dollop of crème fraîche on top. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: curry powder, cooking oil, tomato ketchup, red potato, hot pepper sauce, garlic, onions, stewing beef, onion powder, red bell pepper, black pepper, fresh thyme, salt, boiling water. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Beef and Potato Curry

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons curry powder
- 2 tablespoons cooking oil
- 1/4 cup tomato ketchup
- 4 medium red potatoes, cubed
- 1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 large onions, chopped
- 1.5 pounds stewing beef, cut into cubes
- 1 teaspoon onion powder
- 1 red bell pepper, chopped
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 2 sprigs fresh thyme
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup boiling water

Instructions:
1. Heat the cooking oil in a large pot over medium heat.
2. Add the onions, garlic, and red bell pepper to the pot and sauté until the onions are translucent.
3. Add the stewing beef to the pot and cook until browned on all sides.
4. Stir in the curry powder, onion powder, black pepper, and salt. Cook for 2 minutes until the spices are well blended with the beef.
5. Add the tomato ketchup, hot pepper sauce, and fresh thyme to the pot. Stir well to combine.
6. Add the cubed red potatoes to the pot and stir to coat them in the curry mixture.
7. Pour the boiling water into the pot. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 1 hour, or until the beef and potatoes are tender.
8. Check the seasoning and adjust if necessary. Remove the thyme sprigs before serving.
9. Serve your Spicy Beef and Potato Curry hot, enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: string beans, olive oil, white rice, chopped parsley, dried oregano, chicken stock, black pepper, fresh peas, carrots, onions, tomato sauce, cayenne, salt, ground beef, eggs, pepper, large garlic cloves, fresh mint, chopped cilantro fresh. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Vegetable and Beef Rice Skillet

Ingredients and Amounts:
- 1 cup string beans
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 cup white rice
- 1/4 cup chopped parsley
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- 2 cups chicken stock
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1 cup fresh peas
- 2 medium carrots
- 1 large onion
- 1 cup tomato sauce
- 1/4 teaspoon cayenne
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 pound ground beef
- 2 large eggs
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 2 large garlic cloves
- 1/4 cup fresh mint
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onions and garlic and sauté until they are soft and fragrant.
2. Add the ground beef to the skillet and cook until it is browned. Drain any excess fat.
3. Stir in the tomato sauce, chicken stock, white rice, dried oregano, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Bring the mixture to a boil.
4. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and let it simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the rice is cooked.
5. While the rice is cooking, steam the string beans, peas, and carrots until they are tender. This should take about 10 minutes.
6. Beat the eggs in a small bowl. Stir in the chopped parsley, fresh mint, and chopped cilantro.
7. Once the rice is cooked, stir in the steamed vegetables and the egg mixture. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the eggs are set.
8. Serve the skillet hot, garnished with additional fresh herbs if desired."

input: Ingredients: pinenuts, scallions, asparagus, cherry tomatoes, italian salad dressing, short pasta, shredded parmesan cheese. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Italian Pasta Salad with Asparagus and Pinenuts

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup of pinenuts
- 4 scallions
- 1 bunch of asparagus
- 1 cup of cherry tomatoes
- 1/2 cup of Italian salad dressing
- 2 cups of short pasta (like penne or fusilli)
- 1/2 cup of shredded parmesan cheese

Instructions:
1. Start by boiling a large pot of salted water. Once boiling, add the short pasta and cook according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside to cool.
2. While the pasta is cooking, trim the ends of the asparagus and cut into 1-inch pieces. Blanch the asparagus in boiling water for 2 minutes, then drain and rinse under cold water to stop the cooking process.
3. Slice the scallions into thin rounds and halve the cherry tomatoes.
4. In a dry skillet over medium heat, toast the pinenuts until golden brown, stirring frequently to prevent burning. Remove from heat and set aside.
5. In a large bowl, combine the cooled pasta, asparagus, scallions, cherry tomatoes, and toasted pinenuts. Pour the Italian salad dressing over the top and toss until everything is well coated.
6. Sprinkle the shredded parmesan cheese over the top of the salad and toss again to combine.
7. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate for an hour to let the flavors meld together. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: guacamole, cashew nuts, black beans, hot sauce, purple onion, chunky salsa, jalapeno chilies, tortilla chips. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Spicy Guacamole and Black Bean Nachos

Ingredients:
- 2 cups of guacamole
- 1 cup of cashew nuts
- 2 cups of black beans
- 2 tablespoons of hot sauce
- 1 large purple onion, diced
- 1 cup of chunky salsa
- 2 jalapeno chilies, sliced
- 1 bag of tortilla chips

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Spread out the tortilla chips on a large baking sheet.
3. Evenly distribute the black beans and diced purple onion over the chips.
4. Drizzle the hot sauce over the beans and onions.
5. Bake in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes, or until the chips are toasted and the beans are heated through.
6. Remove from the oven and immediately top with the guacamole, chunky salsa, and sliced jalapeno chilies.
7. Sprinkle the cashew nuts on top.
8. Serve immediately and enjoy your Spicy Guacamole and Black Bean Nachos."

input: Ingredients: soy sauce, fresh ginger root, rice vinegar, white sugar, minced garlic, minced onion, lemon juice, ketchup, ground black pepper, peanut oil, water, salt, celery. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Asian-Inspired Celery Stir Fry

Ingredients:
- 1/4 cup soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons fresh ginger root, grated
- 1/4 cup rice vinegar
- 2 tablespoons white sugar
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 1/2 cup minced onion
- 2 tablespoons lemon juice
- 1/4 cup ketchup
- 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 2 tablespoons peanut oil
- 1/4 cup water
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 4 cups celery, chopped

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, combine soy sauce, grated ginger root, rice vinegar, white sugar, minced garlic, minced onion, lemon juice, ketchup, ground black pepper, water, and salt. Stir until the sugar is dissolved. Set aside.
2. Heat peanut oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chopped celery and stir fry for about 5 minutes, until it starts to soften.
3. Pour the sauce mixture over the celery in the skillet. Stir well to coat the celery with the sauce.
4. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and let it simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. After 10 minutes, remove the lid and continue to cook for another 5 minutes, or until the celery is tender and the sauce has thickened.
6. Serve the Asian-Inspired Celery Stir Fry hot, as a side dish or over rice for a main dish."

input: Ingredients: turbinado, apricot preserves, pie dough, sugar, frozen blueberries, peaches. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Peach-Blueberry Apricot Glazed Pie

Ingredients:
- 1 cup turbinado
- 1/2 cup apricot preserves
- 1 package pie dough (enough for a double crust pie)
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 2 cups frozen blueberries
- 4 cups peaches, peeled and sliced

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F.
2. Roll out half of the pie dough to fit a 9-inch pie plate. Place the crust in the pie plate and press it down along the bottom and all sides.
3. In a large bowl, combine the peaches, blueberries, sugar, and 1/2 cup of turbinado. Mix until the fruit is coated with sugar.
4. Pour the fruit mixture into the pie crust.
5. Roll out the remaining pie dough and place it over the fruit filling. Trim and crimp the edges. Cut slits in the top crust to allow steam to escape.
6. Brush the top crust with the apricot preserves, then sprinkle the remaining turbinado over the top.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the filling is bubbly.
8. Allow the pie to cool before serving."

input: Ingredients: large garlic cloves, ground black pepper, arugula, parmesan cheese, extra-virgin olive oil, lemon wedge, porterhouse steaks. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Garlic Parmesan Porterhouse Steak with Arugula Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 large garlic cloves
- 1 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 2 cups arugula
- 1/2 cup parmesan cheese
- 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
- 1 lemon wedge
- 2 porterhouse steaks

Instructions:

1. Preheat your grill to high heat.

2. Mince the garlic cloves and combine them with the ground black pepper and 1 tablespoon of the olive oil. Rub this mixture all over the porterhouse steaks.

3. Place the steaks on the grill and cook for about 4-5 minutes on each side for medium-rare, or until they reach your desired level of doneness.

4. While the steaks are grilling, prepare the arugula salad. In a large bowl, combine the arugula, parmesan cheese, the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil, and the juice from the lemon wedge. Toss until everything is well combined.

5. Once the steaks are done, remove them from the grill and let them rest for a few minutes.

6. Serve each steak with a generous helping of the arugula salad on the side. Enjoy your Garlic Parmesan Porterhouse Steak with Arugula Salad!"

input: Ingredients: black pepper, cannellini beans, red bell pepper, spinach, part-skim mozzarella cheese, salt, onions, olive oil, diced tomatoes, celery, rosemary sprigs, zucchini, garlic cloves, dried oregano. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Vegetable and Cannellini Bean Stew

Ingredients:
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 2 cans (15 ounces each) cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
- 1 red bell pepper, diced
- 2 cups fresh spinach, chopped
- 1 cup part-skim mozzarella cheese, shredded
- 1 teaspoon salt
- 1 large onion, diced
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes
- 2 celery stalks, diced
- 2 rosemary sprigs
- 1 medium zucchini, diced
- 3 garlic cloves, minced
- 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion, celery, and red bell pepper. Cook for 5 minutes, or until the vegetables are softened.
2. Add the garlic, black pepper, salt, and dried oregano to the pot. Stir well and cook for another minute.
3. Add the diced tomatoes (with their juice), cannellini beans, and rosemary sprigs to the pot. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
4. Once simmering, add the zucchini and cook for 10 minutes, or until the zucchini is tender.
5. Add the spinach to the pot and stir until it wilts.
6. Remove the pot from the heat. Discard the rosemary sprigs.
7. Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese over the stew. Cover the pot and let it sit for a few minutes, or until the cheese is melted.
8. Serve the stew warm. Enjoy!"

input: Ingredients: black beans, guacamole, salsa, olive oil, grating cheese, sour cream, fresh coriander, green onions, cream cheese, tomatoes, flour tortillas, bacon. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Loaded Mexican Tortilla

Ingredients:
- 1 can of black beans (15 oz)
- 1 cup of guacamole
- 1 cup of salsa
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1 cup of grating cheese
- 1/2 cup of sour cream
- 1/4 cup of fresh coriander, chopped
- 1/2 cup of green onions, chopped
- 1/2 cup of cream cheese
- 2 tomatoes, diced
- 4 large flour tortillas
- 8 slices of bacon

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Place the bacon on a baking sheet and bake for about 15-20 minutes or until crispy. Once done, remove from the oven and set aside to cool. Once cooled, crumble the bacon into small pieces.
3. While the bacon is cooking, heat the olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the black beans and cook for about 5 minutes or until heated through. Set aside.
4. Lay out the flour tortillas and spread a layer of cream cheese on each. 
5. Divide the black beans evenly among the tortillas, spreading them out over the cream cheese.
6. Next, add the guacamole, salsa, and diced tomatoes to each tortilla.
7. Sprinkle the crumbled bacon, grating cheese, green onions, and fresh coriander over the top of each tortilla.
8. Roll up each tortilla tightly, tucking in the ends as you go.
9. Place the rolled tortillas on a baking sheet and bake for about 10 minutes or until the cheese is melted and the tortillas are slightly crispy.
10. Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes before slicing. Serve with sour cream on the side."

input: Ingredients: green chile, whole wheat tortillas, ground beef, minced garlic, black olives, shredded cheddar cheese, diced tomatoes, onions, refried beans, red enchilada sauce. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Hearty Beef and Green Chile Enchiladas

Ingredients:
- 2 green chiles, chopped
- 8 whole wheat tortillas
- 1 lb ground beef
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 1/2 cup black olives, sliced
- 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
- 1 cup diced tomatoes
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 can (16 oz) refried beans
- 1 can (10 oz) red enchilada sauce

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F.
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef, onions, and minced garlic over medium heat until the beef is browned and the onions are tender.
3. Stir in the green chiles and diced tomatoes, continue to cook for another 2-3 minutes.
4. Spread a spoonful of refried beans on each tortilla. Top with the beef mixture and a sprinkle of shredded cheese.
5. Roll up each tortilla and place seam side down in a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Pour the red enchilada sauce over the top of the rolled tortillas. Sprinkle with the remaining shredded cheese and black olives.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and lightly browned."

input: Ingredients: dried basil, dijon mustard, dried tarragon leaves, honey, salt, dried thyme, vegetable oil, white wine, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Honey Mustard Herb Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1 teaspoon dried basil
- 2 tablespoons dijon mustard
- 1 teaspoon dried tarragon leaves
- 3 tablespoons honey
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- 1/2 cup white wine
- 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper
- 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves

Instructions:
1. In a small bowl, combine the dried basil, dried tarragon, dried thyme, salt, and ground black pepper. Set aside.
2. In a separate bowl, mix together the dijon mustard and honey until well combined.
3. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
4. Season the chicken breast halves with the herb mixture, ensuring all sides are covered.
5. Place the chicken in the skillet and cook for about 6-7 minutes on each side, or until the chicken is cooked through and no longer pink in the middle.
6. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
7. Deglaze the skillet with the white wine, scraping the bottom of the skillet to loosen any browned bits.
8. Reduce the heat to low and stir in the honey mustard mixture. Cook for a few minutes until the sauce is heated through.
9. Return the chicken to the skillet, coating each piece with the sauce.
10. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the chicken is heated through.
11. Serve the chicken hot, drizzled with the remaining sauce from the skillet."

input: Ingredients: purple onion, mango, black pepper, lemon juice, strawberries, sea salt, fresh basil leaves. Generate a recipe.
output:
"Recipe Name: Strawberry Mango Salsa with Basil and Purple Onion

Ingredients:
- 1 medium purple onion
- 2 ripe mangoes
